The Conference of Amsterdam

With the establishment of a unified German state, the question of a “Greater Germany” - a Germany encompassing Dietsland - has emerged. It is true that pan-Germanism is a strong force within our nation, and a conference in Amsterdam has been organized at the behest of the German government in the hopes of determining the terms by which Dietsland might accept unification with them. However, a growing number of Dutch people believe that we should not sacrifice our hard-won sovereignty for the sake of Germany, a “nation” from which we have been estranged for centuries. Furthermore, the tide of radicalism has been sweeping Germany as of late, and its political landscape has undergone frightful transformations. We may not want to take part in the Germany which has emerged…but this “Conference” is not a mere diplomatic gesture. It is a threat : if we do not acquiesce to annexation, then Germany may seek it through force.
We will make the necessary sacrifices for the German people!
Germany is not our homeland any longer.
Failure of the Amsterdam Conference

The Dutch have refused German unity! They have declared that Dietsland and the Dutch people have their own destiny to follow, and have repudiated the “Greater Germany” ideal of union with ourselves. While pan-German fervor has not abadated amongst our own people, it appears that Dutch nationalism has prevailed in Dietsland. If we want to secure the Dutch then force is our only option.
We will be back in Amsterdam sooner rather than later…
The Rhine Crisis

To the horror of our government, the Rhenish Confederation has defied our attempts to bring them under our control. Be it through outside interference or incompetence on the part of the Burgundian armed forces, the right bank of the Rhine remains beyond our reach. This cannot be tolerated! Thankfully Berg remains ardently pro-Burgundian, allowing us to foment a pro-Burgundian uprising which will allow us to place the region under occupation. Yet we must now remain more vigilant than ever, for the peoples of the Rhine shall surely look upon us with suspicion and hostility going forwards…
This is…not an ideal situation.
Berg Secedes!

The peoples of the Duchy of Berg, especially their elites, have refused any cooperation with $CAPITAL$. This den of Burgundophile vipers has refused to break ties with Anvers. Now they have gone even further and declared independence! The Burgundians immediately dispatched troops over the Rhein to “protect” Berg. Thankfully, Burgundy has not made any additional moves to challenge our independence. The loss of Berg is a bitter blow, but at least now we are free from Burgundy’s clutches.
A reckoning is not to be denied forever.
Establishment of the Berg Protectorate

Our forces entered Berg as soon as they declared independence from $FROMCOUNTRY$. Now Berg has become our protectorate, granting us at least a small foothold on the right bank of the Rhine. Yet it has come at the cost of outraging $FROMCOUNTRY$, who have denounced Berg’s secession as illegal and have sworn to recover Berg by any means necessary. Suffice to say any hope of peacefully establishing our hegemony over the Rhine has now been lost.
At least we have Berg…
Declare a Reichsexekutionskrieg against the Danubians

Ever since Imperial authority began to decline after the Great Interregnum of the mid-thirteenth century, it has at times been necessary to declare a Reichsexekutionskrieg, an official war against one of our own Imperial Estates to enforce a decision of the Reichshofrat (Aulic Council, the supreme court of the Empire). As this is a breach of the Ewiger Landfriede, the ban on internal Imperial wars, it is not done lightly, especially in the modern era where the memory of Wenceslaus V’s centralization campaigns are so fresh. Furthermore, Reichsexecutionskriegs were disavowed under Article III of the Treaty of Paris of 1820, as part of the conditions allowing the Jagiellons to keep their titles. Yet the threat posed by the dissident, even traitorous princes of the Danubian Circle, particularly their support of German nationalism, can no longer be ignored.\n\n§RWe can strong-arm the Reichshofrat and the Reichstag into declaring a Reichsexekutionskrieg against Austria and Bavaria, but only at the cost of becoming the enemy of Europe. This will without question provoke a new Great German War.§
The Treaty of Berlin

We have routed the Jagiellon forces and are now in possession of one of their largest cities. Since neither we nor the Jagiellons desire a full scale war we will offer them peace in exchange for renouncing their claim on Pommerania. Let this be a lesson to those who wish to throw us to the wolves, we will not go quietly into the night!
The Treaty of Hamburg

We have successfully pushed the Scandinavians out of Northern Germany and the Jutland peninsula. However the Scandinavia naval presence makes it almost impossible to invade the heartland of Scandinavia so we should push for peace now. We will only ask for what was promised to us at the Congress of Venice and go no further. With this we will neuter the threat Scandinavia poses to us and raise our standing with our fellow German states.
Form Saxony

After a long period of struggle and turmoil, we have finally united the old Saxon lands from Thuringia to the North Sea. Now that we own most of the old Saxon territories we will now forge the Kingdom of Saxony and bind these lands to us.
The Danubian Dream

For far too long we have been pushed around by Prague and have been kept in line only by the threat of force by the Imperial Army. Despite the Holy Roman Empire existing for over a thousand years it is a fractured mess and a playground for outside powers to exploit. That is why the idea of Danubia exists, in order to transform a mere legal territory of the Empire into a champion of the German states, and to pave the way for the inevitable German unification\n\n(NOTE: Danubian unification will be handled through events - this just serves as a reminder of the on-going unification).
End of the Burgundian-Scandinavian Occupation

We have endured much under the occupation of the Burgundians and Scandinavians following the Second Great German War. However, it is time for the occupation to end and our nation to regain full control of our sovereignty. The occupation forces have already laid out their demands on the Bohemian state as to how they feel the Bohemian state should operate and we have no choice but to agree to whatever they ask. While it may hurt now we will eventually overcome their restrictions and return to our former glory.
The Great Reforms

In the aftermath of the end of the Holy Roman Empire we have been struggling to adapt our patchwork empire to the expectations of a modern country. Our army is still disorganized, religious tensions are at an all time high, and the checks and balances between the government and the Emperor need to be reassessed. We will have to address these problems and launch an ambitious reform program that will seek to solve these problems and finally allow Bohemia to exert itself on the world stage.
The Elbian Dream

Due to our previous position as the heart of the former Holy Roman Empire we are in a prime position to try and make inroads towards a greater German state, uniting the northernmost former Imperial Circles with the Bohemian crown lands. However, we will need to accomplish two things. First we must solve the political crisis in Bohemia following the end of the Holy Roman Empire by completing the Great Reforms. Second we must unite the Elbian Germans by identifying a common threat that they will rally around us to protect them from. (NOTE: this event is just to lay out what must be done. Actual Elbain unification will be handled by another event.)
Form the Elbian Confederation

We have finally proven our worth to our Elbian German brothers. We have kicked Scandinavia and their puppets out of northern Germany and have secured a defensible border with them in Holstein . With the incorporation of both Pomerania and Saxony, and with our influence in northern Germany now unchecked, we must offer our neighbors the chance to join our new German state with the hope of it being the first step towards full German unification.
Investigate the Hamburg Massacre

With our political situation secure we must now find a way to remove Scandinavia from northern Germany. We have heard of second-hand stories about the murder of German citizens by Scandinavian soldiers in Hamburg sometime around the beginning of the 19th century, but nothing concrete has been proven. If we were to look more into this matter and find (or…”find”) actual evidence, we could use this to rally the Northern German states to our cause and also use it to launch a war to free the Germans trapped under Scandinavia’s direct control.
Subjugate the Saxons

Saxony has been an obstinate roadblock towards our goals in unifying Northern Germany. Despite our efforts in removing Scandinavia from Northern Germany, Saxony still refuses to accept our leadership and seems content with staying independent. We must prove to them the price for such foolishness and bring them into the fold by force.
Subjugate the Saxons

Saxony has been an obstinate roadblock towards our goals in unifying Northern Germany. Despite our efforts in removing Scandinavia from Northern Germany, Saxony still refuses to accept our leadership and seems content with staying independent. We must prove to them the price for such foolishness and bring them into the fold by force.
Create Swabia

After years of hard work and undermining Burgundian influence we can achieve what many thought to be impossible and give these lands a united government not seen since the fall of the old stem Duchy of Swabia. With the support of the liberals who romanticize the old days of the Alemannic tribes and the Conservatives who favor the prestige of the old Duchy of Swabia, we shall give them what they want and create the Alemannic nation of Swabia.
The Swabian Affair

The presence of Swabia poses a threat to our uncontested control over the Rhine. However we are not the only country that seeks to bring Swabia under their control. With the Danubians eager to expand their country we could possibly seek an agreement with them that would once and for all answer the Swabian question while granting us a buffer state to protect our interest on the right bank of the Rhine
The Burgundian Rhine

With the recent crisis over we can turn our attention towards securing our position in the Lower and Middle Rhine. Berg was successful in unifying the Rhenish Germans under a single state, but our administration has concluded that in order to better secure our interests we should step in and relegate the country to a puppet state. Hopefully the Rhenish Germans will be accommodating to our demands, since otherwise we may have to intervene directly.
Destroy Westphalia

When the Rhenish Confederation was coming into existence, the Scandinavians manipulated Münster into declaring their own Rhenish nation in a bid to weaken the power of a unified Rhenish state. We must now rectify this disgrace and help bring Westphalia into the Rhenish Confederation through the use of our righteous might. A small border incident should do the trick…
Address the Hollowing

We lack the resources to fully alleviate the famine scourging our lands, but by forbidding local merchants and landlords from exporting grain and establishing a government commission to acquire and distribute what foodstuffs we can, it may be possible to ease the burden upon our population to a degree.
Address the Hollowing

The famine scourging our lands is the worst since the Great Famine of the early fourteenth century, and even though our lands are some of the richest in Germany, we cannot completely heal its wounds at the moment. By forbidding local merchants and landlords from exporting grain and establishing a government commission to acquire and distribute what foodstuffs we can, it may be possible to ease the burden upon our population to a degree, aided by the fact that the Hollowing has already proved less horrific here than elsewhere.
Demand the Dissolution of Wurzburg

The Archbishopric of Wurzburg is an abomination of the Treaty of Paris, a bloated Catholic theocracy governing a realm of Protestants. Such a bastion of reaction cannot be permitted to exist. We shall pressure the Wurzburger government to accept its place within the new German order, either peacefully or through force.
Annex the Free State of Bremen

Bremen is a small but geographically significant city-state on the western German coast, long a pawn between the Emperor and outside powers for dominance of the North Sea and northwestern Germany. We must demand their annexation to consolidate our rule in the region.
Assert Our Position in Oldenburg

Scandinavia has, through both military and economic means, held the Duchy of Oldenburg in its grip for decades. If we are to maintain our working relationship with the Nordics then they must understand that northwestern Germany lies within our sphere of influence alone. Surely they shall see reason and withdraw.
Was ist des Deutschen Vaterland?

What is the German’s Fatherland? That is the question which our people have been asking themselves since the German Revolution in 1790. The German people have spread out across Europe over the ages, shifting and changing, whether during the Ostsiedlung or more recent settlements and migrations. Now the reborn Germany must answer this question, and determine not only who is German, but where Germany is - and may yet be.
Lower Silesia is German!

Lower Silesia has been the home of Germans since the days of Rome, as attested by Tacitus. The Polish Slavs tried to interrupt this truth, but the German people endured their persecutions. As far as the German tongue sounds, from Liegnitz to Breslau - there, Germans, is the land which shall be reclaimed!
Bohemia is German!

Tacitus, writing in the second century A.D., attested to the presence of Germans across Bohemia. This presence was increased by new waves of German settlement across the land beginning in the 12th century. The Czech Slavs have now subjected the Bohemian Germans to repeated attacks, something we can no longer allow! But another question arises : how much of Bohemia remains German? We must answer the Bohemian Question for the final time.
Dietsland is German!

For as long as the German people have dwelled in northern Europe, the Dutch have been part of our homeland. It was only through Burgundian intrigues that they were separated from us! Now the Dutch people have fallen under the sway of traitors that deny the undeniable, and present the ludicrous lie that Dietsland is not German! This cannot be tolerated. As far as the the German tongue sounds, from Emden to Rotterdam - there, Germans, is the land which shall be liberated!
Dietsland is German!

For as long as the German people have dwelled in northern Europe, the Dutch have been part of our homeland. It was only through Burgundian intrigues that they were separated from us! Now the Dutch people have fallen under the sway of traitors that deny the undeniable, and present the ludicrous lie that Dietsland is not German! This cannot be tolerated. As far as the the German tongue sounds, from Emden to Rotterdam - there, Germans, is the land which shall be liberated!
Prussia is German!

Prussia was settled by Germans in the ancient past, but it was only the coming of the Baltic crusaders during the Northern Crusade in the 13th century that renewed its German character. Now we have become Prussia’s latest defenders. While the Balters are rather…eccentric by German standards, they are Germans nonetheless, and so we shall enshrine Prussia’s status as part our realm.
Prussia is German!

Prussia was settled by Germans in the ancient past, but it was only the coming of the Baltic crusaders during the Northern Crusade in the 13th century that renewed its German character. But the Balters have become misguided and do not understand their role in the greater German destiny. We shall educate them. As far as the German tongue sounds, from Bütow to Memel - there, Germans, is the land which shall be reconquered!
Annex Westphalia

With our foreign affairs secured, we can now turn our attention to Westphalia. Born out of a rejection of the Burgundian-led Rhenish Confederation project, Westphalia has always been something of a rogue state within Germany. If we have achieved political dominance within their institutions then we will be able to convince them to join us for the sake of German unity - if not then force will be our only option.
Integrate the Dutch

The Dutch have been estranged from the German cultural world for ages. While their language and traditions have shifted, the links between themselves and the rest of their cultural kin have not been severed. Although not given to political radicalism they are staunchly protective of their institutions. We will only be able to convince them of their place within the greater German destiny if we permit them to use, and educate their children in, their own tongue, especially in the realms of arts, music, and literature - as long as they speak the national German dialect as well.
Integrate the Bohemians

The Bohemians’ German character has been disputed long before the consolidation of Germany. The assaults upon their institutions by Slavic supremacists has deepened the controversy. While it is true that they are by far the most Slavic-influenced of our peoples, they are still Germans. We will only be able to convince them of their place within the greater German destiny if we permit them to use, and educate their children in, their own tongue, especially in the realms of arts, music, and literature - as long as they speak the national German dialect as well.
Furor Germanicus

For the first time since our ancient ancestors struggled against the cruelty of Attila the Hun, the German people are united against their enemy : the tyrannical Burgundians! We shall pay any price, bear any burden to slay the Lion to our west. The honor of Germania demands it!
Drafting the Constitution

We have begun the process of drafting a new constitution for our country. Munich is awash with new ideas on how the government should be run and overall the situation seems positive as we decide the future of our country.
Absolutism Secured

The constitution that was drafted has served to do very little except give our sovereign complete control over the country. Not only has a new wave of repression come to Bavaria, but political liberties have been curtailed to a degree not seen since the eighteenth century. All we can do is place our faith in our sovereign and hope that they can lead us to glory.
Constitutionalism Secured

The constitution that was drafted has relegated the sovereign to ceremonial duties while empowering the civilian government. This unforeseen liberalism in our country has sparked a new cultural revolution as many citizens are becoming politically active. Hopefully we can share this gift with our other neighbors, but for now we must make sure that the flame we sparked here does not go out.
Das Bruderkrieg

Despite our efforts to unite Danubia peacefully the conflicts between Austria and Bavaria were too great to overcome. Now we must fight our Danubian brothers in order to complete the dream we started so long ago. We will use every resource to come out the victor and draft as many men as it takes to ensure that our vision of Danubia is realized
Large Scale Training
At long last the dream of a united Danubia has been realized. However many still seek to destroy our young nation and we must be prepared to defend our country to the last man if necessary.
Holy Roman Empire

The Holy Roman Empire of the German Nation is in theory the ultimate power for the German states in Central Europe. However, following the Great German War the Reichstag and the Imperial courts hold what is effectively advisory power over the Imperial Estates. All member states are virtually independent while some old laws - particularly the Ewiger Landfriede’s ban on fehderecht (vendetta) - constrain any diplomatic efforts, as well as trade between members. We can only hope that this situation improves as otherwise the old Empire’s days may be numbered.
Emperor of the Romans

The Emperor of the Holy Roman Empire of the German Nation is in theory the master of Central Europe. In practice he only controls the Lands of the Crown of Bohemia. The Emperor exercises little control over his vassals and many instead follow the orders of Anvers or Copenhagen. However, the title does confer many privileges upon the Emperor which have greatly benefited our country and the House of Jagiellon. While still a prestigious position, the Emperor's power is slowly eroding away and soon the position may become completely defunct.
Manual Justification Blocked

§RThe Treaty of Paris and its reinforcement of the Ewiger Landfriede has placed great restrictions upon our military policy. We must wait until our political situation develops to be able to embark upon major wars!§
Empty Foreign Office

Our diplomatic corps has been severely neglected during the reign of Sigismund and we still don’t have a fully functioning office. Our Emperor seems to believe that he can handle all diplomatic efforts, but this has led to many diplomatic efforts to be abandoned due to the fickle nature of Sigismund. At best all we can do is maintain our sphere of influence and hope that our Emperor know what he is doing.
A Quality German Reichsarmee

In adherence with the advice of our German officers we have implemented reforms towards the creation of an elite army of highly disciplined German speaking troops with the finest equipment. This has resulted in us excluding many from the draft pool who do not meet our high standards and not only that but is also taxing our ability to keep supplying our troops. Overall while this army may be more costly, financial wise, it should prove more than ready in any conflict.
A Compromise Reichsarmee

We have tried to meld the advice of our German officers and Czech soldiers to create an army that accepts both Czechs and Germans. Overall this has resulted in more benefits than negatives, but it compared to what the army could have been many feel that the results are only sub-par.
A Reichsarmee of Czech Quantity

In adherence with the advice from our Czech soldiers we have implemented reforms towards the idea of expanding our draft pools to focus on mobilization for our army through Czech conscripts. We have also reformed the supply corp in order to better field these troops, however it has come at the cost of lower cohesion amongst army groups and lower discipline in the army overall. Still, with the sheer numbers of troops we can mobilize we should be able to overwhelm and possibly even envelope enemy armies.
Sizable Land Reform

Despite resistance from the landowning class we have been able to implement the full version of our land reform. The massive estates of the largest landowners have been greatly broken up and land has been given to many German peasants, by means of a random lottery. We have already noticed an sizable increase in not only productivity in all sectors of the economy, but also a notable increase in the urbanization of our country. Hopefully this trend continues and brings us prosperity.
Minor Land Reform

Despite resistance from the landowning class we have been able to enact a scaled back version of our land reform. The massive estates of the largest landowners have been scaled back and some land has been given to a few German peasants, by means of a random lottery. We have already noticed an increase in not only productivity in all sectors of the economy, but also a small increase in the urbanization of our country. Hopefully this trend continues and brings us prosperity.
The Hollowing - §RApocalyptic§!

In what is the culmination of a series of mistakes and mismanagement, a famine known as the Hollowing is devastating our country. Factories and villages lie abandoned either due to everyone perishing, or them leaving to try and find salvation. Only the government is barely functioning due to the lack of staff which, while saving money, limits our ability to give any relief to our people. Our people are also leaving in what might be the largest mass migration in recent history, hoping to escape our fallow lands and seek a better life anywhere.
The Hollowing - §uCatastrophic§!

A disaster unlike any other has struck our land. A famine, known as the Hollowing, is bringing ruin to our country. Factories are barely operational and capable workers are scarce. Villages and towns have been decimated by the famine as well as disease from the overwhelming dead. Many functions of government have been reduced which is saving some money at least. Finally, our people are leaving in droves, hoping to seek refuge somewhere away from this terrible famine.
The Hollowing - §YSevere§!

Despite various efforts a famine, known as the Hollowing, is widespread in our country. Factories are severely understaffed as capable workers search for food wherever they can find it. Villages and towns cannot handle the amount of dead coming in and disease is starting to spread in our country as well. Various functions of government are being reduced due to a lack of staff which limits our ability to respond to the crisis. A large amount of our people are also leaving, trying to escape The Hollowing and we can only wish them the best of luck.
The Hollowing - §SConcerning§!

A paralyzing famine, known as The Hollowing, has noticeably begun to affect our country. Workers are either becoming too weak to work or have been neglecting their jobs in the search for food. Some functions of government are reduced due to some employees not showing up for whatever reason. A noticeable amount of people are also leaving our country hoping to escape this famine. We can only hope relief comes soon.
The Hollowing - §GManageable§!

Thanks to various efforts, the damage caused by The Hollowing has been minimized. While widespread hunger still remains in our country the paralyzing famine has been successfully curtailed. Factories and workers continue to operate at normal efficiency from before The Hollowing and all functions of government are operating as normal. While some people are still leaving, at least it is in manageable amounts.
§RApocalyptic§! Hollowing

The Hollowing is fully devastating this province. Factories and villages lie abandoned either due to everyone perishing, or them leaving to try and find salvation. Our people are also leaving in what might be the largest mass migration in recent history, hoping to escape these fallow lands and seek a better life anywhere. We can only hope that this does not spread further.
Catastrophic Hollowing

The Hollowing, is bringing ruin to this province. Factories are barely operational and capable workers are scarce. Villages and towns have been decimated by the famine as well as disease from the overwhelming dead. Finally, our people are leaving in droves, hoping to seek refuge somewhere away from this terrible famine. hopefully this does not spread further for the sake of our people.
Severe Hollowing

The Hollowing, is widespread in this province. Factories are severely understaffed as capable workers search for food wherever they can find it. Villages and towns cannot handle the amount of dead coming in and disease is starting to spread in our country as well. A large number of our people are trying to escape The Hollowing and flee into other provinces. Hopefully this does not cause issues for our other provinces
Concerning Hollowing

The Hollowing has noticeably begun to affect this province. Workers are either becoming too weak to work or have been neglecting their jobs in the search for food. Some functions of government are reduced due to some employees not showing up for whatever reason. A noticeable amount of people are also leaving our country hoping to escape this famine. We can only hope relief comes soon.
Manageable Hollowing

The Hollowing has struck this province but luckily the damage has been minimized. While widespread hunger still remains in the province, paralyzing famine has otherwise been successfully curtailed. Factories and workers continue to operate at normal efficiency from before The Hollowing. While some people are still leaving the province, at least it is in manageable amounts.
Scars of the Hollowing

The Hollowing has finally passed from this province, but the damage it inflicted still remains. Relief is being handed to try and help those who need it, however some people are still leaving the province to try and find a more stable life elsewhere.
Pacifist Nobles

The disease that is pacifism has now reached the highest echelons of our government. These nobles are now hamstringing any attempt to expand our army under the idea that a weak army will prevent the Emperor from starting any new wars. At the very least it will make any future war harder, but if they think it will stop us then they have another thing coming.
Neglected Reichsarmee

We have found ourselves at war, however since the time following the First Great German War, our once proud Reichsarmee is merely a shadow of its former self. The troops are poorly trained, supplies are few, and the draft rolls are severely outdated. Unfortunately, we are not in a position to remedy this issue and we must fight with the army we have, hopefully the spirit of Wenceslas V, the old Stone Emperor, will carry his army once more to victory.
The Second Great German War

Despite all efforts at peace, war has broken out in Central Europe once again. This conflict once again sees the Holy Roman Emperor try to centralize the Empire while our forces and Scandinavia try to stop him to protect our interests. Our army, while already powerful, has been further augmented by an expanded draft roll which will serve us well as we cross the whole Germany. We must put an end to the mad Emperor’s delusions and bring freedom to the German states trapped under his yoke
The Second Great German War

Despite all efforts at peace, war has broken out in Central Europe once again. This conflict once again sees the Holy Roman Emperor try to centralize the Empire while our forces and Burgundy try to stop him to protect our interests. We have spent the time since the First Great German War training our troops and in combination with an expanded draft roll we can now field one of the most capable armies in Europe. We must put an end to the mad Emperor’s delusions and bring freedom to the German states trapped under his yoke
The Second Great German War

Despite all efforts at peace, war has broken out in Central Europe once again. This conflict once again sees the Holy Roman Emperor try to centralize the Empire while the forces of Scandinavia and Burgundy try to stop him to protect their interests. The call has gone out across the country and our people are lining up at the draft offices to fight and die for our Emperor. Anything less than victory will mean the end of our Empire.
The Burgundian-Scandinavian Occupation

Our defeat in the Second Great German War has resulted in the effective occupation of our country by the victorious forces of our enemy. This occupation serves to defang us and maintain order, and while embarrassing, it is needed for the sake of stability in our country following the end of the Holy Roman Empire. Nevertheless we should aim to end the occupation as soon as possible for the sake of our own legitimacy.
A Shattered Army

With the fall of the Holy Roman Empire also came the fall of our army. Our once experienced officer corp has been gutted with many going to other German states to head their new armies. Our soldiers are ill prepared and equipped and our draft rolls are terribly out of date. Until we are in a better position to reform the army we will have to manage with what we have, but we should have no illusions that our days of glory are behind us for now.
Neither Roman nor German

The “Holy Roman Empire of the German Nation” has for centuries been divided between cultural worlds, and this problem has not gone away even after our consolidation. Torn between traditional monarchists on the one hand and separatist nationalists on the other, we must develop a coherent national identity or else we will crumble.
A Disorganized Economy

Infrastructure is lacking, business is dominated by a handful of old merchant families, and commerce conducted with all manner of coinage given our lack of a national standard. Our economy is in disarray and we will have to labor to restore it, and make it better than it was before.
A Growing Economy

Infrastructure is lacking and business is dominated by a handful of old merchant families, though the introduction of a single national currency has helped to stabilize the situation. Our economy is regaining its footing but it has yet to reach its full potential.
The Second German Revolution!

The Revolution has returned to Germany! Once again the republican banners wave, once again the fallschwertmaschinen blades drop upon the enemies of the people. And once again we take up the sword of Germania against reaction! We will not rest until the Revolution is victorious!
Restaffing the Foreign Office

With the fall of the Holy Roman Empire we have had to try to figure out how to entangle the new diplomatic situation in Germany. However our diplomatic corp was severely neglected during the early reign of Sigismund and we have only just begun to restaff our offices. Until we fully staff and train our offices we will be at a disadvantage when it comes to the diplomatic field and it will be harder for us to not only expand, but maintain our sphere of influence.
The Czech National Revival

What long seemed like a fringe movement has now blown up into a whole new movement towards the recognition of a separate Czech identity and a single Czech language purged of German influence. Already this has seemed to spark a renaissance of the Czech language with many books, plays, and speeches being created. This movement is causing a lot of friction in our country and is fueling the drive for even greater reforms that may destabilize our realm.
A Quality Army

In adherence with the advice of our German officers we have implemented reforms towards the creation of an elite army of highly disciplined troops with the finest equipment. This has resulted in us excluding many from the draft pool who do not meet our high standards and not only that but is also taxing our ability to keep supplying our troops. Overall while this army may be more costly, financial wise, it should prove more than ready in any conflict.
A Compromise Army

We have tried to meld the advice of our German officers and Czech soldiers to create an army that straddles the ideas of Quality and Quantity. Overall this has resulted in more benefits than negatives, but it compared to what the army could have been many feel that the results are only sub-par.
A Mobilized Army of Quantity

In adherence with the advice from our Czech soldiers we have implemented reforms towards the idea of expanding our draft pools to focus on mobilization for our army. We have also reformed the supply corp in order to better field these troops, however it has come at the cost of lower cohesion amongst army groups and lower discipline in the army overall. Still, with the sheer numbers of troops we can mobilize we should be able to overwhelm and possibly even envelope enemy armies.
The Unshakable Autocracy

With the removal of the Diets all political power has now been centralized under the rule of the Emperor. With this power also comes a new wave of repression in order to stamp down on any dissent as well as any movement  towards reform. While this has stymied the growth of new ideas it has still proven effective in solidifying the role of the Emperor as the helmsman of the state.
The Breakdown

Ever since The Great Defenestration of Prague the political situation in Bohemia has been gradually deteriorating. However, now all effective control of the country has broken down. The issues we hoped to solve between the Czechs and Germans as well as the Catholics and Protestants have greatly inflamed and street violence is commonplace now. The only means of control the government has is with various loyal mitlitas, however this loyalty is very tenuous and may also break down as the crisis unfolds.
The Eternal Regency

Now that the Breakdown is over the time to decide a new Emperor is upon us. However, with so many German families with so many more cadet branches there has been an endless debate on which German noble should succeed to the throne. Everytime a candidate appears to be decided, the Regent adjourns the debate and by the time it reconvenes the debate is back to square one. Until a new Emperor is decided the Regency council will continue to rule so long as the Regent endures.
The Czech National Resurgence

After centuries of Germanic rule at long last we have created an independent Czech state. Now we must work towards the promotion of Czech culture and Czech language. Our nation is still young and we must work to remove German influence in our country in order to truly recover from the scars forced upon us by our old masters.
Uncontrolled Rioting

In the aftermath of the recent language decision the Czechs of Prague have been driven into a fury over the treatment of their tongue. The Czech militias that once secured the city have turned a blind eye towards the violence being committed and many people are trying to flee to escape the chaos. German militia are being sent in to try and contain the riots but until then Prague will be a battlefield.
Woes of Industry
Strong Princes
Strong Clergy
Old Liberties
The Wasted North
Urban Planning
Rhenish Paternalism
Repopulating the Countryside
The Royal North Sea Company
The Eidgenossenschaft

The Swiss Confederacy is a collection of cantons bound together by what should be an oath of mutual alliance. However this oath has been tested and found to be lacking, be it with the western cantons and their alliance with Burgundy or the functionally independent Grey League in the East. However, for all its faults the oath still gives us stability and keeps our population happy - and for now that is all we need.
A Struggle for Survival
We are engaged in a battle for the fate of our nation and our people and will make whatever sacrifices are necessary for victory!
A Struggle for Survival
We are engaged in a battle for the fate of our nation and our people and will make whatever sacrifices are necessary for victory!

column1: ### Holy Roman Empire as Coded by Attalus

column2: Vereinigung des Heiligen Römischen Reichs

After almost a thousand years, the legacy of Karl der Große, the so-called ‘Father’ of Europe has left a profound mark on Western & Central Europe. Despite centuries of discord and strife that followed after, his legacy endured even in the disastrous XIXth century that saw the near dissolution of our institutions from the Dahlke’s scourge and the so-called “Great Powers” that threatened to rip our demesne apart.\nBut alas! The dust has settled, with many of Germany’s princes brought to the fold through negotiation or by force. The Reich is now complete. However, the Reichstag and the pro-military Geheimrat are still at odds on the matter of executive Imperial power, with the former backing constitutionalism while the latter seeks to entrench power in the hands of the Emperor. In the end, as always, the Emperor has the final say. After an intense night of contemplation following solemn ceremonies at the Prager Reichschloss, he inevitably writes down in his diary what could be one of the decisive moments of the Empire, and perhaps even his life:
”...Too much power alone corrupts - it shall be given to my subjects, esteemed servants of the Reich...”
”All I have done to preserve the Empire - it is MY destiny, from MY achievement alone - MY Reich…”
The $YEAR$ Convocation of the Reichstag

While the new Reichstag has convinced most of the Imperial elites of the goodwill of the Emperor, it will have to significantly reform the state if the Empire wishes to survive. The Reichstag is still firmly divijded on the matter of the §RDie Aushöhlung§, for the Republican hydra feeds upon the misery of the masses. However, the Army is still a patchwork of the various princely forces, the economy still bound by various tariffs and different scales and the Empire is hardly supported by the Intelligentsia. Until all those are resolved, the Holy Roman Empire will hardly be able to wield its power in Europe and perhaps, all over the globe.
We stand firm amidst all adversity!
The Imperial Capital

With the Empire now solidified thanks to Sigismund declarations, the time has come to select a new Imperial capital. Prague has served the Jagiellons well, but keeping the court here would only strengthen the arguments by German nationalists and Republicans that the Empire is still a Bohemian project first and foremost. Three candidates have been identified : Frankfurt of course was the city where all Jagiellon emperors were crowned following their elections, and while the memories of the Revolution still endure, placing the capital here will help strengthen the unity of the German nation. Meanwhile Nuremberg has hosted the Imperial Regalia since the Hussite wars, and the tragic fire of 1839 makes the city perfect for a new urban plan fitting for the Imperial capital. Meanwhile Regensburg was the city where the Reichstag was hosted permanently since the XVIIth century, and choosing the city would prove the continuity of the Empire.
Frankfurt, the heart of the German nation
Nuremberg, to heal the wounds of the Empire
Regensburg, the confirmed seat of the Reichstag
The Problems of the Empire

The Unification of the Empire has proven harder than what we envisioned. The North has suffered particularly from the Hollowing and the latest war, with the agriculture disrupted once more and the Elbians looking for better opportunities elsewhere. Meanwhile the Industrial cities of the Rhine were deeply linked with Burgundy, urban misery is thus common as factories closed and the industrialists unsure of our new policies. To top these two problems, the Empire remains a patchwork of different entities that hardly work together : the bishoprics are protected by the Papacy while commonly hated by their subjects, the Free Cities and the Swiss Confederation hardly adhere to the Monarchy while the Great Princes of the Empire hardly bow to the Imperial Recesses and the acts of the Diet.
The real work begins now!
The Political Clubs

One of the important changes of the latest Imperial constitution was the guarantee of freedom of expression and association. While originally demanded by the princes and the aristocracy to avoid censorship and autocratic power, it has also empowered various political clubs in the common classes. While Republicans are still forced to go underground by various political suppression policies, Gesellschaften der Freunde der Freiheit und Gleichheit (Friends of the Liberty and Equality clubs) have flourished in nearly all important cities of the Empire, while “Hermannssöhne”, in reference to Arminius, the legendary Germanic chief who defeated the Romans, have mostly focused on riling up the minds of disgruntled peasants and soldiers. While some have already been suppressed because of Republican speeches heard by police agents in infiltration, the task of suppressing all of those clubs would be too arduous for our state at the moment.
We can only hope they remain unimportant.
The Relief Petition

”Seven hundred human beings were driven from their homes in one day and set adrift on the world, to gratify the caprice of one who, before God and man, deserved less consideration than the lowest of them...The horrid scenes I then witnessed I shall take to my grave. The wailing of women - the screams and terror of children - the speechless agony of honest men - wrung tears of grief from all. The landlords in a circle all around warned their tenantry, with threats of direct vengeance, against the humanity of extending to any of them the hospitality of a single night's shelter” - Pastor Hans Kasper\nThe consequences of §RDie Aushöhlung§ continue to weigh heavily on the Empire, and the Liberty and Equality clubs have organized a petition to be signed by all their members in the whole country to be sent to the Reichstag to take action against §RDie Aushöhlung§ and especially the entrenched and unflinching aristocracy with their old ways.
The issue is complicated, the Reichstag will act in due time.
Krieg um Land

”When a man takes a farm from which another has been evicted, you must shun him on the roadside when you meet him, you must shun him in the streets of the town, you must shun him at the shop-counter, you must shun him in the fair and at the marketplace, and even in the house of worship. You must shun him with your detestation of the crime he has committed. If the population of a county in Germany carry out this doctrine, that there will be no man who would dare to transgress your unwritten code of laws.”- Wolfgand “Hermann” Keitel, head of the Hermannssöhne in Oldenburg\nThe lack of action by the Reichstag on the Hollowing issues has led to an increase of actions by political clubs and parties throughout Germany : boycotts, demonstrations against evictions, destruction of aristocratic properties have multiplied in what militants call the “Land War”.
We must act!
Republican Outrage

The people are beginning to fear that the Imperial Government is merely a machinery for their destruction... that it is unable, or unwilling, to take a single step for the prevention of famine, for the encouragement of manufactures, or providing fields of industry, and is only active in promoting, by high premiums and bounties, the horrible manufacture of crimes!- “Die Frankfurter Zeitung”\nThe recent reform of the Reichstag has enraged the Republicans throughout the country who consider that the failure to act upon the misery of the campaigns shows the unwillingness of the government to go against the Landlords and the aristocracy power.
It is difficult, you know!
The Relief Petition Returns to the Reichstag

”Unto the Honourable Reichstag of the German Nation assembled, the Petition of the undersigned, their suffering countrymen, That we, your petitioners, dwell where merchants are noted for enterprise, whose manufacturers are skilled, and whose workmen are proverbial for their industry. The land itself is goodly, the soil rich, and the temperature wholesome
column3: it is well suited for commerce
column5: in facility of internal communication it is peerless…Yet with all these advantages, and with every disposition and capacity to exploit them, we find ourselves overwhelmed with public and private suffering.” - Beginning of the Relief Petition\nOnce more the Clubs have organized a demonstration in $CAPITAL$ to bring a petition signed by more than 1 million Imperial subjects - or so they claim. The Reichstag has accepted the petition but has refused to table it for debate until more “pressing issues” are dealt with.

column2: The people will understand surely.
The Banquet Scandal

After the Relief Bill demonstration, rumors abound among the crowd that huge shipments of food had been seen going to the Imperial Palace. Rumors were confirmed by agents within the Palace that the Emperor was hosting the various ambassadors in Europe with a huge banquet to celebrate the new pregnancy of his wife. While state decorum may be important and understood even by the beggars, the news of this debauchery of food and luxuries while the plight of the German people went unheard electrified the crowd who took to the streets and soon began to overwhelm the police and the military forces in the capital.
”Do you hear the people sing? Singing the song of angry men?”
Riots in $CAPITAL$

The Chaos that followed the Banquet riot did not stop after a few hours. Citizens of the capital joined with whatever weapons they could find and began to requisition all guns and arms from depots they stormed. Sigismund had already fled when the rioters crossed the gates of the palace while trampling the bodies of the White Guard as did many of the members of the Reichstag when a woman delegation broke into the Reichstag building to demand a direct vote on the Relief Bill. The situation has yet to calm in the Capital as everyone wonders what will follow.
Dear God!
A Great Disorder

The tensions in the Empire have eventually ended with rioters throughout the country rising against the establishment. Citizens of the capital joined with whatever weapons they could find and began to requisition all guns and arms from depots they stormed. Emperor Sigismund had already fled when the rioters crossed the gates of the palace while trampling the bodies of the Weisse Garde. Many of the Reichstag members had done the same when a woman delegation broke into the Reichstag building to demand a direct vote on the Relief Bill. The situation has yet to calm in the Capital as everyone wonders what will follow.
”Is it a revolt?” “No, Your Imperial Majesty, it is a revolution…”
The Proclamation of the Second Imperial Republic of the German Nation

”In the first year of Liberty, the Reichstag of the German Nation unanimously decrees that the monarchy is abolished and the Reichsrepublik proclaimed…”\n\nAs the storming of $CAPITAL$ left a vacuum of power, the Liberal leaders of the Reichstag along with militants of the Friends of Liberty and Equality have begun to organize a new government. The Zentrales Revolutionskomitee alongside the new Reichstag was filled with Radical leaders that had arrived in the capital before the riots. The Imperial Republic of the German Nation has been reborn! Throughout the country, new mayors are elected while old authorities are forced to flee or accept the new order. As the Fallschwertmaschienen return to Germany, the delegates are drafting a new Constitution and issuing decrees - but already the monarchist threat rises in Bohemia, where Sigismund has rallied the Crownlands, where liberal societies were less popular and the Hollowing less brutal.
Flamme auf und hoch, revolutionäre Flamme!
The Provisional Imperial Government-in-Exile in Prague

The capital has been consumed in a maelstrom of revolutionary madness. Thankfully Emperor Sigismund V and the royal family have been able to escape before city was overrun. He has now returned to Prague where he has assembled his loyalists against the Revolution.
God save the Emperor!
Das Entlastungsdekret

As the Revolution was initiated due to starvation across Germany, it is imperative that we address the immediate needs of the people before proceeding with any other business. To that end the Zentrales Revolutionskomitee has proclaimed the Entlastungsdekret (Relief Decree). Any remaining forms of manorialism and serfdom have been abolished, special tax privileges have been dissolved and made illegal, private hunting spaces have been declared public, and most importantly, all export of foodstuffs beyond the borders of the Imperial Republic have been banned. Police can now search merchant’s storages on suspicion of hoarding and any hoarders of any type of foodstuff, or those proven to be conducting or to have conducted the exportation of food, shall be liable to summary execution by Fallschwertmaschine. The Decree has also organized local committees to distribute food, chiefly bread, beneath the auspices of the new Zentrale Hilfskommission (Central Relief Commission).
The people demand bread and bread they shall have!
The Second Declaration of the Rights of Man and Citizen

“The German people...have resolved to set forth in a solemn declaration the natural, inalienable, and sacred rights of man, that all citizens may always take the direction of the welfare of all and never be debased by oppression and tyranny. In consequence, the Reichstag recognizes and declares the following rights of man and citizen. 1. Men are born and remain free and equal in rights. Social distinctions derive only from public utility. 2. The aim of every political association is the preservation of the natural and imprescriptible rights of man. These rights are liberty, equality, security, resistance to oppression and the pursuit of Happiness. 3. The source of all sovereignty is essentially in the nation : no body, no individual can exercise authority that does not proceed from it. 4. Liberty consists in the power to do anything that does not injure others : accordingly, the exercise of the natural rights of each man has no limits except those that secure to the other members of society the enjoyment of these same rights.”
Insurrection to defend these rights is the most sacred right and duty.
Secularization of the Imperial Republic

The next measure of the Reichstag was the forced secularization of the Church holdings throughout the Empire, meant to provide more financial means to the state while also weakening the hold of the Catholic Church in the Republic. Tithes were made illegal, allowances to church officials were ended, strict revenue caps were imposed upon the clergy, and all lands held by the Catholic Church or any of its ecclesiastical officials were seized by the state. The fate of these lands would be determined at a later date but for the moment all citizens were permitted to farm and hunt upon them as needed. As a direct consequence of this measure, all Prince-Bishops were removed from power, much to the joy of the citizens of Wurzburg, Osnabrück, Basel, and Salzburg.
They can not serve two masters, so let them serve Rome.
Abolition of the Princedoms

”To establish the Constitution, is for us, rebuild and regenerate the State. We cannot be beholden to the old state of things, when it is possible to build better bases. There would not be any regeneration if nothing changed, it is thus our duty to not simply rebuild with some adjustments but to regenerate the whole of the Nation by breaking the feudal provinces and princedoms and establish new administrative units which will help liberty flourish instead of the old prejudices…”\nFollowing the works of the Committee headed by Franz Engels, deputy from Berg, the National Reichstag has decreed that all former divisions of the Empire are null and void, and that all princes of the Empire lose their sovereignty to their former subjects. A new administrative map composed of roughly equal Kreise is drafted by the Assembly, while citizen guards have begun to expel princes from their property if they refused the decree.
Down with the feudal nonsense!
The Workers’ Debate

“Territorial and military feudalism has disappeared and financial feudalism must disappear as well. The power of money, the money aristocracy, is at stake.” - Ludwig Weiss, representative of the Köln workers\nThis Revolution is not the same as the one that shook Europe in 1790. The plight of the poor has become even more vivid, and as socialist criticism of republicans circulates amongst workers and intellectuals, some argue that a Social Revolution must accompany the political one. Already the Stadtausschüsse (city committees) have split between socialist and bourgeois representatives. The first demand is an end to urban misery through higher taxes for the urban rich alongside new national state-subsidised workshops to give the poor work and avoid idleness. However, the representatives of the industrial magnates propose that the government leaves the market alone, ensuring a greater prosperity in the years to come, or so they say.
The Republic will be “social” or it simply will not be!
Property is a natural right - it said so in the Erklärung.
The Prague Declaration

”We the Imperial Majesty of the Holy Roman Empire of the German Nation, Convinced that the sane and major portion of the German people abhor the excesses of the faction which dominates it, and that they anticipate their liberation, call upon and invite them to return without delay to the path of reason, justice, order, and peace. In accordance with these views, We, the undersigned, declare : 1. That all measures promulgated through the Imperial Assembly since the initial disturbance were in contravention of Imperial law, and thus are null and void. 2. That all members of the National Guard who shall fight against the Imperial Army and its allies…shall be treated as enemies and punished as rebels to their Emperor and as disturbers of the public peace. 3. That all Imperial subjects who may dare to defy Our troops and fire on them, either in the open country or through windows, doors, and openings in their houses, shall be punished immediately according to the most stringent laws of war, and their houses shall be burned or destroyed…”
There is but a single lord of the German people and it is Us!
The Hamburg Negotiations

Emperor Sigismund V has been deposed by a revolution  - no, by THE Revolution, a Revolution of pan-German nationalist republicans bearing the torch of Marinus Dahlke. The Jagiellons have retreated to the Bohemian Crown Lands to prepare for a battle for the fate of Germany, but the Emperor does not wish to fight alone. Therefore his agents have arrived in Hamburg for a secret conference with representatives from Burgundy and Scandinavia. The Imperial representatives have declared that Sigismund is willing to make territorial concessions in northern and western Germany to both of our nations in exchange for their support in crushing the Revolution. Given that these Revolutionaries pose a clear and present danger to our realms as well, this seems like an advantageous arrangement…though of course it will also inaugurate yet another cataclysmic war.
An interesting proposal.
Das Vaterland ist in Gefahr!

”Citizens, the Motherland is in Danger, besieged by the specter of tyranny and foreign oppression. The tocsin you hear today is not an alarm but an alert : it sounds the charge against our enemies.”\n\nThe Ultimatum of the former Emperor Sigismund has alarmed the Republicans throughout Germany, and already flocks of patriots have signed up to enlist in the Army and fight back the forces of Reaction. However, rumors of Burgundian and Scandinavian intervention have also transpired to our liberal friends in the rest of Europe, and it seems that another Great German War is upon us. The Fallschwertmaschienen await our enemies…
Remain audacious and be audacious, and the Republic will be saved!
The Republican Weights and Measures

Overshadowed by the Prague Declaration and the national mobilization process, the National Assembly has continued its work and has effectively worked on implementing a new system of weights and measures. Thankfully, Etruria hosted numerous Republican thinkers and scientists following the Death of the Republic and they worked with their Italian brothers on a new universal system, the metric system. While the transition will take years, educational pamphlets and conversion tables are already printed to be distributed throughout the country. A new calendar is also surprisingly being worked upon, with many deputies agreeing to the idea of a complete break with the Ancien Regime.
Work must continue even in war…
The Imperial Reclamation War

With the restoration of the Imperial Republic and the regrouping of loyalist and Czech elements of the Reichsarmee in Bohemia, Sigismund has begun conspiring with the monarchies of Scandinavia and Burgundy to assist him in re-asserting his tyrannical rule over Germany at the expense of outrageous “territorial appeasements”! Empowered by these, the deposed upstarts have announced their intention to wage war to restore “order” to our lands! The time has come! The servants of the Fatherland stand ready to face the threat once again!
Ihr kräftigen Diener des Vaterlandes, haltet fest!
Panic in Germany!

Observers have witnessed the reformation of the so-called “Imperial Republic of the German Nation” in Germany, with many perceived Imperial loyalists, nobility, and even rumors of $COUNTRY_ADJ$ nationals being put to death by the Fallschwertmaschine! The Republican Blutfahne is raised once more in towns and cities throughout Germany after the deposition of the Emperor in Prague. The Imperial German envoy in $CAPITAL$ has reportedly begged on his knees in front of our $MONARCH_TITLE$ requesting outright military intervention in Germany to depose the “barbaric” republicans. With both the public outraged by the quick succession of events and the government wary of the potential instability, we have no choice but to fulfill our duty to quell the German menace. We cannot allow another Dahlke to scythe through the fields of Europe and spread the revolutionary plague to our people for the second time this century!
These rebel scum shall be beaten once more!
The Third Great German War

”Lay the proud usurpers low! Tyrants fall in every foe! Liberty's in every blow! Let us do or die.” - from ‘Germania’s Call’ by Gilbert Broun, Scottish poet and personal friend of Marinus Dahlke\n\nThe impossible has proven itself possible : Emperor Sigismund V has repeated the sins of his fathers, and the Imperial Republic of the German Nation has been resurrected by the Reichstag. The “Alten Regime” denounced this declaration, with Burgundy and Scandinavian preparing to assist Pro-Jagiellion Royalist forces in Bohemia to “restore order” in Germany. Together they have formed a new anti-radical coalition, reminiscent of olden times, with the sole goal of crushing the rebel upstarts. Observers are universal in their assessment that is is the start of a conflict unparalleled in the history of warfare. The Revolutionary Hydra has resurfaced. However, can it best its predecessor and fulfill Dahlke’s dreams of a liberal and free Europe?
So sei es!
The Montmorency Manifesto

The Dual Monarchy has observed with interest and anguish the recent Imperial developments. If many rejoiced at the troubles in Germany and a weakening of the Empire at first, the Republican Revolution and its massacres of priests and nobles has made the government wary of Republican successes. Following the latest reports about the defeats of the Imperial armies against the Republicans in Bohemia, the War Minister, François-Charles de Montmorency has issued with the tacit agreement of the King a manifesto demanding that the Emperor be left untouched. The document promises a violence never seen before against the Republicans otherwise, if any harm were to occur to His Imperial Majesty.
We only seek to preserve Sigismund’s safety.
The Montmorency Manifesto

”His Majesty the King of England and France and his government declare that they regard the actual situation of His Imperial Majesty the Holy Roman Emperor as a matter of communal interest for all sovereigns of Europe. The subjects of His Imperial Majesty shall be required to place that prince in full and complete liberty, and to assure to him the inviolability required by his Majesty. If the least violence be offered to their Majesties, and if their safety and their liberty are not immediately assured, the government of his Majesty will inflict an ever memorable vengeance by delivering over the Imperial subjects to military execution and complete destruction, and the rebels guilty of the said outrages to the punishment that they merit…”\nOur successes in Bohemia have angered the Dual Monarchy which now dares to threaten us if we deliver Sigismund to the justice he is due.
The rumors were true! §RALL OF EUROPE IS AGAINST US!§
The Capture of Citizen Sigismund Jagiellon

After a series of successes in Bohemia, the Republican armies have entered Prague where the traitor and tyrant Sigismund was hiding. After the assault on the old Castle of Prague, Sigismund accepted peace and was turned over to the Republican authorities. The news of his capture alongside his call to stop the fighting has made the Royalist armies shatter, with many Royal Czech and German forces abandoning the fighting to come back to their villages. A few have even defected to our cause!.
A great victory over tyranny!
The Execution of the Last Holy Roman Emperor

”One cannot reign innocently : the insanity of doing so is evident. Every monarch is a rebel and a usurper.” - Anton Tassing, Consul of the National Assembly\n\nThe escort of Citizen Jagiellon to Frankfurt was swift and his trial even more so. Accused of a lengthy list of crimes, among them conspiracy with foreign enemies, orders to bring war to its own people and refusal to accept the new national assembly, the former Emperor hardly tried to defend himself, preferring to stay mute for much of the process. The Assembly, alarmed by the War and knowing that Sigismund would be a liability for the Republic, overwhelmingly voted for his execution. He was thus today brought to the newly renamed Freiheit Plaza, where masses gathered to assist in his execution by Fallschwertmaschine. His last words to the crowd were lost because of the sound of drums, but he died a dignified death according to most witnesses.
Be brave, Sigismund, the whole universe looks upon you!
The Execution of the Emperor

The execution of Emperor Sigismund V by the horrible Fallschwertmaschine has horrified and outraged the Anglois court. No monarch has ever died by the hands of the common people in the history of Europe, certainly not a sovereign seen by much of Christendom as the closest spiritual heir of both Charlemagne and Caesar Augustus. Now it seems that everything is possible, and the worst nightmares of the ruling class of the continent are invading the waking world. As the Montmorency Manifesto had declared, the Anglois troops have mobilized to end this abomination in Central Europe and bring back order.
For the memory of the Emperor! DEUS VULT!
The Reactionaries of $FROM$ Declare War!

The Anglois government, outraged by our recent actions, has joined the new Coalition in their efforts to destroy our revolutionary government. As a realm built upon the hereditary power of the Anglois ruling class and the support of the Catholic Church, few members of the Zentrales Revolutionskomitee are surprised by this development. If we can topple the Anglois behemoth then one of the greatest bastions of reaction in Europe shall fall. We must strike them down!
We knew the risks and accept their challenge!
Victory over Burgundy

The Burgundian monarchy, this vulture which has preyed upon Germany for all their history, is now vanquished, and the Parliamentarians' opponents to King Jean have already welcomed us with open arms. Now the Reichstag and the Komitee must decide Burgundy’s fate. After all, Burgundy was part of the Holy Roman Empire since their elevation to a Kingdom, and many Germanic people reside within their borders. The most simple solution would be the seizure of the Rhineland and Elsass while guaranteeing a unified Burgundy their independence. Another possibility would be to also seize the Dutch territories of Frisia and Holland, for they share language and culture with us. Or we could also dismantle Burgundy completely, with new puppet republics in Brabant, Wallonia and Lorraine or even integrate the Brabant territories within the Republic. However, the dismantlement of Burgundy will likely tarnish our standing on the world stage and embolden the monarchist regimes in pursuing imperialist affairs overseas.
The Rhineland & Elsass will suffice.
The Dutch, the Rhenish, all estranged Germans must be saved!
An Independent Burgundy is a threat. Establish the République de Bourgogne
Burgundy shall be dismembered to its core!
A New Sister Republic in Anvers!

The streets of Anvers are filled with huddled crowds of common folk and revolutionaries alike, commemorating the foundation of the Burgundian Republic led by radical Parliamentarians. The unveiling of the Fallschwertmaschine at the Grand-Place d'Anvers was a sight that made reactionaries, most of whom were in hiding or had disguised their sympathies, tremble in their shoes. The Royal Coalition is outraged by these developments, calling this as an “illegal” intrusion into Burgundian sovereignty and internal affairs, further spurned by the annexation of territories in Alsace and the Left Bank of the Rhine. Emboldened by these developments, the Revolutionary Hydra continues to wreak havoc on Europe with unceasing momentum.
We salute our new brothers-in-arms!
A New Sister Republic Government in Anvers!

The streets of Anvers are filled with huddled crowds of common folk and revolutionaries alike, commemorating the foundation of the Burgundian Republic led by radical Parliamentarians. The unveiling of the Fallschwertmaschine at the Grand-Place d'Anvers was a sight that made reactionaries, Jeanists alike, most of whom were in hiding or in covert activity tremble in their stomachs. The Royal Coalition is outraged by these developments, calling this as an “illegal intrusion of the highest degree” into Burgundian sovereignty and internal affairs, further spurned by the annexation of territories in Alsace, the Left Bank of the Rhine and the former Dutch crownlands. Emboldened by these developments, the Revolutionary Hydra continues to wreak havoc on Europe with unceasing momentum.
We salute our new brothers-in-arms!
The Peace of Aarhus

Our war with the Imperial Republic has not proceeded the way which we had expected. The Emperor is dead, Burgundy lies defeated and the Republicans now occupy all of Jutland. However a diplomatic envoy in Aarhus has offered us a gracious and honorable peace proposal. They have stated that they shall completely cease all hostilities with Scandinavian forces, returning to status quo ante bellum, so long as we exit the anti-republican coalition.
We cannot risk more bloodshed, we accept!
Our wooden wall will preserve us!
The Snuffing of the Revolutionary Flame

Many thought that liberty would beget man’s desire to be free from the shackles of tyranny and oppression. Such thoughts, as violent and rebellious they are, have proven their weight in the thread of time : The Romans and the countries of the New World were testaments to man’s constant desire for freedom - be it from oppressive tyrants or from foreign powers.\n\nDespite the disastrous conclusion of the Third Great German War, resulting in the restoration of Sigismund to the Imperial Throne and the loss of Imperial crown land, it seems that all of the people’s sacrifices were for naught. For a second time, the Republican Hydra has been subdued. Kill a man, bury an entire country, lay waste upon their land, but the forgone conclusion remains : the idea remains alive. Come may, be it years, decades, even centuries, the spirit of liberty shall endure above all who sought to destroy it in any way or form, whatsoever.
Calm and tradition triumphs over audacity and the ‘illusion’ of free will

Transfer of the Court to Londres

Republican forces have broken through our borders and are already occupying French territories! The Royal Family, having marked well the heartless execution of the former German Imperial monarch, have decided to abandon Paris at the behest of the government and the Conseil du Roi, relocating to London until the threat is over. Shielded by the wooden wall of our grand navy, we shall fight on.
Nous reviendrons!
Return to Paris

With the conclusion of the Coalition War with the Republic, the German revolutionaries have effectively relinquished control of Paris abiding by the treaties laid out by both representatives by the International Concert.
Hélas! Dieu merci!
The Peace of Amiens

Despite the best efforts of our gallant Armee Royale and Marine Royale, and the diligence and resolve of our civil servants, the war situation has developed not necessarily to $COUNTRY$’s advantage. We have been forced to accept an armistice because of the continued occupation of the French metropole, thus confirming the Imperial Republic’s control and the freedom to decide the fate of our former holdings in the European mainland.
Édouard III, forgive us, for we have disgraced your memory…
The Peace of Amiens

With the King of England and France having sought refuge in Londres, France has been occupied for multiple years by our forces. As such we have taken to cultivating republican virtues and enlightened laws amongst the occupied regions. It is time that we impose a peace upon the cowardly Plantagenets by establishing new Republican governments in France. The only question is how exactly this should be done. With the Royal threat in England, most experts agree that a strong French state will manage to quell any revolt and be a reliable ally against the Plantagenets. Yet the Occitans and Bretons also long for liberty, and may agitate and prove seditious if we do not ensure they become independent Republics. And of course, if a unified French state were to rebel in the future, it would prove a formidable enemy.
We must create one, indivisible French Republic.
France and Occitania shall be brothers!
Propose splitting up Occitania and Brittany with France.
Problems in Bohemia and Silesia

The Revolution has arrived in Bohemia, but is yet to be embraced or even tolerate by its people. With a relatively better situation than the rest of Germany, having suffered no Hollowing and its heartland untouched by war, both the German and the Slavic populations continue to resist the new Republican order. The Komitee receive regular reports of agitators tearing down Republican symbols in streets and engaging in fights with Republican sympathizers. Worse, even in rural areas where the Bohemian nobility was never very popular, our enforcement of secularism has brought back bitter memories of persecution amongst the Utraquists, quasi-Catholic disciples of Jan Hus who were brutally attacked by the Church in ages past. Now both Catholics and Utraquists, Germans and Slavs have started devoting signs to the Jagiellons and their hope, Wenceslaus VI Jagiellon, the son of Sigismund we hold in custody until the war concludes.
They will understand the necessity of the Revolution in due time.
Riots Break Out Across Bohemia!

The expansion of reforms into Bohemia have been halted following a general peasant insurrection throughout the former Jagiellon crown lands. Both Slavic peasants and German city-dwellers believe in various rumors : that the Republicans are coming to kill every priest, that the Republicans are planning to divert Bohemian food stores to relieve the Germans from hunger and thus starve the good people of the old crown lands, that every man is to be drafted to die in their unholy war….\nWhile we have indeed tried to sell church lands and had begun to draft citizens and organize food distribution committees in accordance with the  Relief Decree, we never thought that the Czechs and Bohemians would rise in such numbers. §RWe must crush these uprisings, because even losing one province to them would surely mean a general Bohemian uprising.§
A thousand deaths to reaction!
Rise of the Christian and Imperial Army

”Pilseners! Let us march to the flames, without fear!
Let us die for God and the King!
Hail God! Hail God! Hail the King!
 - excerpt from a Weisse Armee song

Republican forces in Pilsen have been ambushed and annihilated by reactionaries and pro-Jagiellon sympathizers, with any survivors subject to reprisals by mob justice. The momentum from this outburst given to reactionary cells in other communities has caused our worst fears to come to pass. The entirety of Bohemia is now under the control of the “Christian and Imperial” Weisse Armee, composed of disgruntled Czech peasantry, the clergy, and both anti-German and reactionary elements of the former Reichsarmee. Their forces have consolidated in Prague, with the goal of creating an independent, Jagiellon-ruled Czech state in concert with covert agents from the royal coalition in the ongoing war.
Ready the Nationalgarde! Prague shall be subdued once more!
Glorious Victory in the Third Great German War

In times past, many said that liberty is an unattainable dream from the heavens above. Some may even shun the dream of liberty, preferring to be enslaved under tyrants with the false sense of security it brings. Yet we have preferred to be relentless and chagrined in our pursuit of liberty, no matter what the cost. As Marinus Dahlke once exhorted, we have chosen “desperation now and safety later,” rather than “safety now and liberty never.”\n\nIn the end, we have achieved more than what Dahlke and the past revolutionaries dreamt to accomplish, a truly free Europe, from Paris to $CAPITAL$, free from the shackles of autocracy and tyranny. Upon news of this glorious victory commoners and patriots alike have taken to the streets in jubilation, celebrating the dawn of a new era of Liberty, Justice, and Equality not just in Germany, but in all of Europe and the world!
Hurrah! Hurrah! Hurrah!
