Revolutionary Trials

”There is no freedom for the enemies of freedom.”\n\nThe old saying of Dahlke has resurfaced in Germany as the Republicans try to secure their hold onto power. Enemies of the Revolution fill the cells of the various legal courts and Frau Fallschwertmaschine is always busy. While far more organized and less discriminating than the principle of “terror as exceptional justice” that accompanied Dahlke’s rise to power, priests preaching against the Republic, nobles trying to emigrate or fight the new authorities, and traders accused of being hoarders compose most of the executed. This bloody order of business has attracted the ire of foreign journalists who are more than happy to frame the Revolution as a massacre going against natural law. But for Republicans, it is yet the only solution and the hopes of the masses of a new order accompany their acts.
Popular government during a revolution is both virtue and terror.
The Patchwork of Princes

It is a well-known fact that since the Great Interregnum of the mid-13th century, the decline of Imperial authority within the Holy Roman Empire of the German Nation has given rise to fragmentation and autonomy within the Imperial Estates. It is unfortunate that these tendencies are by now so well-entrenched that even the purging of foreign influence from the Empire and the renewal of the Jagiellon dynasty has not eliminated them. §RGermany has been claimed but it has not yet been secured. We must avoid the mistakes of our forefathers by addressing the needs of both the people and the nobility while we work to finish reunifying the Empire. It is the wrath of the people which we should fear the most. Even if we appease the Imperial Estates, if we still fail to satisfy the demands of the German people, then we shall invite catastrophe upon us.§
We must press on and succeed where Wenceslaus V failed!
The Imperial Capital

With the Empire now solidified thanks to Emperor Sigismund V, the time has come to select a new Imperial capital. His Imperial Majesty would prefer to remain in Prague. It has served the Jagiellons well, but keeping the court here would only strengthen the arguments by German nationalists and Republicans that the Empire is still a Bohemian project first and foremost. Two alternate candidates have been identified : Nuremberg has hosted the Imperial Regalia since the Hussite wars, and the tragic fire of 1839 makes the city perfect for a new urban plan fitting for the Imperial capital. On the other hand, Regensburg was the city where the Reichstag was hosted permanently since the 17th century, and choosing the city would prove the continuity of the Empire.
§RPrague, for Imperial continuity.§
Nuremberg, to heal the wounds of the Empire.
Regensburg, the confirmed seat of the Reichstag.
Integration of the Saxon Circles

The Imperial Circles are an ancient method of dividing the Empire for administrative purposes. Ever since the Scandinavian invasion in the early 17th century, the northern halves of the Lower Saxon and the Upper Saxon Circles have been held by the Nordics. It was only recently that they were reunified, and time has not been kind to this division. Moreover northeastern Germany in general saw some of the worst fighting during the Great German Wars and was brutally affected by the Hollowing. Add to this the primitive state of its industries and the strength of local Protestantism and the result is that it will likely take time to properly consolidate the area. That is, of course, unless we wish to tackle the old institutions head-on by promulgating a unified Imperial legal code to flatten its old feudalistic laws and practices.
We still have to work for unity…
§RImperial Unity at all costs!§
Integration of the Rhenish Circles

The weakness of prior Emperors allowed the Burgundians to accumulate more and more of the Electoral Rhenish and Lower Rhenish-Westphalian circles. Burgundy relentlessly fostered Protestantism and reckless industrial development within this area, to the detriment of its citizens. The region was also severely affected by the Hollowing, particularly the sections most distant from Burgundian control. Even before Burgundy’s entrance, the area was long divided by a patchwork of prince-bishoprics. It will likely take time to properly consolidate the area. That is, of course, unless we wish to tackle the old institutions head-on by promulgating a unified Imperial legal code to flatten its old feudalistic laws and practices.
We still have to work for unity…
§RImperial Unity at all costs!§
Integration of the Danubian and Franconian Circles

While the Franconian Circle has a long history, the Danubian Circle was created by the combination of the Austrian and the Bavarian Circles in ages past. This region became a hub of anti-Imperial sentiment in recent years, and its nobility still has yet to fully reconcile with Prague. Moreover the influence of the Catholic Church is felt with particular strength here, and while this protected the area from Protestantism during the Reformation, it has now become an obstacle. While the region managed to escape the worst of the Hollowing its infrastructure and economic development still pale in comparison to the Bohemian crown lands. It will likely take time to properly consolidate the area. That is, of course, unless we wish to tackle the old institutions head-on by promulgating a unified Imperial legal code to flatten its old feudalistic laws and practices.
We still have to work for unity…
§RImperial Unity at all costs!§
Integration of the Upper Rhenish and Swabian Circles

The Upper Rhenish and Swabian Circle have long been a battleground of influence between the Emperor and the Burgundians. The region has been particularly divided for most of its history, with the Alpine confederations of the south seeing themselves as quite distinct from their cultural kin to the north. There was particular tension between Bavaria and Wurttemberg over the city of Ulm, which brought the two powers into open conflict more than once during the First Great German War. Even though the region escaped the worst of the Hollowing, its development is still a far cry from that of the Bohemian crown lands, and its nobility have little love for the Emperor. Add to that the influence of more than one Protestant sect within the Circle and the result is that it will likely take time to properly consolidate the area. That is, of course, unless we wish to tackle the old institutions head-on by promulgating a unified Imperial legal code to flatten its old feudalistic laws and practices.
We still have to work for unity…
§RImperial Unity at all costs!§
Judenemazipationsreichgesetz

Germany’s status as a religious battlefield made surmounting sectarianism an important goal of the First German Revolution. While the negotiated end of first the Hussite and later the Religious Wars enshrined the doctrine of “Cuius Regio, Eius Religio,” the Jews were never seen as true equals to Christians. German revolutionaries have always sought to bring all German people under one banner and from the beginning that has included the Jews. After all, they say, what is Yiddish but a German language? The First Revolution placed Jews on an equal legal footing within the Empire, and while those laws were undone in 1820, now the Committee has restored them in the “Imperial Law for Jewish Emancipation.” Furthermore the rebirth of rationalism and humanism across Germany has only emboldened the Reform Judaism movement, which is now surging amongst the Ashkenazim. Several high civil and military posts are being filled by Jews, and young Jewish men, filled with German nationalist fervor, are signing up by the hundreds into the Reichsarmee.
Deytshland iz meyn heymland!
Legacy of Gilbert Braun

Gilbert Braun (born Gilbert Broun) was a Scottish poet who wrote in the Scots vernacular at a time when it was disdained as the language of the peasantry. Historians have since deemed him the "Father of Romanticism," with both his work and his support for traditional language and culture inspiring generations of artists.  While beloved most of all in Scotland, he is also famous in Germany (where he fled during the last years of Ludwig VII’s rule to escape political persecution) for his support of the German Revolution. "Braun'' rewrote "Scots Wha Hae," his patriotic Scottish song setting the traditional tune "Hey Tuttie Tatie" to the lyrics of a speech given by Robert the Bruce before the Battle of Bannockburn in 1314, into “Germania’s Call,” a German nationalist anthem sung by Germania, the female personification of Germany popular with liberals. It was immortalized when German troops sang it before the Battle of Kassel against monarchist forces in 1791, with said battle being the first victory by the Imperial Republic.
Lay the proud usurpers low! Tyrants fall in every foe!
The Imperial Republic of Germany Proposes an Alliance

The Imperial Republic of Germany recently expanded its diplomatic offices within our capital. This morning we learned that this was not an isolated decision - the Germans wish to secure a military alliance with us! The German ambassador arrived this morning to formally make the proposition. As Europe is still dominated by reaction, he argues, its few republics must stick together. Furthermore Italian and German Radicalists have a long history of cooperation and shared values. Shall we accept?
Of course! Let the crowned heads of the world tremble!
This is not in our interests.
The Alpine Pact

$FROM$ and the Imperial Republic of Germany are two of the most notorious republican powers in Europe, and now they have joined forces. A treaty of military alliance has been published in which both powers have pledged to defend one another in the case of outside attack and to “coordinate on central European affairs.” The ties between German and Italian Radicalists go back to at least the 1790s if not earlier and now they have been cemented as political fact. For the first time since the retreat of the Holy Roman Empire from Italy both halves of the Alps have now been reunited, not through a crown but by shared values of liberty, equality, and fraternity.
A pact as strong as steel!
Failure of the Alpine Pact

$FROM$ and the Imperial Republic of Germany are two of the most notorious republican powers in Europe. It has long been speculated that they might seek an alliance with one another against the forces of reaction. However a meeting between their representatives in Florence failed to agree on the terms of the treaty. While both nations have still reaffirmed their commitment to supporting republicanism in Europe, it is doubtful that they shall coordinate their efforts.
We will carry on regardless.
The Second German Revolution

”Oaks shall be rent : the Word shall shatter - Yea, on that fiery day, the Crown, Even the palace walls shall totter, And domes and spires come crashing down.” - Bertolt Perienz, German author and poet\n\nThe Herculean effort of Emperor Sigismund V to lash all of Germany back together under his absolute rule has proven too great a task to accomplish. The common people of Germany, outraged by Prague’s centralization, have taken up arms themselves. What started as a small protest in the village of Bielefield over high grain prices has spiralled into a new Revolution across Germany, with Radicalist posters lining the streets and republican flags hoisted high above the cities.  A National Committee has been organized to lead the revolution and Radicalist author Arnim Heissman made Consul of the reborn German Republic. The ghost of Marinus Dahlke stalks Prague Castle as the Kaiserlichearmee girds itself for yet another revolutionary war.
A thousand deaths to the Radicalist hydra!

Formation of the Deutsche Fortschrittspartei

Dahlkism is once more rearing its ugly head within $FROM$ as a group of exiled German liberals in Venexia have formed the German Progress Party (DFP) led by famous author Reinhard Kapp. This group seeks to overthrow the monarchy, disempower the Catholic Church within Germany, and establish a democratic republic. While we are trying to restrict their presence within the Empire and suppress their literature, smuggling and clandestine publishing networks have made this difficult. The voice of republicanism is growing in Germany and with it the pressure for reforms, if only to satisfy liberal demands.
Gott schütze den Kaiser!
Formation of the Sozialistische Arbeiterpartei Deutschlands

Multiple underground far-left groups have existed within $FROM$ for decades, but one appears to be rising above the rest. The new Socialist Workers’ Party of Germany (DSAP) is far more radical than most socialist parties, calling for a proletarian society governed by the workers’ councils (räte) that have emerged across Germany during its industrialization, especially after the Hollowing. While outside observers have described them as communists, the DSAP rejects this label, preferring instead to describe their policies as “rätesozialismus” or “council socialism.” The suppression of more moderate organizations has stirred many German leftists to see revolutionary means as their only hope of societal change.
Gott schütze den Kaiser!
Formation of the Deutsche Sozialistische Republikanische Partei

The failures of the DSAP and other more extremist left-wing groups have led to fracturing, with one group in particular now ascendant. The German Socialist Republican Party (DSRP) is an alliance between the center-left and dissident members of the far left seeking to organize around social democracy. While moderating Blanquist rhetoric they are vehement in their commitment to secularism, anti-imperialism, economic nationalization, and the abolition of the monarchy. As the government has previously focused on eradicating the far left since the rise of the DSAP, this has allowed the DSRP to fill the power vacuum left by its suppression. Many middle-class Germans who previously saw leftism as a lower-class concept are attracted to the DSRP’s promises of a better life without total societal upheaval, and with few democratic channels to divert this impulse into, the DSRP is becoming the face of anti-government resistance in the Empire.
Gott schütze den Kaiser!
Räte Organize Within the Kaiserlichearmee

The DSRP’s popularity has only continued to advance, and now they have entered a dangerous stage : organization within the military. Many soldiers and sailors have long been dissatisfied by conditions within the Kaiserlichearmee, be it the low pay, abuses from officers, long periods of service, or meager pensions. Now the DRSP has taken to helping the more ideologically-inclined soldiers to organize räte within their units. These councils coordinate political activity, hold educational workshops and lectures, distribute literature, and in at least one case have attempted to organize strikes or even elect their own officers! §RLosing the loyalty of the military is not an option. We must quickly secure the stability of the nation or else the Revolution shall come and find us defenseless.§
Gott…schütze…this is very bad news.
The Final German Revolution

”The German Revolution is nothing but the precursor of another revolution, one that will be greater, more solemn, and which will be the last.” - Gracchus Mendel, ‘Manifesto of Equals,’ 1796\n\nThe Jagiellons’ ruthless centralisation and absolutism has at last gone too far. Recently some Bohemian soldiers stationed in the Rhineland were sent to Essen to put down a strike at a cannery, after a Burgundian worker was fired without pay for daring to ask for injured leave after losing his hand in an accident. It was hoped the cultural differences between soldiers and workers would make solidarity impossible. When ordered to use live rounds against protestors, the soldiers instead shot down their officers! Soon workers’ councils across Germany initiated a general strike, and many soldiers flocked to their defense. Now most of the Empire has been seized by the DSRP under Otto Hayek and Prague must once more fight for its dominion.
§RGOD DAMN YOU! GOD DAMN YOU ALL TO HELL!§
The End of the Thousand Years’ Reich

”The Holy Roman Empire is ruled directly by the Lord God. Otherwise it is impossible to imagine how this state still exists.” - Josef Dubrovin, Russian journalist\nThe weakening of Imperial autocracy has inspired the revolutionary anarchist group known as the People’s Will to strike. As the Emperor and his son the Crown Prince were returning from a visit abroad, an anarchist threw a bomb beneath the imperial carriage, sending it to the ground. The royals emerged unharmed, only for a second assassin to approach them unseen and lob a bomb at the ground while less than a meter away. The resulting explosion killed all three men instantly, and soon after, a Czech nationalist revolt broke out in Moravia and then swept the Bohemian crown lands. All the years of centralization left no ability for the loyalists to regroup, and so the Imperial Circles have been seized by local princes, rogue military officers, and other men of means. This marks the end of over a millennium of Imperial history and Europe shall never be the same again.
Goodnight, Germania.
Olaf Adenauer and Yellow Syndicalism

The Geheime Staatspolizei has witnessed the rapid rise of Olaf Adenauer, a former revolutionary turned informant who has become a famous police administrator. He has pioneered the nationwide use of undercover informants, asserting that the typical plainclothes detectives are insufficient for the modern age. Far more significant, however, are his labor policies. Adenauer may be a staunch monarchist and Catholic but he also believes that the government must work to control unionism if it does not want to allow socialism to grow. In his self-published essay, “On Labor and the Crown,” he has advocated for legalized, police-controlled trade unions and other labor organizations paid stipends by the government - a policy he dubs “yellow syndicalism” (as opposed to “red,” independent and Blanquist groups), and which revolutionaries deride as “police syndicalism.” The essay has become quite popular amongst the bureaucracy, and the Emperor’s cabinet has urged him to support the policy to defuse trade union agitation.
Make it so.
Suicide of DSRP Leader Otto Hayek

Otto Hayek was a notorious trade union activist, a German-Hungarian Jew from Pressburg whose parents later relocated to Vienna. It has been alleged that Hayek, leader of the underground German Socialist Republican Party (DSRP), coordinated bank robberies in foreign countries to finance the DSRP. One judge who claimed to have evidence on Hayek was later found decapitated near a railroad track : it was unclear if it was suicide or murder. Last year Hayek was charged with theft but his trial was postponed twelve times. Recently he was found dead from a gunshot wound in a small house in Ems.  His death has been ruled a suicide but many leftists believe that the police killed him. Fourteen Prague newspapers reported his death as a suicide but eight did not. The distance the bullet had traveled caused the newspaper Der Magdeburger Zeitung to sarcastically propose that Hayek had "a long arm.” Whatever the case his death has sown discord amongst the German left.
I’m shocked. Shocked.
Assassination of Minister of Safety Geert van Richtofen

For years we have been attempting to infiltrate the German Socialist Republican Party (DSRP) and the shadowy SR-Spartakusgruppe, its militant terrorist wing which carries out bombings, assassinations, and robberies across the Empire. Minister of Safety Geert van Richtofen had organized a new group of informants which he believed would finally get us access to the DSRP and the SR-S. This morning he was on his way to his office in his horse-drawn carriage when a bomb was thrown into it! Minister van Richtofen died in an instant. We have already apprehended the assassin, a Czech named Antonin Gottwald. It is believed that notorious revolutionary Heim Bronstein was the plot’s orchestrator. While it is true that Bronstein is the Empire’s most infamous terrorist, unfortunately he is also our highest paid informant! Director of Police Hermann von Kluck has already resigned in fury, as it was over his objections that Bronstein had been hired in the first place.
What a horrid affair!
Formation of the Weissebund

”The Holy German cause is the extermination of the rebels. You know who they are and where to find them.” - Karl Gustav Schwaub, White League founder\n\nWith radical leftism continuing to plague Europe, some are fighting back. Karl Gustav Schwaub, an industrialist and leader of the monarchist League of Virtue, and Walter von Manstein, creator of the All-German Union, have joined forces under the umbrella of the White League. The White League, in broader terms, describes many organizations united around anti-Semitism, monarchism, Catholic ultramontanism, and German supremacism. They defend the Emperor as the holy emissary of God, a man even closer to the Lord than any other sovereign. Backed by conservative intellectuals, landlords, Catholic priests, bureaucrats, and businessmen, the Weissebund defend “God’s Empire, God’s Church, and God’s German people” through threats, assault, murder, and arson.
Very fine people!
Pass the Aushöhlungsentlastungsgesetz

The Hollowing has dealt incalculable harm to Germany, and no prior measures of the Imperial government or any of the Imperial Estates have alleviated it. A group of leading German economists have declared that the conduct of the landlords and merchants of the Empire has been singularly destructive, and that what is needed is massive government intervention. Representatives sympathetic to them have submitted a bill restoring Wenceslaus-era grain prices per ounce, setting them at a fixed rate nationwide, and forcing grain merchants to sell a certain percentage of their product domestically before they are allowed to export it. As this is likely to create a black market, the bill would also allow police to search foodstuff merchants’ merchandise without a warrant and create an Imperial Agricultural Committee to purchase grain on behalf of farmers and set fixed prices for exports. Furthermore the bill includes several more typical methods of poor relief such as distributing clothing and goods to them and creating workhouses to allow the poor to earn a living wage.\n§RPassing another important reform of the Empire before this one will embolden the radical and republican elements of the Reichstag!§
Begin Nördlicher Wiederaufbau

Northern Germany has never been rich in resources. Many Elbian Germans had begun to emigrate to the New World decades before the Hollowing and the Second Great German War, driven by various economic and political concerns. The devastation of the region will only be remedied through a vast Northern Reconstruction Program. We must support new industries, subsidize small farmers and fishers, and provide new agricultural equipment. Fertilizers especially will be crucial for dealing with the uncharitable soil. With tremendous effort, we shall turn the blighted lands of the Elbe into a place so prosperous that people from across the Empire shall flock to live there!
Sign the Reichskonkordat of $YEAR$

While the Protestant churches of the Empire are thankfully only an issue at the regional level, the Catholic Church has been distressed by our efforts to curtail the power of the German clergy. It is not the existence of the Church within Germany that we oppose, merely its landed estates. Fortunately we have now managed to sway enough members of the College of Cardinals to support us that we can put pressure upon His Holiness the Pope for a settlement. We shall recognize the Catholic Church’s privileges within the Empire in exchange for the Pope accepting the nationalization of church lands throughout the realm, and thus the disestablishment of all prince-bishoprics. Unlike states such as Spain, which are also embarking upon campaigns to reduce Church influence, we are in a stronger position and over time we shall whittle away at the Church’s remaining privileges.
Limit the Power of the Princes

A direct assault upon the Imperial Estates, represented by their princes, would provoke a civil war. A far more clever plan has been presented by some of our ministers. We shall establish several imperial societies for the arts, which are to be headed by the various princes. The princes will have full control to pursue whatever artistic endeavor they want, music composition, painting, sculpting, even castle building if they want to. We will also organize Imperial competitions in which the princes shall be tacitly encouraged to spend lavishly to support their chosen artists as a demonstration of their prestige. As many princes are in debt we shall buy out their estates and encourage them to use their newfound money towards these cultural ends. Finally, we shall quietly terminate the practice of selling officer commissions, requiring all officers henceforth to graduate from one of the official Imperial military academies. This should keep them busy enough that they should no longer pose a threat to us or hamper our control, and hasten the reduction of their personal fortunes.
Establish the Reichsgouverneurs

The democratic traditions of the free cities and the Swiss cantons has often caused conflict with the monarchical nature of the Empire. However that does not mean that they are incompatible. We shall introduce a new office for these areas known as the Reichsgouverneurs, which, like their current office, will be an elected office, but shall be equal to any of the princes of the Empire. With this reform we will earn the loyalty of these areas and finally completely integrate them into our nation.
Initiate Stadterweckung

The rapid urbanization of certain regions of the Empire, particularly the Ruhr but also the Rhine in general, has caused these communities to swell to grotesque proportions. Sanitation is in a disgraceful state and the cities themselves seem at risk of being swallowed up by their own factories. We will summon the most eminent engineers and artists in the realm to reorganize these growing cities through a vast new regime of urban planning. Boulevards will be created as opposed to narrow medieval streets, new housing developments shall be constructed, mandatory minimum standards of water purity enacted, and plumbing, heating, and railways will be extended through as many cities as possible. Furthermore these communities will be given financial incentives to support museums, theaters, art galleries, public parks, and other centers of culture and leisure. This should make these cities both safer and more pleasant to live in, to say nothing of added economic efficiency.
Reform the Reichsarmee

The Reichsarmee has always been defined by its lack of coherence. Drawing upon the various Imperial Estates prohibited any type of standardization, and could cause errors of communication owing to officers and soldiers being unable to understand one another’s accents and dialects. The type of equipment furnished to them varied widely according to the resources of their Imperial Estate of origin. No more. We shall adopt a single standardized uniform, rifle, sidearm, and field kit for all Imperial soldiers and officers. The Imperial Military Academies will all be merged into a single system, and an Imperial Strategic and Tactical Development Committee will be established to regularly update their curriculum with information from recent wars and research.  Fluency in Bohemian German will be required to graduate, and basic competence in Bohemian German will become mandatory for all soldiers. With these measures we shall finally bring order to the military and with it unity of action!
Promote an Imperial Germanic Culture

Ours is not merely an empire of Germans. Czechs, Lusatians, Silesians, Slovenes, French, Burgundians, Italians…What unites us? It is quite simple : we are all part of the Imperial Germanic cultural world! The German culture forms the center around which all others orbit, yet their orbits affect one another in turn, and are all components of a singular system. New research in the emerging fields of sociology and cultural history show that people across the Empire regardless of language share many similar myths and traditions. And of course the Bohemians, so long seen as suspect by the other German peoples, are themselves undeniably German! We are the center of Europe, its pinnacle, its distillation, the greatest our continent has to offer. We shall create cultural endowments for artists and authors who we deem to be advancing the Imperial Germanic culture, and establish state facilities for adults who wish to learn German. Let us all unite in brotherhood beneath the Imperial flag!
Enact Gemeiner Reichsmark

Despite the political unification of the Empire we still remain divided when it comes to one important aspect, currency. In the Empire you will find people using the Bohemian krone, the Austrian gulden, the Thalers of the various free cities, and even the Berger Stuiver. Needless to say, the amount of time needed to convert one currency to another severely stunts the potential growth of our country. To remedy this a single currency will be introduced and serve as the official currency of the Empire, the common Reichsmark.
Promote the Mittelstand

Our economy has grown exceptionally well and the basis of our economy comes from a collection of small and medium enterprises that we call the Mittelstand. In order to grow our economy further we should further develop our Mittelstand base by making it easier to start a business as well as simplifying regulations regarding them.This in conjunction with the advances in transportation in the Empire should begin a new period of industrialization for us.
The Northern Peace

We have successfully pushed the Scandinavians out of Germany and have occupied the Jutland Peninsula as well. However the Scandinavian fleet, their "wooden wall", hampers us from marching further to attack the Scandinavian heartlands. Without a comparable fleet of our own it would be best to send an envoy to Aarhus and offer a white peace with Copenhagen. This way we can close one front and focus on the West.
The Continental Peace

The Dual Monarchy has eluded our efforts despite the continued state of war and our occupation of the French Crown. However an invasion of England is not necessary as the Anglois apparently lack either the means or the will to reconquer their continental possessions. It is time that we force the Londres government-in-exile to accept peace so that we may establish sister republics in France.
Dissolve the Zentrales Revolutionskomitee

The Komitee, under Consul Tassing’s brave leadership, has served us well and guided us to victory. Now that this has been accomplished however it is time for them to fulfill their promise to the people and allow full democracy to emerge. Their final act shall be to adopt a new republican constitution to enshrine the Rights of Man and Citizen. This constitution will reorganize the Imperial Republic into a federal state with universal male suffrage, a Reichstag elected by party-list proportional representation under private ballots, freedom of speech and assembly,  and a Tribune to serve as head of government while the Consul shall remain head of state. Long live the Imperial Republic of the German Nation!
Prepare Revolutionary Wars

”Mankind shall be free only when the common people hang the last king on Earth from the ramparts of his castle by the entrails of the last priest.” - Marinus Dahlke\n\nOur domestic revolution has been secured, but if a revolution is to succeed in the modern age then it cannot be purely domestic! The powers of Europe shall surely seek to strike us down, while their common people groan beneath the weight of reactionary oppression. Let us not rest upon our laurels, but instead hoist the banner of war for the liberation of the continent!
This cannot be formed until the Holy Roman Empire has been weakened to the point where that is possible.
Pass the Aushöhlungspräventionsgesetz

A bill has been drafted by Sigismund and his advisors that would restore Wenceslaus-era grain prices per ounce, setting them at a fixed rate nationwide, and forcing grain merchants to sell a certain percentage of their product domestically before they are allowed to export it. As this is likely to create a black market, the bill would also allow police to search foodstuff merchants’ merchandise without a warrant and create an Imperial Agricultural Committee to purchase grain on behalf of farmers and set fixed prices for exports. Furthermore the bill includes several more typical methods of poor relief such as distributing clothing and goods to them and creating workhouses to allow the poor to earn a living wage.\n§RPassing another important reform of the Empire before this one will embolden the radical and republican elements of the Reichstag!§
Incorporate the Saxon Circles

The Upper and Lower Saxon Circles are the main administrative regions for the Elbe River. They are the main mercantile center of Germany, holding several outlets to the Baltic and multiple important commercial cities with old ties to the Hansa before its evacuation to the New World. However they have seen better days, as nearly two centuries of war between ourselves and Scandinavia, paired with the Hollowing, have decimated the region. Furthermore their lack of valuable minerals and poor soil have caused them to lag behind in industrial and agricultural development compared to the rest of Germany. It will take substantial effort to address the status of the North but it must be done!
Incorporate the Lower Rhenish Circles

The Electoral Rhenish and the Lower Rhenish-Wesphalian Circles are the main administrative regions of the northern Rhine River. They are the main industrial heart of Germany, even more so than Silesia, and their cities are of dizzying size. However they have suffered over the years, as ages of conflict between ourselves and the Burgundians have made them into both a literal and a religious battleground, to say nothing of the Hollowing. Furthermore the haphazard flocking of rural Germans to the Rhenish cities has turned them into edifices of urban blight. It will take substantial effort to address the status of the West but it must be done!
Incorporate the Danubian and Franconian Circles

The Danubian and Franconian Circles are the main administrative regions of the Danube and the Main Rivers. They are the main political heart of Germany, rivaling even Bohemia, and they have also become renowned for their arts and architecture. However the Great German Wars wrought chaos across the region, and while they weathered the Hollowing well that is only in comparison to other areas. Furthermore much of their development is highly uneven and their rural areas continue to lag behind even as the cities prosper. It will take substantial effort to address the status of the Southeast but it must be done!
Incorporate the Upper Rhenish and Swabian Circles

The Upper Rhenish and Swabian Circles are the main administrative regions of the southern Rhine and the Neckar Rivers. The region has struggled to find a single identity or aspect to rally around, having been exceptionally divided even by the standards of the modern Empire. Similar to the northern Rhine this region has long been in contention between ourselves and Burgundy, giving rise to religious tensions between Catholics and Protestants. Furthermore their distant location from most centers of Imperial trade has caused them to become dangerously isolated from the rest of Germany. It will take substantial effort to address the status of the Southwest but it must be done!

Establish New Garrisons and the Reichspolizei

The unrest of past years has often originated from our cities. The Imperial Free Cities have always been problematic, yet another symptom of the weakness of past emperors and the inability to keep the realm united. Many times suspects in an Imperial Estate have fled to a Free City to evade arrest. Rather than immediately dissolve their statuses we shall instead establish new barracks and garrisons in the urban centers of the Empire to keep these places contained. Soldiers will be regularly relocated between cities to prevent them from growing too close to the locals. In addition an Imperial Police Service shall be created which shall hold jurisdiction over the entire empire, answerable to the Imperial Aulic Court.

Renovatio Imperii

At last! At long last, the Holy Roman Empire of the German Nation is a single nation once more! The dreams not simply of Wenceslaus V, but of every Emperor since Frederick II and beyond have been made manifest by Sigismund V, the Aurelian of the modern age! With this reunion, German nationalism is finally reconciling with the Imperial system, as we become the undisputed champion of the Germanic peoples. Perhaps we should now turn our eyes to the powers who have for too long tyrannized the German people : Burgundy and Scandinavia. The Elbians of the north and the Rheinlanders of the west have toiled for these despots for generations. No longer! Raise the Reichskriegsflagge, and proclaim to the world that the reunion of all Germans with their Fatherland is imminent!

Create the Zentralreichsbank and the Reichsmark

Many economists believe that the financial whirlwinds of the past have been the result of a vacuum of authority to cushion the market and intervene in times of crisis. While there are dozens of small banks throughout the empire they have no incentive to coordinate their actions and their records of business are all but unknown to us. An Imperial Central Bank shall be formed under which all existing central banks of the Imperial Estates will be subordinated. A single currency, the Reichsmark, shall be introduced, with its value pegged to the gold standard. All banks and other businesses will be required to use Reichsmarks and no other form of currency shall be produced within the Empire, though other notes currently in circulation shall still be recognized as their usage is phased out. Just as the Emperor is the arbiter of the Empire, the Zentralreichsbank shall be the arbiter of our economy.
Enact the Branchenexpansionsprogramm

One of the most aggravating legacies of the Empire’s division is the inadequacy of German infrastructure. The humble horse and carriage is still the transportation method of choice throughout much of the Empire, few trains run outside of the immediate area of major cities, and our rivers have become choked with vegetation. We must organize an aggressive expansion of railroad connections across the Empire, not just between urban areas but through the countryside to allow farmers and river fishers to bring their product to market. Roads must be modernized - preferably paved - and canals dug, repaired, and expanded throughout the nation. All of Germany must move as one!
Liberate the Dutch

The territory referred to by the Burgundians as the “Netherlands” once comprised much of the Duchy of Lower Lotharingia. It is here that the Dutch and the Frisians dwell, two German peoples estranged from the Empire for centuries. Not only did the Burgundian tyrants impose Protestantism upon them, they sought to deny the very nature of their culture and sever their German roots. They failed! The Dutch and the Frisians remember their homeland, just as we remember Lower Lotharingia, and now they are rediscovering their German ties. Now that the Empire has been fully reunified, we shall not lower the Reichskriegflagge until all West Germans are once again embraced by Holy Germania their mother.
Establish the Geheime Staatspolizei

The Imperial Police Service has brought order to our lands but even they cannot crack the terrorist organizations and other underground groups which plague the Empire. For that a different approach is required, one with more subtlety and even fewer restrictions upon their powers. This new Department of the Secret State Police shall be tasked with monitoring, infiltrating, and destroying revolutionary organizations within our lands. They will be given the power of arbitrary arrest and detention, and their operatives shall be trained in covert activity, clandestine interception of mail, and undercover work. If necessary they shall even follow revolutionaries abroad, as many of these terrorists have gone into exile in foreign cities. With the creation of the “GS” we can at last begin to wage war from the shadows against the revolutionary criminals.
End the Treason of Burgundy!

The death of Henry the Venerable, the first Duke of Burgundy, in 1002 allowed the wicked King Robert II of France to seize the territory and rob it from the German cultural sphere. The following centuries saw Burgundy grow ever more arrogant, bloated,  and corrupt, until it reached its modern apogee of iniquity. They now think themselves equal, even superior, to the Emperor. Burgundy has tormented our people for generations! It was they who sparked the Religious Wars, they who struck down Wenceslaus V, they whose merchants fostered the Hollowing! THEY ARE TO BLAME. We have never forgotten this, and we will never forgive them...just as we have never forgotten that, for nearly all of its existence, Burgundy had been the western frontier of the Empire. AND SO IT SHALL BE ONCE MORE.\n\n§RBURGUND WAR, IST UND WIRD EIN VASAAL DES HEILIGEN RÖMISCHEN REICHES DEUTSCHER NATION!§
Approach our Sister Republic in Italy

The Etrurians have, like ourselves, thrown off the shackles of reaction once more and reclaimed their liberty. Europe remains dominated by reaction, however, and so our nations should stick together. Let us propose an alliance with the Italians, so that the revolutionary flame shall continue to burn bright on both sides of the Alps!
A Different Germany

Bohemia is not yet lost. We may have failed to reunify the Holy Roman Empire, but we have retained our presence in the German world. A plan has been proposed by certain German nationalists to create a confederation of German states beneath our control, based on earlier proposals for a confederation of Elbian territories. If we can gain hegemony over Germany then we can return Bohemia to her natural place as leader of the Germans. §F(NOTE : This decision is only for informational purposes. A separate decision will allow you to form GCF when it unlocks.)§
Form the Imperial Confederation of Germany

The time has come! Everyone doubted us, they thought that Bohemia was doomed to irrelevance. But the Lion has fought its way back to the head of the pride. With all of Germany under our influence, we can at last reclaim our natural position as leader of the Germans. A confederal government shall be established across the German lands to rally them all beneath our banner, and nobody will ever again question the undeniably German soul of the Bohemians, nor our mandate to serve and protect our people. The House of Jagiellon were the final Emperors of Germany and now we shall be Emperors of Germany once more! Long live the Second German Reich!\n\nHold firm! Hold firm! Let the banner flutter! Show the enemy That we stand together faithfully, That our old strength persists When the battlecry rages against us! Hold firm in the roaring storm!
Liberate Western Germany

Es braust ein Ruf wie Donnerhall, wie Schwertgeklirr und Wogenprall : Zum Rhein, zum Rhein, zum deutschen Rhein, wer will des Stromes Hüter sein?

The Rheinland has for too long been the captive of Burgundy, but their power is waning at last. Despite their cultural differences from us, we cannot let this opportunity slip through our grasp. The weakness of Anvers offers us an opportunity to liberate this ancient land and fulfill the promise made by both the Republicans under Dahlke and, later, the Royalists under Wenceslaus V, when they sang a certain patriotic anthem during the Great German Wars.

Lieb Vaterland, magst ruhig sein, lieb Vaterland, magst ruhig sein, Fest steht und treu die Wacht, die Wacht am Rhein! Fest steht und treu die Wacht, die Wacht am Rhein!

Violate Swabian Neutrality

The Swabians may have declared themselves “neutral,” but if they believe that will stop us - if they believe the opinion of their allies will stop us - then they are sorely mistaken. History will show that this conflict was necessary.
Light a Phoenix Flame

Pan-Germanism is not what it used to be. Gone are the heady days of the 1830s and 1840s when it seemed that Germany was on the cusp of unity. There are still pan-Germanist parties but none of them agree, and they waste all of their energy squabbling with one another. Now a group of ministers have put forth a radical proposal to force the leading pan-Germanist parties into a temporary alliance. With enough cajoling, bribery, and blackmail, we can compel the most influential pan-Germanists to form a new umbrella organization to coordinate their efforts to unite Germany. It will undoubtedly be unstable but we have no choice! Germany must unite, and it must unite as soon as possible. We even have a name in mind for this group, named after the flag used by Marinus Dahlke’s Imperial Republic : The Reichsbanner Coalition.
The Phoenix Gambit

Pan-Germanism is on the wane. There are still pan-Germanist parties but most of them operate in the Danubian lands. Now a group of ministers have put forth a radical proposal to initiate a pan-German propaganda campaign amongst the southerners while passing bribes to certain Danubian politicians to promote a pan-German political alliance. Such a seismic political shift could reawaken the pan-German spark within our own nation and then allow us to appropriate it. There is a significant risk of blowback but we have no choice! We must obtain a mandate to lead the German people once again. One minister has even suggested that we slip some cash to a German nationalist author for him to publish an anonymous pamphlet calling for a “Reichsbanner Coalition,” named for the flag of Marinus Dahlke’s republic.
Declare the Befrieungskrieg

Burgundy is the enemy of the German people. Other powers have weakened us, but Burgundy has for centuries sought to increase its domination of our kindred in the west. Today a shameful amount of Germany lies under Burgundian control. But Germany is not what she was two hundred, twenty, even two years ago. She is young and strong once again, and she will no longer tolerate Burgundy’s evil.\n\nA war with Burgundy will not be a skirmish for a single province. It will be a massive struggle to liberate all of Germany from their clutches and to destroy their power forever, so that nobody will ever live in fear of the Burgundian Lion again. Germany will not be a nation until she liberates herself. §ROnce we have decided to attack Burgundy, there will be no turning back. Failure is not an option. This will be the Greatest German War of all - the War to End All Wars.§
Let the German Phoenix Rise!

Our hegemony across the German lands is now beyond contest - for the first time in a millennium, the German people are united under a single flag, ours! The vaunted Burgundian Lion is nowhere to be seen, and thus there is no reason for us to deny our true nature any longer. The time has come to surpass both Marinus Dahlke and Wenceslaus V. Let us proclaim the Greater German state, and take our rightful place as the new heart of Europe!\n\nGermany, Germany above all, Above all in the world! When, always, for protection and defense Brothers stand together. From the Maas to the Memel, From the Etsch to the Belt, Germany, Germany above all, Above all in the world!

The vaunted Burgundian Lion is nowhere to be seen, and thus there is no reason for us to deny our true nature any longer. The time has come to surpass both Marinus Dahlke and Wenceslaus V. Let us proclaim the Greater German state, and take our rightful place as the new heart of Europe!\n\nFatherland! A bright and lofty word, That echoes through our hearts Like rustling woods and ringing bells, Blaring trumpets and lark song, That flashes like lightning in our breasts, Changing joy into sacred flame! Fatherland!
Let the German Eagle Rise!

Our hegemony across the German lands is now beyond contest - for the first time in a millennium, the German people are united under a single flag, ours! The vaunted Burgundian Lion is nowhere to be seen, and thus there is no reason for us to deny our true nature any longer. The time has come to surpass Wenceslaus V and restore Bohemian leadership of the German people. Let us proclaim the Greater German state, and take our rightful place as the new heart of Europe!\n\nO highly esteemed Germany, Thou art the holy land of loyalty. May the brightness of thy glory Shine anew forever both in the west and east.Thou stand'st firm like thy mountains Against thy foes' power and deception. And thy spirit may fly Like the eagle that leaves his nest.
Construct Swabia

A united and compliant Swabia is essential to the defense of our eastern frontier. Sadly, pan-Swabianism has so far failed to translate into a unified nation. But there remain enough supporters of the idea for us to use a combination of political pressure, bribery, and just a little blackmail to force referendums to be held in the Swabian states on unification. Without the Holy Roman Empire, such a nation will need another power to protect them - such as ourselves.
Formation of the Reichsbanner Coalition

A century after the Zeil-Street Oath and the Dahlkist revolution, Germany remains divided. That is something that pan-German nationalists can no longer tolerate. A new political organization of unprecedented breadth has been formed between a wide array of German parties known as the Reichsbanner Coalition, or simply the Reichsbanner, named after the flag of the Imperial Republic. The group seeks the establishment of a unified German state - not at some point in the distant future, but as soon as possible and by any means necessary. Many observers doubt that it will survive in the long run, given the dizzying array of parties it is trying to corral around a single goal. Nevertheless they represent a growing feeling that the order which arose after the Hollowing and the fall of the Empire have failed to bring Germany salvation, and that new, radical ideologies may be necessary to save Germany.
We must be one nation!

A new hope?
Blackshirts in Frankfurt

A new menace has arisen across Germany : Volkism. An ideology combining German romanticism and socialist economic critiques with strange theories of language and culture, the Volkists seek the establishment of an atheistic, militarized, pan-German state governed along their bizarre and despotic lines. The Danubian-based German National Volkist Party (DNVP) and its blackshirted Combat Division (Kampfabteilung, or KA) is the most popular and influential, with many copycats and sister organizations across Germany. Now the local Rhenish DNVP chapter has staged a demonstration in Frankfurt. Columns upon columns of blackshirts have marched through the streets, occasionally pausing to jeer religious or political offices they deemed “against the German spirit.” So far they have not actually harmed any people or property, but the mayor of Frankfurt has requested that we dispatch troops to defend the city in case of rioting as the city guard may be unable to stop the KA. The mood is quite tense…
Just a bunch of jumped-up freaks in black pajamas.
The Battle of Zeil Street

When the KA marched towards Frankfurt city center through Zeil Street - the same street where German republicans held a national revolutionary pledge in 1790 - they were met by $COUNTRY_ADJ$ soldiers who ordered them to disperse. Younger blackshirts began heckling the soldiers. Battalion commander Dwight Rethel demanded that his men be allowed to pass. What happened next is unclear. Commanding $COUNTRY_ADJ$ officer Rene van Buren claims that multiple Volkists drew handguns, forcing his men to open fire to defend themselves. The Volkists allege that none of them were carrying firearms and that $COUNTRY_ADJ$ soldiers shot them even after Rethel declared this. Whatever the case, a furious melee was ignited between the blackshirts and our forces that spilled out into other parts of the city. With several KA men dead, many Germans are inclined to believe Rethel, and German nationalist sentiment is flaring on a level not seen in decades.
They got what they deserved!
The Return of Pan-German Nationalism

The wounds opened by the “Battle of Zeil Street” run far deeper than any of us had expected. Germans across Europe have awoken to find their morning newspapers splashed with headlines about unarmed German nationalists being shot down in the most politically significant location in Germany by $COUNTRY_ADJ$ soldiers seemingly just for being German nationalists. The militant and esoteric beliefs of the Volkists have done nothing to check a wave of outrage that is washing over the center of the continent. Not just in foreign countries, but in $COUNTRY$, people are recounting old German martyrs who also laid down their lives for Germany’s sake. Many Germans are now flocking to the Volkists, or alternatively to the Social Democratic Party of Germany, a far-left organization that sees German division as a tool of capitalism. Both pan-German parties are members of the Reichsbanner, and any hope of that coalition being short-lived have been lost, as the German specter haunts Europe once more.
These infernal radicals…!

A Phoenix in Europe

”He who comes not today, tomorrow surely comes, but slowly does the old oak awaken, and he who goes softly goes well.” - Bertolt Perienz, German author\nThe German Eagle has seen better days, and it is beyond question that it is the fault of those who held the Germans - those of the Rhein, of the Elbe, of the Donau, of Schwaben, of the Ostsee and of Dietsland - under their yoke. But in recent years, a whisper emerged in the dark alleys of the cities on the Rhine, then mumbling in the factories and stores of Danubia until even the Elbians, who usually submitted to the authority of Prague, joined the emerging chorus : Germany still exists! The dream carried by the descendants of those left behind in the Great German War will never die. The weakness of foreign empires has inspired a second national awakening across the former Holy Roman Empire which echoes throughout Europe. Intellectuals are drafting new constitutions, civil servants are suddenly scorning orders given by Anvers, Prague or Kopenhagen, and old flags thought lost to the test of time reemerge.
Troubling, to say the least.
The Creation of the Reichsbanner Coalition

The most ambitious political project in Germany since the unification of the Danubian Circle is now coming to fruition. Our government, through both public and private channels, has successfully pressured the major pan-German parties to form an alliance. This morning their representatives gathered at Innsbruck to sign a declaration that they would all coordinate their resources in the pursuit of German unification beneath the umbrella of the Reichsbanner Coalition, or simply the Reichsbanner. It remains to be seen if this political behemoth will hold together, but for now let us celebrate another mighty step on the path to a united Germany!
Strength through unity, kameraden!
The Creation of the Reichsbanner Coalition

The most ambitious political project in Germany since the unification of the Danubian Circle is now coming to fruition. Taking advantage of the unexpected surge in nationalist sentiments within $COUNTRY$, our government has convinced the leaders of the major pan-German parties to form an alliance. This morning their representatives gathered at Innsbruck to sign a declaration that they would all coordinate their resources in the pursuit of German unification beneath the umbrella of the Reichsbanner Coalition, or simply the Reichsbanner. It remains to be seen if this political behemoth will hold together, but for now let us celebrate another mighty step on the path to a united Germany!
Strength through unity, kameraden!
A Phoenix in Europe

”He who comes not today, tomorrow surely comes, but slowly does the old oak awaken, and he who goes softly goes well.” - Bertolt Perienz, German author\nThe German Eagle has seen better days, and it is beyond question that it is the fault of those who held the Germans - those of the Rhein, of the Elbe, of the Donau, of Schwaben, of the Ostsee and of Dietsland - under their yoke. But now, with the formation of the Reichsbanner Coalition amongst the Danubians, a great shout has issued forth from the peaks of the Alps, echoing through the dark alleys of the Rhine until even the Elbians joined the emerging chorus : Germany still exists!
