Intellectuals are drafting new constitutions, civil servants are suddenly scorning orders given by Anvers or Kopenhagen, and old flags thought lost to the test of time reemerge.
Arise, Germania, your children call to you!
The Reichsbanner Calls for a Congress

It is no secret that the Reichsbanner lacks much of a platform beyond pan-Germanism. Many people are still confused as to what it is, or what its broader goals are. None are more conflicted than its ostensible leadership, who cannot even agree on a coherent message for their own periodical! Now the Reichsbanner’s executive committee has called for a new Council of the Nations of Germany to be held in Innsbruck to decide upon a united political platform. It will no doubt be a contentious event, as parties from across the spectrum shall seek to make their policies the foundation of the Reichsbanner. §BIf our government is already leaning in a certain political direction then the Council shall reflect that direction. If not, then anything could happen.§
Once more, with feeling…!
The Fourth German Council - Reactionary

The Fourth Council of the German Nations has been organized in Innsbruck, site of the famous festival where German nationalism reawakened. The congress seeks to determine the political platform of the Reichsbanner Coalition. Parties from across the ideological spectrum have, for reasons of convenience, come together beneath this aegis for the sake of a united Germany. While it was thought that many voices would contend it already seems clear that the reactionaries shall dominate. The Danubian left has been disorganized as of late, more focused on squabbling with one another than presenting a united message. This has allowed right-wing parties to take control. The current favorite is the Jungdeutscher Orden (Young German Order), a coalition of the military and business elite backed by right-wing intellectuals and the middle class, led by General Erwin von Leeb. The Orden’s ferocious xenophobia and support of state-guided economics and welfare are proving quite popular and they are certain to take the lead in the Reichsbanner.
The true German people must rise!
The Leftist Council

The Fourth Council of the German Nations has been organized in Innsbruck, site of the famous festival where German nationalism reawakened. The congress seeks to determine the political platform of the Reichsbanner Coalition. Parties from across the ideological spectrum have, for reasons of convenience, come together beneath this aegis for the sake of a united Germany. While it was thought that many voices would contend it already seems clear that the leftists shall dominate. The Danubian right has been disorganized as of late, more focused on squabbling with one another than presenting a united message. This has allowed left-wing parties to take control. The current favorite is the Sozialdemokratische Partei Deutschlands (SPD), a coalition of worker and peasant interests focused around urban Räte (worker councils), led by trade unionist Otto Hayek. Their proletarian rhetoric is proving quite popular and they are certain to take the lead in the Reichsbanner.
The proletariat must rise!
The SPD and the Deutsche Bürgerarmee

Socialist parties have existed in the German states for decades, but the Sozialdemokratische Partei Deutschlands (Socialist Democratic Party of Germany, SPD) and its armed wing, the Deutsche Bürgerarmee (German Citizen Army) is the one most committed to pan-Germanism. The SPD is far more radical than most socialist parties, calling for a proletarian society governed by the workers’ councils (Räte) that have emerged across Germany during its industrialization, especially after the Hollowing. Their Bürgerarmee, though not as well-funded as right-wing paramilitaries, is fiercely loyal. The SPD also distinguishes itself by calling for German unity through a Blanquist lens, arguing that the German proletariat’s division is an artificial imposition by foreign capitalists. Their leader, Otto Hayek, is a veteran trade union activist and strike leader beloved by the lower classes as “one of our own - a man we can trust,” in the words of one local railworker.
We will keep an eye on them.
The Deutsche Nationale Völkische Partei

Volkism is a strange new ideology which marries socialist-sounding economic critiques and the rejection of conventional religion with violent ultranationalism and xenophobia. Supporters of German romanticism, government welfare, and industrial nationalization, the German National Volkist Party (DNVP) seeks to establish an atheistic, militarized, pan-German state, “from the English Channel to the Ostsee to the Adriatic, purged of Latin and Slavic degeneracy,” according to their manifesto. Their blackshirted Combat Division (Kampfabteilung, or KA) is a fearsome instrument of intimidation. Unlike more traditional reactionary parties the DNVP upholds the Dahlkist view of Ashkenazi Jews as fellow Germans. However many Jews, especially religious traditionalists, have declared this to be a self-serving policy of legitimizing the DNVP’s goals of foreign conquest. Their leader, Erich Laufen, is a former lecturer and military veteran, famous for his magnetizing speeches, strategic mind, and iron will.
We will keep an eye on them.
The Jungdeutscher Orden

The fall of the Empire and the return of Dahlkism prompted much soul-searching amongst German reactionaries. It became clear to them that the old order had failed. Yet the nobility, as cunning and supine as ever, have refurbished their message for a new era, cherry-picking aspects of republicanism and socialism convenient to them. Thus a new political party has arisen : the Jungdeutscher Orden (Young German Order), comprised of military officers and veterans, businessmen, and right-wing intellectuals. While the Orden and its Stahlhelm paramilitary espouse pan-Germanism and the importance of state welfare - policies once seen as leftist - it combines this with ferocious racial and religious prejudice, hateful of “the Judeo-Blanquist hydra.” In the words of the Orden’s leader, the charismatic and young (compared to other officers) General Erwin von Leeb, they seek “a fully German, fully Catholic, and fully armed Germany.”
We will keep an eye on them.
The Fourth German Council

The Fourth Council of the German Nations has been organized in Innsbruck, site of the famous liberal festival where German nationalism reawakened. The congress seeks to determine the political platform of the Reichsbanner Coalition. Parties from across the ideological spectrum have, for reasons of convenience, come together beneath this aegis for the sake of a united Germany. Many voices shall contend but only one will enshrine itself as the official word of the Reichsbanner. The Danubian government will doubtlessly seek to influence these proceedings towards their own ends. §RFavoring one side will build a more stable coalition but could allow them to impose their political will across all of Germany in the future. No doubt the Council leaders will strive to compromise but an alliance between too many different types of radicals could cause untold chaos.§
Unity must prevail!
The Third German Council

The outcome of the Second German Council has failed to satisfy the pan-Germanist question. A Third Council has thus been organized in Innsbruck, site of the famous liberal festival where German nationalism reawakened. The congress seeks to determine the political platform of the Reichsbanner Coalition. Parties from across the ideological spectrum have, for reasons of convenience, come together beneath this aegis for the sake of a united Germany. Many voices shall contend but only one will enshrine itself as the official word of the Reichsbanner. The Danubian government will doubtlessly seek to influence these proceedings towards their own ends. §RFavoring one side will build a more stable coalition but could allow them to impose their political will across all of Germany in the future. No doubt the Council leaders will strive to compromise but an alliance between too many different types of radicals could cause untold chaos.§
Unity must prevail!
The Question of the Räte

Räte (councils) are a type of urban labor organization which have grown in popularity since the late 19th century. Originally formed to coordinate strikes, the räte have become an autonomous workers’ movement across Germany. This is a striking departure from previous labor unions and other worker organizations which, at least in Germany, were almost always state-controlled. Räte have been springing up from Amsterdam to Vienna, organizing meetings at the factory level. They not only lead strikes but coordinate political action, run workers’ cooperatives, and run educational programs. Now some Räte have begun to seize foreign-owned factories and the Reichsbanner must decide how to approach them. The SPD advocates full partnership with the Räte and to use them as the blueprints of a new nation. Reactionaries see them as a symptom of poor state leadership and argue that industrial nationalization is the cure. Most moderates support their cooperatives but shun more militant Räte actions.
§VThe Räte shall be the backbone of a proletarian Germany!§
Endorse workers’ cooperatives and nothing more.
§uThe state must control industry, not a bunch of mobs!§
The Question of Political Amnesty

Many German political activists have been imprisoned over the years. In $COUNTRY$ and elsewhere these men and women were jailed for speaking their mind and fighting for their cause. Both Laufen and Hayek have served time in prison. Now, many Reichsbanner members are wondering : if we come to power, first in this country and then across all of Germany, what shall be done with these political prisoners? The SPD and the DNVP both want to keep their respective political enemies locked up, the SPD against anticommunists and religious extremists, the DNVP against anarchists. Moderates argue that we cannot lay claim to Marinus Dahlke’s legacy if we do not free all political prisoners, as he often did upon capturing cities during the Revolution. §RIf this issue is not settled then it could cause serious instability in the future.§
§VWe have no need of reactionary brutes.§
All of them must be freed, nothing less!
§uWe have no need of mad anarchist terrorism.§
§WThe Council is unable to arrive at a compromise…§
The Question of the New German Army’s Politics

We aim to unify Germany and experience has shown that none of the European Great Powers will allow this without a fight. Therefore the Reichsbanner is now debating the nature of the prospective pan-German military. The SPD, pointing to the ancient ties between the reactionary nobility and the officer corps of European states, has argued that only by allowing soldiers to elect their own officers can the German military avoid becoming a breeding ground for despotism. The Orden, itself comprised of many military or ex-military men, is affronted by this and has declared that our only priority should be keeping our armed forces “apolitical” - which would amount to the muzzling of any Blanquist voices within it. Moderates agree that the old system of purchased commissions must end but see patriotism as the only political requirement for the military.
§VMilitary democracy will keep Germany free!§
Endorse a modern and loyal military and nothing more.
§uThe last thing our heroes need is idle red gossip in their ears.§
The Question of Paramilitaries

Paramilitaries have become a fact of life across Germany, as many radical parties feel the need to both protect themselves from state persecution and from their rivals. They have also become a haven for military veterans. As we lay the foundations of a new German state, the Reichsbanner must determine their fate. Both the SPD and the DNVP have argued for the dissolution of their opposite number’s paramilitary. The matter has become heated with members of the Bürgerarmee and the Kampfabteilung hurling accusations of past misdeeds - several Council attendees have fought one another in the streets in prior years. Most moderates see paramilitary forces in general as a threat to civil liberty and want all of them dissolved. However a few eccentric delegates have suggested the formation of a united “Reichsbannerarmee” that would merge all existing paramilitaries into a single organization. §RThis would create an extremely fractious force.§
§VThe KA cannot be trusted to protect the proletariat, dissolve them!§
All paramilitaries must go, nothing less!
§uThe Bürgerarmee cannot defend the Fatherland, dissolve them!§
§pOne Reichsbannerarmee for one Germany!§
The Question of Welfare

The Hollowing illustrated the consequences of a Germany without a united government to direct relief efforts and shield the German people. The passage of time has only strengthened the conviction across the political spectrum that state welfare programs are a necessary part of modern life. Both the SPD and the DNVP have different welfare plans. The SPD want to build upon existing reforms to further protect German workers and farmers, but with the provision of aid working through local Räte. The DNVP argues that the current welfare scheme is too broken to be saved and must be totally replaced with a state-run regime of programs centrally controlled from the capital. Moderates worry that the Council is losing sight of pan-Germanism and want to leave the matter be for the short term.
§VA proletarian society must protect its members!§
We have other concerns.
§uA new German order will need a new welfare scheme!§
The Question of the Monarchy

Hard questions are being asked amongst the Reichsbanner delegates as to the Head of State of a future German nation. The Danubian government was built through the efforts of monarchs who co-opted German nationalism, but German nationalism first arose as a Dahlkist and therefore anti-monarchist ideology. The SPD sees this appropriation as a mistake to be corrected through abolition of the monarchy, though they concede that mass execution of the ruling dynasty may not be necessary. The Orden, many of whose members are of noble blood, see the monarchy as a fundamental pillar of the state - General von Leeb has described the idea of abolishing it to build a new Germany as “like passengers on a moving train casting out the conductor and the engineer due to disliking their temperaments.” Moderates agree that abolition could be too destabilizing at this time and instead propose that the future German constitution relegate the monarch to a ceremonial role.
§VOnly a republican Germany will be a free Germany!§
Endorse a symbolic monarch and nothing more.
§uAll republics fail and fall. Where is Dahlke now?§
The Question of the Presidency

Hard questions are being asked amongst the Reichsbanner delegates as to the Head of State of a future German nation. The Danubian government is moderated by a president who wields several powers to guide the government in the name of stability, but successive presidents have claimed greater and greater authority. The SPD see the executive branch as redundant and wish to abolish the presidency. The Orden, in contrast, claim that only a strong executive can provide the necessary national leadership - General von Leeb has described the idea of abolishing the presidency to build a new Germany as “like passengers on a moving train casting out the conductor and the engineer due to disliking their temperaments.” Moderates agree that abolition could be too destabilizing at this time and instead propose that the future German constitution scale back presidential powers.
§VA proletarian government has no need of a president!§
Endorse a presidency with minimal powers and nothing more.
§uAn army needs a strong leader and so does a nation!§
The Question of the Legal System

For most of German history the justices have been appointed by local authorities. Even the old Reichshofrat, the highest court in the Empire, was appointed by the Emperor. Now this system is being questioned by Reichsbanner delegates. The SPD has pointed to the old system as yet another way in which the bourgeoisie defend their privileges and has argued that the Räte should elect justices to ensure they represent the people. The DNVP has attacked this proposition as a naked attempt to politicize judicial appointments and has argued that such matters should be handled by a national German Ministry of Justice. Most moderates see both suggestions as flawed and would prefer that legislatures handle judicial elections.
§VThe Räte will decide who is fit to wield a gavel!§
Endorse legislature elections for justices and nothing more.
§uWhat we need is to centralize judicial appointments!§
The Question of the Form of Government

If the Reichsbanner is to build a new Germany then it must decide what type of Germany to build. That is the realization which has ignited the most furious debates amongst the delegates. It has also caused SPD unity to fray, as several members have come out in support of the Jungdeutscher Orden’s demand for a unitary, centrally organized state. These SPD defectors argue that without centralization, Germany will not be able to maintain its cohesion. After all, they ask, did the Empire not perish due to lack of centralization? SPD leader Otto Hayek has condemned this line of reasoning, defending a federal model as the only one which can protect democracy and give the Räte a meaningful voice, even if it is less stabilizing than a unitary system. Most of the Council appears to be cleaving along one of these two lines, though a third group has emerged which seeks an even more decentralized government to avert any possibility of state tyranny.
§pA unitary state will unite Germany and keep it united!§
§VA federal state will give the people liberty!§
A confederal state will keep the government honest!
The Secret Meeting in the Capital

”It is truly deplorable. At this very moment, gentlemen, when the fate of Germany is hanging in the balance, there are those who are trying to throw it all away. And they do so, I might add, for the pettiest of reasons. Caught up in the arrogant belief of their righteousness, ignorant of the menaces posed by the outside powers all too expectant of our destruction, these narrow-minded saboteurs work without ceasing to the collective ruin of us all. If we allow them to continue then all of our labors shall be for nothing. Action is necessary. When the time is right we shall muster our forces and strike against the common enemy in our midst. §RThis shall firmly tilt the balance of power in favor of Germany’s true heroes, and shatter the host of her internal foes - by which, of course, I refer to…”§
§V”...those damned socialist Bürgerarmee brutes!”§
”...the partisan fools trying to tear our compromises apart!”
§u”...those damned reactionary Blackshirt thugs!”§
The National Pledge

All major points of debate have now been settled. The Fourth Council of the Nations of Germany is now in its final phase, as the leaders of the largest blocs prepare to make their speeches on the future of both the Reichsbanner Coalition and of Germany. The air is electric as everyone in attendance knows that these are the moments which shall decide our destiny. §BEach block shall pledge resources according to its strength. Let us hope that we have not tried to force too many conflicting groups together…§
Quiet! The speeches are about to begin!
§uThe Reactionary Pledge - Massive Support!§

”The German people are nothing if not patient. We have waited centuries for our oppressors to, as they have always claimed that they would, return us our lands and our independence. We have waited in vain. We can wait no longer! Now the calm of day is banished. A great storm is building over Germany. It is the storm of the Volk - a storm of steel! The storm whose torrential rains shall wash away our wounds and our sorrow, and drown the foreign tyrants who hate us. The Reichsbanner shall be the shock troops of this storm!”\n\nThe reactionary parties have pledged total commitment to the Reichsbanner! Satisfied with the policies they were able to push through the council, they have promised every ounce of their strength to the pan-German struggle. Of course, with such a tremendous contribution, they shall expect compensation…
One will for one nation, kameraden!
§VThe SPD Pledge - Massive Support!§

”History has a long memory. It passes stern judgement upon tyrants, and elevates those who struggled for human freedom. It was in Germany that the modern phase in the ancient struggle of the working class broke like a thunderclap upon the crowned heads of the Altes Regime. It is only fitting that we pen the next chapter in the battle of the proletariat here in Germany as well. The fires of our struggle shall become that of a mighty furnace, and upon the anvil of the proletarian will, we shall forge a united nation!” - Otto Hayek\n\nThe SPD has pledged total commitment to the Reichsbanner! Satisfied with the policies they were able to push through the council, they have promised the entirety of their power to the pan-German struggle. Of course, with such a tremendous contribution, they shall expect compensation…
Unity is strength, kameraden!
The §pUnstable United Front Pledge§

The parties of the Reichsbanner - especially the SPD and the DNVP - have somehow managed to conclude the Fourth German Council without any ideology coming to the fore of the debate. All parties, even the most radical amongst the far-left and the far-right, have maintained their attempts to keep united in the name of Germany. However cracks have already begun to appear : nobody, not even Hayek and Laufen, could decide on who would give the final speech of the evening, and instead all major parties gave brief addresses. §pIt is likely that the Reichsbanner will be able to keep itself together until Germany is united. After that, however, the weight of its own contradictions may cause it to collapse…§
Together for victory…ja?
The United Front Pledge

”It cannot be denied that we have found ourselves at cross purposes in the past. But the great historical moment which looms before us all commands our attention. We must not shrink from our destiny because of a minor difference of programs! This Council was called in the name of unity, and unity we shall have. Comrades! In the name of Germany, we must all stride forwards together, as one body with a single unbreakable will!”\n\nThe parties of the Reichsbanner have managed to bury enough of their differences to be willing to officially commit to a broad political alliance. While many differences still exist amongst the coalition’s members, all major participants have promised to do their utmost to submerge these differences for the time being. It is hoped that this historic compromise shall be a model for political stability in Germany going forwards.
Together for victory!
§VThe SPD Pledge - Moderate Support§

”The wheel of history turns on inexorably, but it is the struggle of the common people which turns it. Today a fire has been kindled here that shall light the heart of the continent. It is the beacon of a new world - a new humanity - a new Germany. We shall all bear its light onwards.” - SPD leader Otto Hayek\n\nThe SPD has promised to do what it can to aid the Reichsbanner. While this represents a victory for political stability, some attendees were disappointed that the SPD did not offer a firmer commitment of support. Nevertheless we can rest assured of their loyalty.
Unity is strength.
§uThe Reactionary Pledge - Moderate Support§

”Germania is stirring from her slumber. The chains upon her limbs have rusted and are now at their breaking point. One great effort - one mighty, final struggle - shall shatter them forever. It is through our combined might that she shall be liberated. And soon, she shall once more draw her sword against our enemies.”\n\nThe reactionary parties have promised to do what they can to aid the Reichsbanner. While this represents a victory for political stability, some attendees were disappointed that the reactionaries did not offer a firmer commitment of support. Nevertheless we can rest assured of their loyalty.
One will for one nation.
The Reactionary Parties Stage a Walkout!

It was expected that one of the leaders of the reactionary parties in attendance would deliver one of the final speeches at the council. But to the shock of all delegates, they instead led their parties in a walkout! Many anti-communists and traditionalists joined them. It appears that the Reichsbanner’s political platform has shifted too far from the right for them to support. We shall have to move forward without them.
One less thing to worry about…
The SPD Stages a Walkout!

It was expected that Otto Hayek, leader of the SPD and thus one of the most influential leftists in attendance, would deliver one of the final speeches at the council. But to the shock of all delegates, he instead led his party in a walkout! Many communists and other Blanquist radicals joined them. It appears that the Reichsbanner’s political platform has shifted too far from the left for them to support. We shall have to move forward without them.
One less thing to worry about…
The Nation Embraces the Reichsbanner!

The conclusion of the Fourth German Council did far more than bolster pan-German nationalism. Many people across $COUNTRY$ now see the victory of the Reichsbanner as a necessity for the future of Germany. Fearing a revolution if the energized masses were not mollified, this morning the government issued an announcement of its “unrestrained support” for the Reichsbanner and promised to work with the coalition “for the salvation of Germany.” This amounts to placing guidance of the nation in their hands, something which has shocked both Europe and the world at large. Far more shocking was the announcement that the “national liberation of Germany by all possible means” shall become “the foremost priority of the administration,” news which has caused our foreign allies to quickly sever ties with us. §pThis is tantamount to a declaration of war against all other rivals for German unification. A conflict for the fate of Germany is not just inevitable - it is now imminent.§
Let the German phoenix soar!
Chaos in Elbia

The Danubian government was recently overthrown in a coup d’etat by the pan-German Reichsbanner Coalition. Its administration has now announced their intent to liberate Germany by force! Multiple Great Powers have issued warnings to their citizens to evacuate Central Europe immediately and our Elbian lands have seen outbreaks of partisan warfare by pan-German militias. Order is breaking down in the south and it will only worsen if Danubian forces manage to link up with the rebels. §RThis is the final battle for Scandinavia’s position in Germany.§
Onwards, for the Nordic dream!
Chaos in Elbia

The Danubian government was recently overthrown in a coup d’etat by the pan-German Reichsbanner Coalition. Its administration has now announced their intent to liberate Germany by force! Multiple Great Powers have issued warnings to their citizens to evacuate Central Europe immediately and our Elbian German lands have seen outbreaks of partisan warfare by pan-German militias. Order is breaking down in the north and it will only worsen if Danubian forces manage to link up with the rebels. §RThis is the greatest struggle yet for the German destiny. Victory here will make us the unquestioned leader of Germany.§
We shall do what no Emperor ever could!
The Great German Revolution

”Men do not lead the revolution : it is the Revolution that uses men.” - Ariel Arendt, ‘Considerations on Germany,’ 1796\n\nThe Reichsbanner Coalition, a broad alliance of pan-German political parties, have through peace or force compelled the Danubian government to bend to their wishes. This has led to the outbreak of war and insurrection across Germany, as Danubian soldiers strike north against Scandinavia to bring both north and south under their control. The Nordic realm has already seen its Elbian lands plagued by partisan warfare but this has opened up a whole new phase in the conflict. If Scandinavia prevails then this shall spell the death of pan-Germanism for generations. If the Danubians prevail then it could merely be the overture of an even greater struggle to come.
The time has come to determine the German destiny!
The Great German Revolution

”Men do not lead the revolution : it is the Revolution that uses men.” - Ariel Arendt, ‘Considerations on Germany,’ 1796\n\nThe Reichsbanner Coalition, a broad alliance of pan-German political parties, have through peace or force compelled the Danubian government to bend to their wishes. This has led to the outbreak of war and insurrection across Germany, as Danubian soldiers strike north against Prague to bring both north and south under their control. The Bohemians have already seen their northern lands plagued by partisan warfare but this has opened up a whole new phase in the conflict. The battles which play out here to settle the decades-old vendetta between the ancient claimant to the German mantle and the upstart contender may be a mere overture of an even greater struggle to come.
The time has come to determine the German destiny!
The Treaty of Nuremberg

The German Phoenix continues to soar above Europe, as Danubian forces have swept Scandinavian armies from northern Germany and compelled Kopenhagen to surrender rather than face further bloodshed. The resulting treaty, signed in Nuremberg - the “Phoenix City,” as some pan-Germanists call it, due to its burning by Bohemian troops in the past - has ejected Scandinavia from the Elbian lands. Nordicism, the idea of Scandinavia and northern Germany as a single entity, has been obliterated, the Scandinavian government humiliated both at home and abroad. As German unification advances by leaps and bounds, Scandinavia has lost the linchpin of its foreign policy and thus has found itself in the worst political crisis since the collapse of the Unionster Party. Burgundy, the other major power with interests in Germany, is sure to react decisively to this news to shield its eastern frontier. The destiny of the old Realm of the North is unknown, but the destiny of Germany seems clearer with each passing moment.
God have mercy on us.
The Treaty of Nuremberg

The German Phoenix continues to soar above Europe, as Danubian forces have swept Elbian armies from northern Germany and compelled Prague to surrender rather than face further bloodshed. The resulting treaty, signed in Nuremberg - the “Phoenix City,” as some pan-Germanists call it, due to its burning by Bohemian troops in the past - has finally avenged that atrocity by assigning all Elbian lands beyond the Bohemian core to the Danubians. Any pretense of Bohemia as a foundation for a new German or even Elbian identity has been obliterated, with the Elbian union state crumbling into dust and the Danubians claiming all its overseas possessions. As German unification advances by leaps and bounds, the Bohemians have been once more relegated to obscurity. Burgundy, the other major power with interests in Germany, is sure to react decisively to this news to shield its eastern frontier. The destiny of the Bohemian Lion is unknown, but the destiny of Germany seems clearer with each passing moment.
God have mercy on us.
The Reichsbanner Marches On!

At last! The centuries of German servitude beneath the yoke of the northerners have been avenged, and the Germans of the Elbe reunited with those of the Danube. The Reichsbanner Coalition has won a tremendous victory, but we cannot rest yet. Western Germany remains estranged, and the Burgundians will surely fight to the death to defend their power in the region if they are able. They might even take extraordinary measures to shore up their defenses…At any rate, northern Germany will take time to integrate, and there is also the matter of separatist militias which we will have to root out. It is hoped that the Reichsbanner will keep the political situation steady. §RIf we have not built a stable coalition, however, then the integration of the north could provoke a political crisis.§
§pThe Befreiungskrieg beckons.§
An Opportunity

The Danubians, under the leadership of the pan-German Reichsbanner terrorists, have ignited a new revolution which has plunged Germany into anarchy. If they are not stopped then the whole of Central Europe shall fall beneath the shadow of their tyranny. However, this storm cloud over the continent has a silver lining. For decades we have been seeking to fully integrate our territories in the east and west with the Burgundian core, but the necessary political conditions have never arisen. That is no longer the case. The threat of an aggressive and pan-German government in the east could allow us to rally the disparate peoples beneath our protection into a single, united realm. We may not get another chance.
Call the cabinet, we have a proclamation to draft…
The Treaty of Brunn

The dream of Innsbruck, of German unity, has been usurped by the old masters of Germany. The Danubian offensive into the north was a disastrous failure and now the Reichsbanner must pay the price. A treaty has been signed in Brunn - a small Moravian town notable only for its obscurity - which has put an end to $COUNTRY$. The Reichsbanner’s Executive Committee have been branded terrorists by the installed pro-Bohemian regime and will soon be tried (and likely executed) for their actions. $COUNTRY$ itself has been placed under occupation by $FROMCOUNTRY$. Rumors are swirling that $FROMCOUNTRY$ intends not to divide the Danubians back into Austria and Bavaria, but to absorb the southern German state into itself to build its own pan-German government founded on less radical principles. Europe cannot sleep soundly yet, as the German phoenix has fallen from the sky only for the roar of the Bohemian Lion to echo across the continent anew.
Deutschland uber alles…
The Formation of the German Confederation

When the Holy Roman Empire of the German Nation was dissolved decades past,  it was assumed to mark the exit of Bohemia from international relevance. Rumors of Bohemian decline, it seems, have been greatly exaggerated. The victory of Prague over the Reichsbanner Coalition of the Danubians has given its leadership the momentum to usurp their vanquished foes’ plans and proclaim a new German Confederation! Its constitution, as later ratified by the Diet, has divided the realm into administrative units structured around language and culture rather than old political boundaries. It will of course take time for the newly united Germany to consolidate itself. Burgundy, the other major power with interests in Germany, is sure to react decisively to this news to shield its eastern frontier - war between these powers seems inevitable. The destiny of the Bohemian Lion and the destiny of Germany have once again become intertwined.
Germania, we have returned to thee!
The Treaty of Wurzburg

The end of the Great German Revolution has been no end at all. Whether through mutual exhaustion or foreign intervention, all involved parties have come together in the city of Wurzburg to draft a peace treaty. Its only term of note is the the dismantling of the Reichsbanner Coalition and the prosecution of its Executive Committee. Foreign empires - especially Burgundy and Scandinavia - breathe a sigh of relief as pan-German nationalism has once again been defanged, this time perhaps for good. This could allow the more ambitious imperialists to claim unprecedented hegemony in Germany. With the failure of the Reichsbanner it is difficult to foresee how German unification will arise now. Perhaps a new movement shall emerge in the future, but at present the German destiny remains inscrutable.
What was all of this sacrifice for?
The End of the Great German Revolution

We have weathered the Reichsbanner storm, and regained control over our territories around the Elbe. Pan-German militias are being rooted out and the political situation seems to be stabilizing. However the notion of pan-Germanism also appears to be shattering, at least in the short term, and any projects which our nation may have planned to embark upon involving that doctrine are now impossible. Furthermore the political vacuum in Germany could embolden the Burgundians to cement their control over the Rhine and Swabia if they have the ability to do so. All in all let us hope that this brings Europe peace.
Once again, we pray for the fallen.
The German Phoenix Calls Upon Us

The Reichsbanner Coalition amongst the Danubians has recently concluded a conference in Innsbruck where they have laid out their plans for a unified German state. They have garnered so much support from the citizens of $FROMCOUNTRY$ that it is now preparing for a campaign to unite Germany. Its representatives have exhorted us to join forces with them, assuring us that the new German state shall respect Elbian culture. Much of our populace is inclined to accept their request for our annexation in the hopes of building a new Germany. §RGiven the strength of their position and the fanaticism of the Reichsbanner, refusing their offer and defending our independence with force MAY NOT BE POSSIBLE.§
No more brothers’ wars!
§RBy God, no, Danubian scum.§
The Unthinkable Betrayal

When the Reichsbanner gained preeminence within $COUNTRY$, our government extended its hand in friendship and brotherhood to $FROMCOUNTRY$, asking them to join our nation so that we could build a united Germany together. We made sure to include copious assurances that their laws and culture would be respected. Yet STILL they scorned us! We cannot tolerate this - they have done more than just dishonor us, they have dishonored Mother Germania herself! Only one course lays open for us.
§RTHE NORTH WILL PAY FOR ITS HUBRIS.§
The German Civil War

When the Reichsbanner Coalition, buoyed by popular support, pressured the Danubian government into announcing its intent to unify Germany, it was thought that the Elbian state to the north would quickly join forces with them. Instead all German nationalists were horrified to learn that the Elbians had rejected the Danubian request to merge their nations. Be it out of fear of losing control of their institutions or more recent grudges, Germany’s cultural divide between the High south and the Low north have never been more stark. Mother Germania weeps as her sons once again draw swords against one another for her own sake. Will the fanatical Reichsbanner cement their right to bear the German standard or will the upstart Elbians usurp them?
For the German destiny!
Victory of the Danubians

As expected by most international observers, the Reichsbanner triumphed over its northern rival. Despite initial fury at the Elbian government’s defiance, the Danubians did not waste time enacting reprisals against the common people. Once the old administration had been swept away, the formal reunification of north with south was proclaimed. Pains have been taken to defend Elbian religious and cultural institutions, at least to the extent of preventing a partisan uprising. For now $COUNTRY$ must work to heal the damage of the civil war and consolidate its new lands - but when this is accomplished, all of Europe shall witness the final rebirth of the German Phoenix.
It cannot come soon enough.
Victory of the Elbians

To the shock of international observers, the Reichsbanner and the Danubians writ large have been defeated by the Elbians of the north. All of the fanaticism in the world could not overcome the strategic brilliance of $COUNTRY$ which managed to turn the tables on its rival. Despite initial fury at the Danubian government’s aggression, the Elbians did not waste time enacting reprisals against the common people. Once the old administration had been swept away, the formal reunification of south with north was proclaimed - it seems that the Elbians have assumed the Reichsbanner’s mantle. Pains have been taken to defend Danubian religious and cultural institutions, at least to the extent of preventing a partisan uprising. For now $COUNTRY$ must work to heal the damage of the civil war and consolidate its new lands - but when this is accomplished, all of Europe shall witness the final rebirth of the German Phoenix.
It cannot come soon enough.
The Elbian Reichsbanner Putsch

The inability of $COUNTRY$ to force its northern rival to submit to its leadership disturbed the Reichsbanner Coalition. Fearing the collapse of the pan-German dream, they took action into their own hands, calling upon sympathizers within the Elbian government. Pan-Germanist officers within the Elbian military mustered their forces to the capital, where they declared the old government dissolved and ordered all Elbian units still in the field to stand down. This has delivered the Elbian union state to the southerners, but not without cost. The power of the Reichsbanner continues to grow and the dependence of $FROMCOUNTRY$ upon it as well. For now $COUNTRY$ must work to heal the damage of the civil war and consolidate its new lands - but when this is accomplished, all of Europe shall witness the final rebirth of the German Phoenix.
It cannot come soon enough.
Rumors of Instability

We have secured control over northern Germany but we cannot rest upon our laurels. The lands of the Elbe and the Weser have been abused and neglected for centuries, and the recent wars in the north have not helped matters. Ominous reports are filtering back to us of rising cultural and economic tensions in the Elbian territories. These stories are in turn fueling unrest and uncertainty in the Danubian homeland, especially in the capital. Worst of all, with German unification now a virtual certainty, Reichsbanner unity is beginning to fray as the different coalition parties realize that not all of them will be able to implement their policies. This was easy to think about in abstract back in Innsbruck but it is now causing friction amongst major political personalities. Perhaps this will all blow over - but we must be prepared if it does not.
We will face the future together.
The Reichsbanner Remains United!

The cynics who forecast the disintegration of the Reichsbanner Coalition have been disproved. Unity among pan-Germanists has persisted even after the liberation of northern Germany, and isolated incidents of unrest amongst the Elbians have been dealt with by regional authorities. Now that we have cleared that mighty hurdle we can turn our attention to building up Germany - for our struggle is not over yet. The Burgundians are the power with the most to lose from a united Germany and they shall never allow us to exist without one last desperate attempt to destroy us. At the same time they continue to hold many Germans in their clutches. We must prepare for the final conflict for Germany’s soul, a war that shall be greater and more terrible than any other : §RThe Befreiungskrieg.§
§RGermany will be whole, no matter the cost.§
Assassination of the President

Yesterday, President Johan Brandt was touring Stettin, recently liberated by the Danubians and the Reichsbanner. It was an unexpectedly warm day and so the President decided to ride in an open cab. As his convoy turned onto the Stettin main street, a shot rang out from the Stettin School Book Depository, then two more. The driver raced down a side street to escape the ambush, but the President’s guards soon confirmed their worst fears : Brandt, the charismatic centrist, was dead. The assassin, one Adolf Wilhelm Honecker, was arrested at the Stettin Theater later that day, only to be fatally shot by Kit Kat nightclub owner George Lang on his way into the capital courthouse for his arraignment this morning. This tragedy has ignited fury between the left and the right as both have accused each other of orchestrating Brandt’s murder and then killing Honecker to hinder the investigation. The truth may never be known but the Reichsbanner, once united, is now dividing with terrible speed.
We must not let this crisis tear us apart!
Assassination of the Bundespräsidium

Yesterday, Bundespräsidium Amadeus I was touring Stettin, recently liberated by the Danubians and the Reichsbanner. It was an unexpectedly warm day and so His Majesty decided to ride in an open cab. As his convoy turned onto the Stettin main street, a shot rang out from the Stettin School Book Depository, then two more. The driver raced down a side street to escape the ambush, but the royal guards soon confirmed their worst fears : Amadeus, the charismatic centrist, was dead. The assassin, one Adolf Wilhelm Honecker, was arrested at the Stettin Theater later that day, only to be fatally shot by Kit Kat nightclub owner George Lang on his way into the capital courthouse for his arraignment this morning. This tragedy has ignited fury between the left and the right as both have accused each other of orchestrating the Bundespräsidium’s murder and then killing Honecker to hinder the investigation. The truth may never be known but the Reichsbanner, once united, is now dividing with terrible speed.
We must not let this crisis tear us apart!
The Danubian Royal Massacre

It had been expected that, upon Bundespräsidium Amadeus I’s death, his son and heir the Crown Prince Helmuth would succeed him. This is no longer possible. The Danubian ruling family had assembled at the royal palace, and for the sake of their privacy many of the staff were dismissed. While a security cordon was imposed the Crown Prince himself was allowed through for obvious reasons. It was only when nobody left the palace for over twelve hours that the guards thought to check in on them. What they found was horrific. Crown Prince Helmuth had shot and killed his mother Queen Septimia, his siblings, and two of his uncles, before turning his weapon upon himself. Monarchists immediately alleged that the killings were another conspiracy but with Helmuth dead it seems the truth may never be known. The Reichsbanner-dominated Landtag has taken this opportunity to pass a new Danubian constitution replacing the monarch with an elected president.
The madness only spirals deeper…
Die Vereinigungskrise

The liberation of northern Germany and the assassination of the Head of State has caused our political situation to explode. The Reichsbanner’s left and right wings have abandoned all pretense of cooperation with the death of the man who had been hailed as the lodestone of domestic unity, as well as the influx of a whole second nation’s worth of people and problems. The government bureaucracy is beyond overstretched trying to govern both the Danubian heartland and the Elbian territories. Many northern communities are wracked by ethnic and religious unrest, not to mention economic stress. With the left and the right competing for state resources and using relief measures as political bargaining chips, the situation is degrading more and more with each passing day. §RWe are entering a decisive period in our history, a time in which anything could happen. Our government must be careful : every act shall bring us closer to either revolution or collapse, unless we can restore balance.§
Whatever happened to bipartisanship?
The Language Question

The first problem facing our government is that of language. We cannot commence aid efforts if people cannot even understand the signs and documents our government uses for everyday functions. Unfortunately the German language - or languages - has undergone great drift along geographical lines over the centuries. Reactionaries believe that the Danubian German tongue is the one with the least foreign influences and therefore the “purest” form of German, and that we should impose it as the sole national standard. Leftists see German linguistic diversity as something to celebrate and even promote, although they too want to use Danubian for government business. Most civil servants think that implementing bilingualism on a regional basis would be enough, though politicians on both the left and right see this as treating symptoms rather than the root cause of the dilemma.
§VLet all the German proletariat speak in their own way!§
Ensure that everyone knows basic Danubian and nothing more.
§uDanubian German IS German. Everything else is mere noise.§
The Administration Question

We have begun to stabilize our rule in northern Germany, but resources are still insufficient to meet the demands placed upon us by its chaotic state. The region has seen great political upheaval and governing it all directly from the capital with ad-hoc local regimes is no longer enough if we want to actually integrate the Elbians. Leftists suggest co-opting the Räte that have mushroomed across the north, giving them limited governmental powers in exchange for their assistance. Reactionaries argue that supporting the Junkers (nobles) and merchants of the north, the traditional elites, is the swiftest way to restore order. Moderates believe that the Elbians will calm down if they can exercise their own democratic voice, and that we should schedule new local elections across the north.
§VThe Räte are the true voices of the people!§
Ensure new northern elections and nothing more.
§uThe Junkers protected the Elbe for centuries, we can trust them.§
The Paramilitary Threat

Despite the Fourth German Council’s resolution to address paramilitaries, the Bürgerarmee and the Stahlhelm are as restless as ever. Both groups continue to recruit followers and harass their political enemies, a practice all the more destructive owing to the already-damaged state of northern Germany. They have even begun to once more brawl with each other! Action must be taken before they grow bold enough to attempt a putsch, or worse, ignite a civil war. While many people have called upon the government to pass a unilateral ban on paramilitaries, both forces have well-connected allies. Furthermore, while we could use an executive decree to order their immediate dissolution, this would be seen as an erosion of democracy. Perhaps we should only focus on the more threatening group, at least for now.
§VThe proletariat are our allies, we must disarm the rightists.§
Order the dissolution of all paramilitaries, nothing less!
§uThe elites are our allies, we must disarm the leftists.§
The Threat of Separatist Militias

Not everybody in northern Germany welcomed our rule. Some want to carve our their own independent states, be they relics of the past or new fantasies. Others wish to split us in half and create an independent Elbian German nation. Still others were loyal to the old imperial powers of the region, and fight for either their restoration or at least to prevent punishment for their actions. Whatever their reasons, separatist militias are plaguing northern Germany and the local authorities are overwhelmed. However many militias have an ideological bent as well, be it left or right. Therefore both the SPD and the DNVP had advocated to offer amnesty to certain militias (each favoring those who align with themselves) in exchange for their cooperation in suppressing the rest. Moderates however are fearful of the precedent that this would set and demand a universal crackdown on separatists.
§VAny friend of the proletariat is our friend as well.§
Criminals are criminals and nothing more!
§uAny friend of the Volk is our friend as well.§
The Threat of Rural Banditry

We have made progress in rooting out separatist militias. However the focus on fighting partisans has lessened our efforts to revive the northern economy. Furthermore as large militias have been shattered, survivors have deserted them to strike out on their own. This has led to a rise in banditry across rural northern Germany, with its roads, canals, and railways becoming the hunting grounds for gangs of armed robbers. Reactionaries have pointed to this disorder as proof that we need a national police force, with broad powers and connected to the military, that can crush these criminals. Moderates agree that a national police is needed but are hesitant to condone what would, according to DNVP proposals, essentially be a domestic army used against our own citizens. Leftists have described the very concept of a national police as despotic and have instead petitioned for us to organize farmer Räte to conduct armed patrols in affected areas, a proposal which has horrified the DNVP.
§VThe farmers need Räte of their own to defend themselves!§
Establish a national police and nothing more.
§uA military police will put an end to this brigandry.§
§VThe Sparkakusbund Strikes!§

Rumors of a left-wing conspiracy to take over the Reichsbanner and purge it of reactionary elements have been swirling since the Fourth German Council. Many were shocked this morning to discover that it was a fact! The Spartakusbund, an alliance of socialist military officers, Räte chairmen, and Bürgerarmee commanders, has swung into action. Across the nation, reactionary politicians and generals have been attacked, some by angry mobs of workers and farmers, others by squads of leftist militias. DNVP offices have been stormed and ransacked by red volunteers searching for evidence of their criminality. What is unfolding now is nothing less than a general purge of the German right. If we do not act quickly to mobilize the authorities against this liquidation then the German left will soon hold unquestioned dominance.
§VWe support this proletarian justice!§
§VJust make sure to keep the common people out of this mess.§
§uThis is TREASON! Order the military to suppress this red rampage!§
§uThe Arminiusbund Strikes!§

Rumors of a right-wing conspiracy to take over the Reichsbanner and purge it of socialist elements have been swirling since the Fourth German Council. Many were shocked this morning to discover that it was a fact! The Arminiusbund, an alliance of Volkist military officers, trade union leaders, and Kampfabteilung commanders, has swung into action. Across the nation, leftist politicians and generals have been attacked, some by angry mobs, others by squads of Volkist militias. SPD offices have been stormed and ransacked by reactionary volunteers searching for evidence of their criminality. What is unfolding now is nothing less than a general purge of the German left. If we do not act quickly to mobilize the authorities against this liquidation then the German right will soon hold unquestioned dominance.
§VThis is TREASON! Order the army to end this barbarism!§
§uJust make sure to keep the common people out of this mess.§R
§uWe support this Volkist justice!§
The Neutugendbund Strikes!

Rumors of a liberal conspiracy to reassert control over the Reichsbanner and purge it of extremist elements have been swirling since the Fourth German Council. Many were shocked this morning to discover that it was a fact! The Neutugendbund (named after a prior German nationalist republican group), an alliance of Radicalist military officers, trade union leaders, and Landtag representatives, has swung into action. Across the nations, mass arrests have been carried out against both socialist and Volkist politicians and generals, with many choosing to resist by force of arms. Bürgerarmee and Kampfabeilung bases are under attack by loyal army units, and SPD and DNVP offices have been raided by loyalist policemen, uncovering evidence of wide-ranging illegal activities to build their power across the country. It is tempting to let this national cleansing run its course, but for the sake of stability we may wish to focus on one group in particular.
§VThe rightists are the greatest threat, not the left!§
§RPURGE THEM ALL! GOD WILL RECOGNIZE HIS OWN!§
§uThe leftists are the greatest threat, not the right!§
§WThe Jungdeutscher Orden Putsch§

In 1790 revolutionaries kindled a bonfire at the foundation of Germany society. They thought that they would light the flame of German renewal. The years hence saw liberal parties instead become Jewish, international, and, in cowardly fashion, preach peace on Earth where they once called for Fallschwertmaschinen. Yet the conservatives remained as sluggish and inert as ever, and the red rag disgraced our streets. Thus the Young German Order has acted. Only manly discipline - unconditional subordination to selfless leaders guided only by their public spirit, relegation of our own thoughts, and confidence in the State and the Military - can guarantee that the moral force of the individual shall be aggregated into a power that will affect the redemption of the nation and the Fatherland. If there is any un-Germanness in and about us, it can only have come from a lack of racial sense, in defeatist thinking and, finally, in the advancement of the foreign peoples within our boundaries. There is but one hope for us : to fix our bayonets, say 'Amen' and charge! - Proclamation by General Erwin von Leeb during the Putsch of $YEAR$
§WAt last, a man with political sense!§
§VThe Final German Revolution§

“Dear Comrades : For decades our rulers have been engaged in the robbery of both ourselves and our neighbors. They sowed in our hearts fear of the Latins and the Slavs. But this was camouflage for domestic and imperial aggression. Have we won one hundredth part of what our rulers claimed for us? No! We have endlessly toiled for masters who shall never be satisfied. Comrades, now comes for you a fitting opportunity. Unite! Hold together under the banner of the International. Stretch the tyrant at your feet with a mighty blow. He now wavers. A well-aimed blow will at this time win your freedom and will to some extent recompense you for all the blood that has been shed. Soldiers! Sailors! Farmers! And you workers! Arise by regiments, towns, and factories. Do not let yourselves be deceived any longer by your rulers, by lip patriots and profiteers. Rise with power and seize the reins of government. Yours is the force. To you belongs the right to rule. Answer the call for freedom and win your own war for liberty!” - 'Call to Revolution' issued by SPD leader Otto Hayek during the general strike of $YEAR$ and the onset of the Red Year
§VArbeiter, Bauern, nehmt die Gewehre für das proletarische Vaterland!§
§uThe Volkist Dawn§

“Germany has tried to solve her problems through peace. We put our faith in the old parties who claimed they could reason with our neighbors. Not only were we answered with threats, but with increased terror and pressure against our German compatriots. The Germans of the Elbe, of the Rhine, of the Danube – the Dutch Germans, the Swabian Germans, the Bohemian Germans, the Balter Germans, the Ashkenazi Germans – all of them must bear one battle-standard! For one Volk! One Volkstaat! And one Volksleiter! I shall assume this mantle. I shall bear this great responsibility and we shall rise to meet this challenge issued to us by our enemies. We are hemmed in by the Latin hordes of the west and the Slavic hordes of the east. But the German workers, who have already burst the bonds placed upon them by the cosmopolitans, shall take up Germania’s sword and strike down our foes! Henceforth we shall not answer insult and injury with memoranda. Bomb shall be met with bomb, fire with fire! And so, I ask the German people one question : DO YOU WANT TOTAL WAR?” – DNVP leader Erich Laufen during his putsch, $YEAR$
§uDie Trompete lässt ihren schrillen und finalen Ton ertönen!§
The End of the Unification Crisis

When the Stettin Tragedy robbed $COUNTRY$ of its Head of State, many assumed that the absorption of northern Germany had wracked the Danubian state with terminal overextension. It seems that this was unfounded. The so-called “Unification Crisis” has been resolved for the moment, and the Danubian German administration in the north has coalesced into a unified system. The Reichsbanner Coalition has persevered.. In spite of all of the challenges which fate has hurtled at the government, it has endured in the name of a united Germany. At least at present. Many Germans are embittered by the extreme measures that the Danubian government went to in order to crush the radical threat, and feel the administration went too far. Whispers continue to allege that the current state of calm is an illusion, sustained only by the common threat of the Burgundians to the west. §RIf that threat is removed - or, worse, if the Reichsbanner falters in the final struggle for German freedom - the consequences could be catastrophic.§
Ah, forget about that! §RThe Befreiungskrieg awaits!§
The End of the Unification Crisis

”Liberty is a slow fruit…It is never cheap. It is made difficult because freedom is the accomplishment and perfectness of man.” - Arnold Fleming, Anglo-German author\n\nWhen the Stettin Tragedy robbed $COUNTRY$ of its Head of State, many assumed that the Germans were on the road to chaos, and that the absorption of northern Germany had wracked the Danubian state with terminal overextension. All were untrue. The so-called “Unification Crisis” has been resolved, and the Danubian German administration in the north has coalesced into a stable system. None of the radical groups within the Reichsbanner were able to force their agenda through, and the coalition remains strong. In spite of all of the challenges which fate has hurtled at the government, it has endured in the name of a united Germany. With this period of danger now in the past, the German people can set set their sights to the future…
§R...and to the Befreiungskrieg.§
Preparing the Befreiungskrieg

Many members of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ General Staff believe that the Befreiungskrieg - the war to liberate all German peoples under Burgundian dominion and to shatter their power forever - will be a quick affair. They claim that all we have to do is reach northern Burgundy and the Dutch, Frisians, and Rhenish Germans shall arise to greet us. They say that the war will be “over before the next Christmastime.” But one general - Heinrich Vorbeck - disagrees. He has written an internal memorandum in which he asserts that the Befreiungskrieg will be unlike any war ever conducted in human history.  The advancement of military technology, he argues, has granted modern armies unprecedented powers of lethality, backed by massive industrial and economic complexes. It will be a total war, a war mobilizing the entirety of our population for the war effort. §RHe has implored our national leadership to only begin the war if it feels that our nation can shoulder such a burden.§
The time has come.
He is right, we are not ready yet.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Breaks Off Diplomatic Contact

Our relations with $FROMCOUNTRY$ have never been more than professional but now they have taken a turn for the worse. After a string of minor diplomatic rows over the status of the Dutch-, Frisian-, and Rhenish-speaking peoples in our nation, $FROMCOUNTRY$ has closed its embassy in $COUNTRY$ and has urged any of its citizens present in $COUNTRY$ to return home as soon as possible. Our general staff has long feared war with $FROMCOUNTRY$ over control of Central Europe and now it appears to be imminent. Nobody can say where the spark will be, but the fear of war has descended upon $COUNTRY$. §RWe should prepare for the outbreak of hostilities with $FROMCOUNTRY$ at any moment.§
Germans being warmongering savages? Unsurprising.
Proclamation of German Unification

”We assume dignity in awareness of the duty to protect the rights of the nation and its citizens, based on the united power of our people. We accept them in the hope that the German people will be rewarded for their sacrifices, granted liberty and strong frontiers to give the Fatherland protection against renewed attacks by its foes. Fortune wishes that we, and our successors, always be faithful to Germany, that we be loyal and share in prosperity, national welfare, freedom and order.” - Proclamation of $YEAR$\nAt last, at long last, Germany is one! Jubilant crowds across the nation wave the banner of a united and reborn Germany, the Germany promised to our long-suffering people so many years ago. Yet these celebrations are tempered by the specter of war with the Burgundians. They have made it clear they will not accept a unified Germany. The same crowds that cheer German unification are cheering our soldiers as they march west to slay the Burgundian Lion. §RNow begins the Befreiungskrieg.§
§RMay it be our final victory!§
Proclamation of the Second German Reich

”For the last century the German people have been without leadership, abandoned by the demise of the Holy Roman Empire of the German Nation. Now our labors in the pursuit of the great German destiny have been a balm for our sorrow and healed our wounds. I speak now directly to the German people : Rejoice! Germany is risen like Lazarus by the grace of Almighty God. I do proclaim the establishment of the Imperial Confederation of Germany. And furthermore I do proclaim that this nation, so newly birthed, shall never rest until all Germans are beneath its flag. For that purpose I now speak to the honorable gentlemen of Anvers. Sirs, you have eaten well. You have eaten Germany’s wealth, and, finding that meal insufficient, thought to feast upon her spirit. Your feast is at an end. If, within seven days, all territories in the Rheinland and in Schwaben have not been evacuated and turned over to this government, then I shall have no choice but to regard a state of war as having existed between our nations.” - Emperor Wenceslaus I of Germany
§RMay it be our final victory!§
Proclamation of German Unification

The day has come. For centuries the German people have been adrift, their nation shattered into a patchwork of small states, at the mercy of outside powers. No more! At last, at long last, Germany is one nation! The Head of State’s proclamation from the capital was printed and reprinted from Stettin to Vienna, from Essen to Stolp. Jubilant crowds have thronged the streets, bearing the banner of a united Germany, a reborn Germany, the Germany promised to our long-suffering people so many years ago. Yet even now these celebrations are tempered by the specter of war with the Burgundians. They have become the greatest enemy of the German people, and we will never be safe so long as they endure. The same crowds that cheer German unification are cheering our soldiers as they march west to slay the Burgundian Lion. §RThe hour of the last struggle for German destiny has come. Now begins the Befreiungskrieg.§
§RMay it be our final victory!§
The Last Chance for Peace

A few days ago, the German governor of a province near our border was assassinated by a Burgundian ex-soldier with ties to Jeanist organizations. The recently unified $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ has seized upon this incident to present a list of truly exhorbitant demands to our government. To summarize, they demand the immediate cession of Swabia and the entire Rhineland to $FROMCOUNTRY$. The Germans have set a deadline for our response, declaring that if no answer is received by midnight tonight, then they shall declare war. The entire cabinet is, of course, outraged and horrified at this demand, but $FROMCOUNTRY$ is not only willing but eager to use this opportunity as the chance to ignite a new Great German War over the issue. This is our final opportunity to avert a cataclysm, §Rbut only at the cost of plunging $COUNTRY$ into chaos.§
We will NEVER surrender to the German menace!
For the sake of humanity, we must comply. God save Burgundy...
The Treaty of Koln

Burgundy agreed to our demands! Our cabinet did not believe their ears when they heard the news. And yet, in defiance of all expectations, it is true. Anvers has agreed to cede all areas of Swabia and the Rhineland within their influence or control to us. Now only Dietsland’s status is still unclear. But for now, let us rejoice! Burgundy’s supreme humiliation has destroyed any pretense of their power within central Europe, and at a stroke, the nightmare of division which has haunted Germany for centuries has at last been vanquished. For the first time in over seven hundred years, all of Germany flies one flag! For the first time in history, it is of a united nation, a German nation, a nation of, by, and for the German people - not for Burgundians nor Scandinavians, but only us ourselves. The Treaty of Koln shall be forever remembered as the greatest achievement in diplomatic history, the document which confirmed Germany’s rebirth.
Germany, reunited at last!
The Second Great German War

What though the field be lost? All is not lost : the unconquerable will, And study of revenge, immortal hate And courage never to submit or yield, And what is else not to be overcome. - Jason Marlowe, ‘Paradise Lost’\n\nGermany lives. Despite the efforts of every power in Europe, despite the Imperial Wars of Religion, despite the ignominious end of the Holy Roman Empire and despite even the Hollowing, Germany lives. The death of the Empire was merely the final nesting of an older phoenix, and, as Ovid wrote, the death of that phoenix was in truth a rebirth. Now the German Phoenix soars over Europe, and only the Burgundian Lion is left to face it. Germany has declared its intention of “National Liberation” of all Germans under Burgundian rule : Burgundy, its intention to destroy the “outlaw state” at the heart of Europe. How the war began - a border incident, a minor assassination, perhaps a simple mistake - is irrelevant now. §RNow comes the final struggle.§
Great questions of our time are answered not with speeches but iron and blood.

See now Germania above the host, Tyranny’s scourge and Freedom’s greatest boast! The Algemeyner Yidisher Arbeter-bund in Deytshland

Wherever you hear Yiddish, there's a Bundist. I could go deep into the Congo and start talking to myself and in fifteen minutes a native wearing a flat cap would emerge from the underbrush and try to recruit me. - German satirist Aaron Wels\nThe General Jewish Labor Bund in Germany, or simply the Bund, is a new secular Jewish socialist party. They actively oppose anti-Semitism, defending Jewish culture against assimilation. However the Bund does so in the name of irreligious socialist unity unlike Jewish traditionalists. The Bund also rejects collaboration with bourgeois Jews in the major liberal parties, and in fact with any Jewish organization with religious or conservative views. At the heart of the Bund is the idea that there is no contradiction between the national aspect on the one hand and the socialist aspect on the other, rejecting even Hebrew in favor of Yiddish. This has endeared them to many non-Jewish German leftists who have long seen Yiddish as a German tongue.
Arbeter fun der velt, fareynigt zikh!
The German Constitutional Reform of $YEAR$

Left-wing Germans have for years objected to the German state’s centralization of power in the hands of the executive branch, arguing that the Head of State wields far too much power compared to the legislature. Negative comparisons have been made to Consulship of Marinus Dahlke who by the end of his life had become a virtual dictator. Now that a leftist coalition has achieved a majority, they are attempting to curtail the power of the executive in the hopes of establishing a more equal, equitable, and just system. This bill would also replace the infamous “Rot-Schwartz-Rot” flag, long seen as a symbol of conservative nationalism owing to its Bohemian influences, with the more liberal “Phönix-Flagge.” However there are those even within the governing party who feel a strong executive is necessary to preserve stability, as well as those who either have grown attached to our current flag or who dislike its proposed replacement.
We must free ourselves of the failures of the past!
The President vetoes this nonsense.
The Last Hope of Germany

For many years, German nationalists looked to the Danubian states to bring forth a united German nation. Those hopes have come to naught, as the Danubians have failed to bring forth any political foundations upon which a greater Germany might be built. Therefore it falls to us to bear the banner of a restored German nation onward. Even now, German nationalists are relocating to $CAPITAL$, and issuing publications in support of our efforts to unite the German people. They may not truly approve of our policies, but now we are all that they have left.
We will be the new Germany!
The Last Hope of Germany

For many years, German nationalists looked to the Danubian states to bring forth a united German nation. More conservative nationalists thought that Bohemia might be able to reinvent herself as a more equitable leader of the Germans. Those hopes have come to naught, as both the Bohemians and the Danubians have failed to bring forth any political foundations upon which a greater Germany might be built. Therefore it falls to us to bear the banner of a restored German nation onward. Even now, German nationalists are relocating to $CAPITAL$, and issuing publications in support of our efforts to unite the German people. They may not truly approve of our policies, but now we are all that they have left.
We will be the new Germany!
The German Autumn

For many years, German nationalists looked to the Danubian states to bring forth a united German nation. More conservative nationalists thought that Bohemia might be able to reinvent herself as a more equitable leader of the Germans. There were even those who thought that the Elbians or even the Swabians might build a new Germany. All of those hopes have come to naught. German nationalists are now coming to the terrible realization that there exists no nation which might serve as the foundation for a new Germany. This has sparked a surge in political violence across the German states, as the once-united front of pan-German nationalism disintegrates. In its place is rising a cannibalistic maelstrom of contenders who all seek to forge a new Germany by their own exertions and without any lofty pretenses of peaceful unity. The Summer of German rebirth has passed. Now comes the German Autumn.
Alles ist verloren.
Minor Leftist Support
The left-wing parties of the Reichsbanner have given a small amount of aid to our government - and will expect small rewards in return.
Moderate Leftist Support
The left-wing parties of the Reichsbanner have given a noteworthy amount of aid to our government - and will expect noteworthy rewards in return.
Major Leftist Support
The left-wing parties of the Reichsbanner have given a considerable amount of aid to our government - and will expect considerable rewards in return.
Massive Leftist Support
The left-wing parties of the Reichsbanner have given a tremendous amount of aid to our government - and will expect tremendous rewards in return.
Minor Rightist Support
The right-wing parties of the Reichsbanner have given a small amount of aid to our government - and will expect small rewards in return.
Moderate Rightist Support
The right-wing parties of the Reichsbanner have given a noteworthy amount of aid to our government - and will expect noteworthy rewards in return.
Major Rightist Support
The right-wing parties of the Reichsbanner have given a considerable amount of aid to our government - and will expect considerable rewards in return.
Massive Rightist Support
The right-wing parties of the Reichsbanner have given a tremendous amount of aid to our government - and will expect tremendous rewards in return.
Minor Alliance Size
A few radicals have joined with the centrists within the Reichsbanner to aid our government - our stability has decreased by a small amount as a result.
Moderate Alliance Size
A noteworthy amount of radicals have joined with the centrists within the Reichsbanner to aid our government - our stability has decreased by a medium amount as a result.
Major Alliance Size
A considerable amount of radicals have joined with the centrists within the Reichsbanner to aid our government - our stability has decreased by a large amount as a result.
Massive Alliance Size
A tremendous amount of radicals have joined with the centrists within the Reichsbanner to aid our government - §Rpossibly too many radicals.§
Dreams of National Liberation

We are the greatest hope of Germany! We will fulfill the aspirations of our predecessors and liberate all of her peoples from Burgundy’s clutches - our people will sacrifice anything towards this aim.
Integrating the North

Our administration is straining under the amount of territory and people that have come under our control, and resources within the civil service are tight while we build and rebuild institutions in northern Germany.
Integrating the South

Our administration is straining under the amount of territory and people that have come under our control, and resources within the civil service are tight while we build and rebuild institutions in southern Germany.
Integrating the French

Our administration is straining under the amount of territory and people that have come under our control - a people who, due to their divergent culture and Catholic faith, do not want to be ruled by us. Resources within the civil service are tight while we build and rebuild institutions in Neustrie.
Die Vereinigungskrise

The Vereinigungskrise, or "Unification Crisis," has been sparked by the rapid absorption of land and peoples owing to our victory in the German Civil War - our government's resources are beings stretched to the breaking point trying to integrate it all, forcing us to turn to political radicals to keep things running.
Create a Union of the Elbe

The people of northern Germany have been disunited for too long! Bohemia may have dreamt of clasping us in eternal servitude, but their imperial aspirations have come to naught. It falls to us, the true Germans, to bring unity to the Elbe, either by peaceful economic and political integration, or by force of arms. May the unification of the north be merely the first step towards a united Germany!
Liberate Teschen!

The estrangement of the Duchy of Teschen may not have been the worst defeat suffered by $COUNTRY$ in this century, but it was certainly one of our worst humiliations. The disgraceful Treaty of Venice cleaved away lands which we have rightfully ruled for ages. Only the threat of war against most of Europe compelled us to temporarily withdraw from the duchy. But now, we have recovered sufficient strength to declare that article of the treaty to be void, and reclaim the east!
The Issue of the Bohemian Germans

Czechia has been liberated, but the legacy of the Ostsiedlung persists all around us. For centuries, German has been the language of our rulers. It surrounds us, on street signs, on legal documents, on the pages of our children’s textbooks. We must address the status of the Germans within our nation, and decide whether we will strive for a bilingual (but Czech-controlled) society, or adopt…other policies.
Liberate the Slovaks

The Slovaks, a people whose language, religion, and temperament are closest to our own, have long been oppressed by foreign rulers. It is only now that the Slovak cultural consciousness has even begun to awaken. We cannot wait for the Slovak patriots to take action. We must bring liberty to Slovakia ourselves! After all, many Czech sovereigns of the past considered Slovakia a natural part of their domain. Let us lay the groundwork for the liberation of all Western Slavs, and strike another blow for our people.
Invade Krakow

The existence of the Free State of Krakow is a threat to our attempts to support our own claimant to the Polish mantle.
