Small as they are, they are still a gathering place for hostile Polish nationalists, and could potentially be used by foreign powers to build an alternative base of support for a new Polish nation. Thankfully, few foreign countries recognize the Free State of Krakow, so we can simply crush them ourselves.
Eliminate the Polish Pretenders

More than one warlord state was born out of the wreckage of the Commonwealth which claims the Polish legacy. This is unacceptable, as we have already selected a different state to fill that role. Therefore we must bring all other pretenders to the Polish mantle to heel. Thankfully few foreign countries recognize these breakaway realms, so we can simply crush them ourselves.
Reconstruct Poland

With the main Polish heartland now under our full control, the time has come to finish our plans. We will proclaim the resurrection of the Polish nation - in our image and under our continued protection, of course. The chaos of the Commonwealth’s demise shall at last pass into history, and we will claim for ourselves the honor of having saved Poland. Let us not contemplate for too long whether it was our actions which put the Poles into such a situation in the first place…
Create a Venedic State

What was once considered a concept at the absolute fringe of pan-Slavism has now become both government policy and simple fact : the Western Slavs are united beneath our hegemony. The Czechs, the Slovaks, the Sorbs, the Poles, all of them are marching together at long last! Now we must consolidate our union and join together in eternal brotherhood. It is true that our people have never been truly united, but now is the perfect time to foster that unity! Let all of our nations be joined together into one family, one mighty land where the Western Slavs can orchestrate their own destiny! Long live Venedia!
The Elephant in Prague

Bohemia has lost its Imperial glory, but has stubbornly remained part of the European political order, bolstered by its vast population, incredible mineral wealth, and prosperous industry. So long as Bohemia remains strong, there will always be the threat of them challenging us for the mantle of Germany’s savior. Yet Bohemia has a weakness : the Czechs. Let us reach out to the Czech nationalists, especially the Young Czechia movement, and support their cause against Bohemia’s rulers. Only a disempowered Bohemia is one that will allow us to claim the German destiny.
Support the Free Czech Legion

Vojtech Hácha, notorious mercenary and Czech nationalist, has approached our government in secret for assistance. He is recruiting Czech exiles into a “Free Czech Legion,” a paramilitary force which he intends to use to fight for a free Czechia. If we furnish him with arms and ammunition, we can improve his chances of success. §BTo avoid discovery, we must not deliver supplies to the Legion too frequently. The more supplies we give them, the greater a threat they will pose to Bohemia.§
Ignite a Czech Revolution!

The time has come to strike against Bohemia! We cannot wait any longer for the Czechs to act. We must contact the Legion and pressure them and their contacts back home to begin the insurrection at once. §BWith no support, the Czechs are unlikely to seize much outside of the heavily Slavic Upper Silesia. With minor support, the Czechs could probably seize most of Moravia as well. With moderate support, they could seize Slavic parts of Bohemia. With major support, they might even overthrow the Bohemian government all at once.§
Integrate Silesia

Now that we are the undisputed hegemon of Deutschland, the time has come to restore Schlesien’s place within the Vaterland. Our client state has served its purpose, and it will now be transformed into our newest province. Let us give a warm welcome to the return of our Schlesien volk to their heimat!
Adoption of the Elbian Constitution

The constitution of $COUNTRY$ has been finished, ready for signing and ratification. We have been forced to make various concessions to politicians on both the left and right during its drafting to prevent discord. Chief of all was the separation of northern Germany from the Lands of the Crown of Bohemia, with multiple duchies (re)created out of these territories. Furthermore all “Royal Estates” - the various princes (and, technically speaking, free cities) of the nation - shall be permitted to maintain their own domestic codes. The loss of Brandenburg and other parts of Germany is painful but Bohemia’s vast population and political preeminence will still allow us to dominate the Confederation. Our overriding concern now is building a national identity. To put it bluntly, our new nation, divided by both dialect and religion, needs a reason to exist, ideally by committing to a political alignment : reform, reaction, or revolution. §RIf we do not discover such a reason for unification, then revolutionaries may tear us apart.§
Lang lebe der Elbbund!
Adoption of the Elbian Constitution

The constitution of $COUNTRY$ has been finished, ready for signing and ratification. We have been forced to make various concessions to politicians on both the left and right during its drafting to prevent discord. Chief of all was the separation of northern Germany from Bohemia, with multiple provinces created out of these territories. Furthermore all member states’ legislatures shall be given broad powers to pass laws within their respective regions. The loss of Brandenburg and other parts of Germany is painful but Bohemia’s vast population and political preeminence will still allow us to dominate the Federation. Our overriding concern now is building a national identity. To put it bluntly, our new nation, divided by both dialect and religion, needs a reason to exist, ideally by committing to a political alignment : reform, reaction, or revolution. §RIf we do not discover such a reason for unification, then revolutionaries may tear us apart.§
Lang lebe der Elbbund!
The Bastion of the Old Order

At last, we have found our purpose - to defend European tradition! Ours is an ancient land, where the ghosts of the past walk with the mortals of the present. Our proud subjects give deference to the Church, to the elegant nobility, and above all to our glorious sovereign. When foreigners speak of the “Elbians,” their minds fill with images of gleaming knights and flashing sabers, of pious defenders of all that is good and right in the German spirit. Those in other, less fortunate nations, who also value the ways of their ancestors, rest assured that we are at their backs, a vigilant sentinel against the Revolution and its godless agents. Theirs is the way of the dark, but ours is the way of the Lord. §RWe must not lose sight of our nature as the continent’s guiding star by eroding the supremacy of the State.§.
And if we fall, as Lucifer fell - the flame, the sword.
The Old Order Torn Asunder

Calamity! The Elbian Confederation - the guiding star of tradition in Europe, perhaps the world - has fallen to the ideas of the Revolution. No longer do all of our subjects fill our churches, bow to our nobles, or even salute our sovereign. Even the very foundations of our nation have shifted to allow the voice of the common people to question the will of the State. The notion of what makes somebody an “Elbian” is growing hazy and obscure, as it can no longer be summarized by the word “traditionalist.” Some are now questioning the reason for our national existence, questions which will only grow louder.
How can we go on…?
The Bastion of Liberal Democracy

At last, we have found our purpose - to defend the liberal cause! Ours is a land of progress, where ancient tyrannies are withering away before the glow of a promising future. Our proud citizens scorn old dogmas, decrepit aristocrats, and all the other pawns of the old order. When foreigners speak of the “Elbians,” their minds fill with images of glowing cities and vibrant countrysides, of prosperous innovators bearing the torch of enlightenment from its German home out into the world. Those in other, less fortunate nations, who also value the advance of liberty and prosperity, rest assured that we are at their backs, a tireless champion against the Altes Regime and its barbaric agents. We are the light which shall illuminate the world! §RLet us never forget our destiny as the continent’s beacon of freedom by eroding the rights of the people.§
The Spirit of ‘89, triumphant at last.
Democracy Dies in Darkness

The Elbian Federation - the beacon of freedom in Europe, perhaps the world - has fallen from grace. Our citizens have begun to embrace ideologies of violence over debate, obedience over liberty, and opinion over truth. Even the very foundations of our nation have shifted to allow radical agents to challenge the spirit of freedom which once animated us. The notion of what makes somebody an “Elbian” is growing hazy and obscure, as it can no longer be summarized by the word “liberal.” Some are now questioning the reason for our national existence, questions which will only grow louder.
What happened…?
The Headquarters of the Revolution

At last, we have found our purpose - to advance the proletariat! Ours are a people filled with virtue, who have finally transcended the false “liberal-conservative” dichotomy peddled by the bourgeoisie. Our hardy laborers bow to neither cross nor coin, knowing no master but themselves. When foreigners speak of the “Elbians,” their minds fill with images of banners stained red by the blood of the proletariat’s struggle for victory, and of the common German people rising up to cast down their old masters. The proletariat of other, still oppressed nations, who are also fighting for the socialist revolution, march confidently with the knowledge that we are at their backs, a glorious soldier against Capital and its myriad agents. We are the spark which shall set the world aflame! §RTherefore we must not lose sight of the World Revolution, and succumb to revisionism or reaction.§
Arbeiter aller Länder : Vereinigt euch!
The Revolution Betrayed

The Union of Elbian Workers’ Republics has undergone a terrible transformation. Our citizens have begun to forget their role as the bearers of the world revolution, relapsing into reactionary modes of thought and digging up symbols of ideologies once thought consigned to the ashbin of history. Even the very foundations of our nation have shifted to undermine our proletarian spirit. The notion of what makes somebody an “Elbian” is growing hazy and obscure, as it can no longer be summarized by the word “leftist.” Some are now questioning the reason for our national existence, questions which will only grow louder.
REVISIONISTS! WRECKERS! CAPITALIST ROADERS!
The Czech Mutiny of $YEAR$

An ethnically Czech unit in Prague was in the midst of their Utraquist religious service when their German Catholic officer stormed in and demanded they halt at once to be deployed against the Danubians. Things might have ended there if the officer hadn’t snatched a locket with an image of Jan Hus from the neck of the unit’s chaplain and thrown it against the wall in anger, shattering it as he stomped out. This show of utter contempt for Czech culture pushed his men over the edge - they chased him down, then beat him until he blacked out and locked him up. The unit then fortified their barracks and declared their refusal “to risk our lives for a squabble between the Germans of Bohemia who hate us and the Germans of Danubia who care nothing for us.” The mutiny has spread like wildfire and now army barracks across Bohemia are in chaos. Thousands of Czech soldiers have gone on strike in solidarity with the Prague mutineers, while others have fled into the Czech heartland, taking their weapons with them. Suffice to say we will get no help from the Czechs in this war.
WERTLOS UNTER MENSCHLICHEN KETZERN!
The Elbian Mutiny of $YEAR$

It was hoped that the war with the Danubians would restore the spirit of our nation and rally us out of our national crisis. The opposite has occurred. Thousands of soldiers drawn from across northern Germany, upon being informed of their deployment to the south to face the Reichsbanner’s forces, simply refused. Some cut the telegraph and phone lines into their barracks to prevent orders from being given to them, while also fortifying the entrances. Others seemed to obey but never actually arrived at the front, forcing troop trains to stop in the Elbian heartland and fleeing into the countryside. Still others outright declared their support for the Danubians organizing “Reichsbanner chapters” amongst themselves and joining forces with the pan-German nationalist rebels! Elbia, a nation without a purpose, is now a nation without much of an army.
Oh dear God.
The Elbian Mutiny of $YEAR$

An Elbian unit in Neustrelitz was in the midst of their Catholic mass when their Scandinavian Protestant officer stormed in and demanded they halt at once to be deployed against the Danubians. Things might have ended there if the officer hadn’t toppled a figurine of Saint Luther of Wittenberg on his way out in a fit of rage, causing it to shatter against the floor. This show of utter contempt for Elbian culture pushed his men over the edge - they chased him down, then beat him until he blacked out and locked him up. The unit then fortified their barracks and declared their refusal to take up arms against the Reichsbanner. The mutiny has spread like wildfire and now army barracks across northern Germany are in chaos. Thousands of Elbian soldiers have gone on strike in solidarity with the Neustrelitz mutineers, while others have fled into the Elbian heartland, taking their weapons with them. Suffice to say we will get no help from the Elbians in this war.
VÆRDILØSE UNDERMENNESKE KÆTTERE!
The General Strike of $YEAR$

”No war but class war! No war but class war!”\n\nGerman-speaking workers across $COUNTRY$ have gone on strike rather than go to war against the Reichsbanner. Factories and farms have been taken over by their laborers, posting armed guards and declaring the Elbian government to be “the enemy of the German proletariat.” Multiple left-wing parties have echoed the call of resistance to the war effort, exhorting their followers not to take up arms against the socialists of Danubia. Some leftist groups have joined forces with the pan-German nationalist rebels to wage a campaign of sabotage and insurrection against the government, and even the more peaceful ones have begun spreading their ideology amongst factory workers who have not yet joined the strike. While an outright revolution from within $COUNTRY$ seems unlikely - for now - the Elbian left is opposing us with a level of fury and passion never before seen.
Goddamned dirty backstabbing reds!
The Righteous War against Revisionism

”If the Danubians had maintained the correct course, and upheld the proper Blanquist dialectic, there would be no differences between us. It was their deviation into rightist and reactionary errors which led them down the path of belligerence and betrayal of the revolution. They have perverted socialism and in doing so abandoned their mantle as the heroes of the proletariat. We shall not.” - Elbian Premier Konrad Haldeman\n\nThe Elbian left has rallied behind our defense of the Revolution against the Danubian revisionists! The people understand that the Danubians have strayed from the path of true Blanquism, and have appropriated the symbols of socialism toward imperialist ends. Therefore we must overcome their deceptions, and bring true liberation to the people of Germany!
Forwards!
The Officer Revolt of $YEAR$

”OFFICER COMMANDING 5TH HUSSARS STATES THAT ALL OFFICERS, EXCEPT TWO AND ONE DOUBTFUL, ARE RESIGNING THEIR COMMISSIONS TODAY. I MUCH FEAR SAME CONDITIONS IN THE 16TH HUSSARS. FEAR MEN WILL REFUSE TO MOVE. REGRET TO REPORT GENERALMAJOR KALMBACH AND FIFTY-SEVEN OFFICERS 3RD CAVALRY BRIGADE PREFER TO ACCEPT DISMISSAL IF ORDERED SOUTH.” - Telegram received by the Elbian government shortly after the outbreak of the Great German Revolution, $YEAR$\n\nOfficers throughout the Elbian military have either resigned or threatened resignation if their units are ordered to attack the Reichsbanner. Others are avoiding combat or even aiding nationalist rebels! It seems that much of the officer corps see the southerners’ conservative nationalism as the best hope for German unification. An outright revolution from within $COUNTRY$ seems unlikely - for now - but the Elbian right is opposing us with a level of vigor never before seen.
I want every last traitor SHOT AT ONCE!
The Great Crusade for the German Destiny

”Remember that the eyes of Germany are upon you. The thoughts and the feelings of every soul in Germany are with you, and your forefathers gaze down upon you from the Heavens with pride.” - Elbian Chancellor Arnold von Falkenhayn\n\nThe Elbian right has rallied behind our defense of the Heimat against the Reichsbanner traitors! The people understand that the Danubians have fallen under the sway of a mad band of criminals, and have abandoned the true German spirit. Therefore we must put down this threat and bring true unity to all of Germany!
Forwards!
The Elbian Antiwar Movement

”I am foremost a Christian. It is my conviction that our Lord Jesus Christ commanded us never to harm another man. For this belief, one born of supreme love, I am called a saboteur, a traitor, and a criminal. My government, draped in imperial grandeur, would send its sons to die for the sake of nothing loftier than its own vainglory. Have two thousand years of Christ’s grace passed without leaving a trace of mercy upon our leaders? Gentlemen, imprison me if you must. You will only drive thousands of other true patriots, patriots unmoved by the drums of war, into the streets.” - Statement by author Reinhard Meinhof upon being convicted of sedition for opposing the draft, $YEAR$\n\nPolitical groups from across the ideological spectrum have come out in opposition to conscription into the war against the Reichsbanner. Despite wartime security measures, their protests are still being heard, and growing louder.
You’re either with us or against us!
The War for the Fate of Germany

”The state is therefore everyone : the rules within the state are laws which safeguard the welfare of all and which must originate from the welfare of all.” - Franz Massman\n\nThe Elbian people have rallied behind our defense of liberty against the Reichsbanner tyrants! They understand that the Danubians have declared themselves to be enemies not only of peace in Europe, but of the spirit of freedom and dignity so innate to Germany, and have broken the natural contracts of human honor and fidelity which bind us all. Therefore we must contain this menace and keep the light of hope alive in Germany!
Forwards!
The $ORDER$Czech Revolutionary War
The $ORDER$Czech Revolutionary War
The Elbian Secession

The shattering of the Bohemian aristocracy has led to a resurgence of Czech political power, with many government posts now held by Czechs. This has outraged the Elbian Germans in the north, who have no desire to be ruled by Slavs. Last week a rumor spread that the government would forbid German from being used within the army and mandate Czech instead. The rumor was false but over the last few days, thousands of German soldiers and officers have either resigned or outright mutinied. These rebels have linked up with German nationalist groups and given them the strength to declare secession from $COUNTRY$! Brandenburg, Mecklenburg, and Saxony have all severed ties with Prague, and Scandinavia has quickly recognized their independence, sparking rumors of their involvement. This has led to an explosion of Czech nationalism and attacks on German culture within $COUNTRY$ and if it was not a nation ruled by and for the Czech people before, it most definitely is now.
Czechia for the Slavs!
The New Czech Constitution

Our new republic requires a suitable legal foundation. Thus representatives from across the nation were summoned to Praha for a constitutional convention. After over a month of debate, we believe that the final draft is ready to be signed. This constitution establishes our nation as a democratic republic, with most powers held by the legislature and the executive exercising only certain functions in the case of a political crisis. Nobody has any desire to repeat the autocracy of the Jagiellon era, after all.
A toast to a new and democratic Czech era!
The Czechs Triumphant

Bohemia’s Altes Regime has been overthrown by a Czech revolution - one whose leaders are entirely separate from the Free Czech Legion which we were supporting. While a few hardliners within the Legion feel that the new Czech government does not reflect their values and should be overthrown as well, the vast majority of the Legion have returned to their homeland, and the organization is now effectively defunct. Thus our support of the Czech nationalist community no longer serves any purpose. Let us hope this new government will distinguish between the Bohemians who once ruled them and the Bohemian people as a whole…
Here’s to the Czechs - may they learn from the Jagiellons’ failures.
Rumors of a Czech Revolution

Interior Minister Rudolf Dressler recently briefed the rest of the cabinet on the “Czech problem.” He has confirmed that there are signs of an increase in Czech nationalist and pan-Slavic activity. Circulation of nationalist propaganda has increased, and an arsenal in Budweis was recently burglarized, with signs pointing to a Czech radical group being responsible. More than one Polish merchant has been arrested in Upper Silesia for distributing Czech propaganda, so they may have more support than we know. While he confessed that these are troubling developments, he insisted that his ministry has a handle on the Czechs, and that no armed groups have yet organized. Despite his declarations, the meeting left much of the cabinet feeling uneasy about the rise of Czech nationalism in Bohemia - especially after one of the younger ministers questioned whether the Danubians might be behind this activity, a question which Dressler seemed to ignore.
We trust Minister Dressler, he knows what he’s doing.
Order a special investigation opened into a potential Czech insurrection.
Rumors of a Czech Revolution

Interior Minister Rudolf Dressler recently briefed the rest of the cabinet on the “Czech problem.” He has confirmed that Czech nationalists have begun organizing revolutionary cells in multiple cities. Dressler identified “Young Czechia” as the main threat, describing it as an underground group committed to establishing a Czech nation-state. This group not only spreads propaganda but is forming armed brigades, who purchase weapons abroad - mainly in Danubia - and smuggle them here, training with them in the Moravian countryside. They may also be supported by sympathetic Poles in Upper Silesia. Dressler finished by offering two plans. The first is to attempt to sow distrust between the different factions of Czech nationalists to pressure their movement to split internally. The second, more direct option would be to conduct mass arrests of known Czech nationalist leaders. Dressler warned that only the removal of the heads of the movement could truly destroy it, but many cabinet members would prefer slower and less dangerous methods.
We can afford to take time.
This is a crisis! We must arrest the ringleaders at once.
The Czech Crisis

Interior Minister Rudolf Dressler recently briefed the rest of the cabinet on the “Czech problem.” The mood in the room was grim - everyone had seen newspaper headlines of nationalist militias fighting in Upper Silesia. Dressler outlined the situation : Czech nationalist groups, organized under the banner of “Young Czechia,” have been stockpiling smuggled weapons and equipment - mainly from Danubia - in the Moravian countryside. Now they are making their move. At least one government arsenal in eastern Moravia has already been seized, and the rebels have encountered little resistance from non-German citizens. Furthermore Dressler believes that Poles in Upper Silesia may be either aiding the rebels or at least sympathetic to them. He concluded by declaring that martial law and a “campaign of absolute destruction” against the Czech “insurrection” would be our only hope to avert a civil war.
We must at least ATTEMPT negotiation first!
Tell the army that they have free rein to crush these criminals.
Upper Silesia in Chaos

All order has broken down in Upper Silesia. The Young Czechia militias have emerged from hiding, first seizing the local government arsenal before fanning out across the region. Several Polish groups have pledged support to Young Czechia in the name of pan-Slavism. What nobody expected was the appearance of hundreds of guerilla soldiers to bolster their ranks! This “Free Czech Legion,” as it is known, seems to have been formed by Czech exiles in Danubia, and has now crossed over from Poland to aid their ethnic kin. This can only have been organized with the Danubians’ direct assistance! We must therefore assume that this Czech uprising was a Danubian plot from the start. Thankfully our authorities in Moravia were able to foil multiple Young Czechia uprisings there, leaving the movement far weaker than it might have been otherwise. But the Danubians may intervene directly…
We will restore order!
Moravia in Chaos

All order has broken down in Moravia. The Young Czechia militias have emerged from hiding, first seizing a local government arsenal before fanning out across the region. Several Polish groups have pledged support to Young Czechia in the name of pan-Slavism. What nobody expected was the appearance of thousands of guerilla soldiers to bolster their ranks! This “Free Czech Legion,” as it is known, seems to have been formed by Czech exiles in Danubia, and has now crossed over from Danubia to aid their ethnic kin. The Danubians did not even try to stop them! It is reasonable to assume that this Czech uprising was a Danubian plot from the start. Thankfully our authorities in eastern Bohemia were able to foil multiple Young Czechia uprisings there, leaving us still in control of the German heartland. But the Danubians may intervene directly…
We WILL restore order!
A Nation Divided

Bohemia has been torn asunder. The Young Czechia militias have emerged from hiding, first seizing multiple Moravian arsenals before fanning out across our Slavic-speaking lands. Several Polish groups have pledged support to Young Czechia in the name of pan-Slavism. What nobody expected was the appearance of thousands of guerilla soldiers to bolster their ranks! This “Free Czech Legion,” as it is known, seems to have been formed by Czech exiles in Danubia, and has now crossed over from Danubia to aid their ethnic kin. The Danubians did not even try to stop them! It is reasonable to assume that this Czech uprising was a Danubian plot from the start. The Danubians may even intervene directly to continue their support for the Czech rebels…
We must make a stand for the honor of Bohemia!
The Fateful Hour

The destiny of Bohemia is now in doubt. The Slavic peoples are rediscovering their strength. The winds of fortune, which once seemed to favor Bohemia even after the loss of her Imperial glory, have shifted yet again. Where does that leave us?\n\nThere are many people in our nation who do not wholly identify as Slavs or Germans. Take Adam Fierlinger, for example. A clerk in Teschen - or is it Tešín? - born to a Czech father and a German mother. Adam does not care much about religion or politics, but even he knows that the Slavs of Bohemia have long been oppressed. He owns a hunting rifle which he was gifted by his father. After hearing stories of chaos in the south, he takes the gun off its rack on the wall of his home and resolves to fight for his country. But which country is his?
”Jsem Cech!” §B(JOIN THE REVOLUTION)§
”Ich bin ein Böhme.”
Czechia Awakens!

The Czech nationalists have struck at last! The Free Czech Legion departed $COUNTRY$ in high spirits, and linked up with the Young Czech movement at home. With the support of sympathetic members of the Polish community and the Utraquist church hierarchy, the revolutionaries have seized control of eastern Bohemia. If they are to establish a Slavic state, however, then they cannot act alone. The Free Czech Legion has become their de facto armed forces, and the Legion’s commander, newly christened General Vojtech Hácha, has agreed to act in concert with our owned armed forces. While small skirmishes have already begun, §Rfull hostilities will commence within a few weeks at most.§
We will be ready!
The Czech Revolution

”Where my home is, where my home is, Streams are rushing through the meadows, Midst the rocks sigh fragrant pine groves, Orchards decked in spring's array, Scenes of paradise portray. And this land of wondrous beauty, Is the Czech land of my home, Is the Czech land of my home!” - “Kde domov muj’ (Where My Home Is), famous Czech nationalist song, by Karel Svoboda\n\nEver since waves of German colonists arrived in Bohemian during the 13th century, Bohemia’s cultures have existed in an uncertain flux. Now an uprising by Czechs and Poles within Bohemia against the Germans has thrown this divide into sharp contrast. But it is the Danubians who have made this rebellion possible! The Bohemians have denounced the Danubians as race traitors, while the Danubians have proclaimed their aim to work with the Czechs to create a more equitable nation. Whichever side prevails will answer forever the question of Bohemia’s - or Czechia’s - identity.
column16: This is OUR home, NOT yours!

column2: The Fall of Prague

The last holdouts of the Bohemian government were chased into Prague Castle, hastily reconditioned into a true fortress. There Danubian and Czech troops fought a bitter siege which lasted all the way into the castle’s basements and tunnels. After days of continuous fighting, the final holdouts were defeated, and the banner of the Czech nation raised over the castle which had stood for centuries as the icon of Bohemian supremacy over the Slavs. Young Czechia and the Free Czech Legion have now proclaimed the Republic of Czechia! Antonin Kalvoda, leader of Young Czechia, has been made the first president of the provisional government until elections can be held. Autonomy has been granted to multiple German provinces on the frontier but Czech culture has been cemented as the new foundation of the country. Hopefully lingering questions about the Bohemian German population will not break the Czecho-Danubian alliance apart…
Long live Czechia, free at last!
The Treaty of Prague

Bohemia has come back from the brink to shatter both our invasion and the Czech rebellion. It seems that not even the loss of their Imperial grandeur has reduced them to helplessness. Faced with the counter-invasion of the Danubian heartland, we were forced to sign a peace treaty. Its terms required us to formally accept responsibility for fomenting an illegal Slavic insurrection in Bohemia as well as burdening us with a massive war indemnity. This defeat has dealt a catastrophic blow to our international reputation, while Bohemia’s star may be waxing one more.
We should never have gambled with Slavs…
The Prague Spring

”My death will be your downfall. You can crush the flowers, but you cannot stop the spring.” - Last words of Antonin Kalvoda, leader of the Young Czechia movement\n\nThe signs of a looming Czech revolution were impossible to miss, and the police were scrambling to contain it. We thought it fortunate when, during the storming of a Young Czechia safehouse on the outskirts of Prague, we discovered the movement’s leader, Antonin Kalvoda! As the area was under martial law, he was brought to a local army base and given a swift trial. Convicted of treason, he was hanged at sundown. Unfortunately this proved to be a fatal error. News of “Kalvoda’s martyrdom” spread like wildfire and led formerly apathetic Slavic citizens to rally to Young Czechia. Soon mobs of Czech rebels stormed Prague, overwhelming the city guards. Today the banner of the Republic of Czechia flies over Prague Castle - the first to recognize the new state were the Danubians.
After centuries upon centuries, we are finally free!
The Bohemian Question

The Czech people have reclaimed their nation from the Germans - but what do we do with them? The provisional constitution established considerable rights for the German people while stripping all titles from the German nobility. Yet many Czechs are clamoring to “finalize” our revolution by removing every vestige of German culture and adopting aggressive measures to “re-Czechify” the German speakers. This is considered the moderate position, as the ultranationalists have demanded the complete expulsion of all ethnic Germans from the nation and the redistribution of their lands to Czech citizens. Thus the “assimilationists” claim to be acting out of extreme generosity towards the “foreign colonists.” It is true that maintaining a federalized state with significant rights for the German population will likely prohibit us from ever truly belonging to the Slavic cultural sphere. §RBut the Germanic world, especially the Danubians, would see such oppression of the Bohemian Germans as an act of absolute evil.§
§RWe will erase for good ALL of the traces of the alien German nobility.§
Our grievances are with the German elite, not the common people.
The Prague Betrayal

When the Czechs came to us for support, they swore to us that they sought to create an equitable nation, one that might be led by the Czech people, but where all peoples would have a voice. They lied. New laws have been passed by the Czechs to suppress the German language and German culture. Now newspapers in $CAPITAL$ bear accounts of entire communities of Bohemians driven from their villages by Slavic mobs. The cabinet has now descended into furious debate about how to address this crisis. While more cynical ministers argue that a loyal, Slavic Czechia is better than one allied to Burgundy out of fear of us, others demand vengeance. Our generals feel confident they could occupy western Bohemia, the most German region of Czechia, with little issue, but one minister has gone further. He has proposed we foment a counter-uprising amongst the Poles of Silesia, promising them generous autonomy in the Germany to come - the Czech government has, after all, given no concessions to the Poles, either.
Western Bohemia will make a fitting weregild for the Czechs’ crimes.
We will sow chaos across their nation! §R(WILL RESULT IN WAR)§
The Bohemians were never true Germans, anyway.
The Czech Terror

When the Czechs seized control of Bohemia, we hoped that they would be able to distinguish between the German nobility who had wronged them and the German commoners who simply wanted to live within their reborn nation. We were naive. New laws have been passed by the Czechs to suppress the German language and German culture. Now newspapers in $CAPITAL$ bear accounts of entire communities of Bohemians driven from their villages by Slavic mobs. The cabinet has now descended into furious debate about how to address this crisis. While more cynical ministers argue that the Czechs could be a valuable ally against Burgundy, others demand vengeance. Our generals feel confident they could occupy western Bohemia, the most German region of Czechia, with little issue, but one minister has gone further. He has proposed we foment a counter-uprising amongst the Poles of Silesia, promising them generous autonomy in the Germany to come - the Czech government has, after all, given no concessions to the Poles, either.
Western Bohemia will make a fitting weregild for the Czechs’ crimes.
We will sow chaos across their nation! §R(WILL RESULT IN WAR)§
The Bohemians were never true Germans, anyway.
The Danubians Have Seized the West!

The whole German world was outraged by our efforts to de-Germanize Czechia, but none so much as the Danubians. Their response was swift. Days after German refugees fleeing ethnic violence in western Czechia brought their stories of persecution to the Danubians, a Danubian army appeared in the west! There they were welcomed by German communities not yet secured by our own forces. They have not advanced any further into Czechia, but our western provinces have fallen under Danubian occupation, and the Danubians have made it clear that they will not tolerate any abuse of the Bohemians under their protection. We must now gather our strength and carefully choose the right time to strike for the liberation of our lost lands…preferably with Burgundian aid, as their ambassador has reached out to our government to offer support after news of the Danubian invasion reached Anvers.
Czech unity will not be denied!
Danubian Aggression

The whole German world was outraged by our efforts to de-Germanize Czechia, but none so much as the Danubians. Their response was swift. Days after German refugees fleeing ethnic violence in western Czechia brought their stories of persecution to the Danubians, a Danubian army appeared in the west! There they were welcomed by German communities not yet secured by our own forces. At the same time, a Polish insurrection led by the mutinying 1st Polish-Silesian Infantry Regiment under General Dalibor Gierek has seized Silesia! Gierek is almost certainly in the pay of the Danubians. We must now gather our strength and carefully choose the right time to strike for the liberation of our lost lands…preferably with Burgundian aid, as their ambassador has reached out to our government to offer support after news of the Danubian invasion reached Anvers.
Czech unity will not be denied…
The “RIGHT MOMENT!?” By God, this is an act of war!
A Successful Operation

Our defense of the western Bohemians has been executed with minimal losses. Danubian forces were welcomed as liberators and protectors by the Germans of the region, and a plebiscite has already been organized to officially annex the region into $COUNTRY$. Meanwhile, our agents in Silesia were able to sway General Dalibor Gierek of the 1st Polish-Silesian Infantry Regiment to join forces with other Silesian nationalists and stage a coup against the regional government. The Poles will not forget our promise of autonomy in the future…At any rate, the Czech government has severed all diplomatic ties with our nation - while drawing closer to the Burgundians - but has otherwise declined to retaliate. Let us hope that we can one day bring liberation to the rest of Bohemia.
For our freedom and yours!
A Looming Crisis

Our defense of the western Bohemians has been executed with minimal losses. Danubian forces were welcomed as liberators and protectors by the Germans of the region, and a plebiscite has already been organized to officially annex the region into $COUNTRY$. Meanwhile, our agents in Silesia were able to sway General Dalibor Gierek of the 1st Polish-Silesian Infantry Regiment to join forces with other Silesian nationalists and stage a coup against the regional government. The Poles will not forget our promise of autonomy in the future…Our main problem now is that the irate Czech government has immediately declared our actions to be an illegal invasion.They are mustering their forces for war against both us and Silesia - and are rumored to be courting Burgundian support. §RWe estimate it will take Czechia about a month before their military is ready to attack us.§
Let those backstabbing Slavs come!
The Czecho-Danubian War

”If I knew a foreigner from anywhere in his virtue who would love God and would be interested in the good more than my own brother, he would be dearer to me than my brother. And hence I prefer good English priests over timid Czech priests and good Germans over an evil brother.” - Jan Hus\n\nDanubia once supported the Czech overthrow of Bohemia, believing that the revolutionaries would usher in a balance between Germans and Slavs. Instead the Czech government embarked on a campaign of cultural warfare against all Germans in Czechia, causing the Danubians to occupy western Bohemia to defend its German population and sponsor a Polish uprising in Silesia. Hemmed in by enemies, the Czechs were left with no choice but to declare war on both of their former allies. As cannonfire rings out across the Šumava, the Germans and Slavs once again find themselves locked in struggle.
We have fought for our freedom for centuries and shall continue!
The Polish Silesian Declaration

Our integration of Silesia has run into an obstacle : the agreement made between our predecessors in the Danubian government and the Silesian Poles. The Poles are adamant that it was agreed their autonomy within a German state would be inviolate, and that they must retain complete internal self-governance. We initially attempted to dismiss this out of hand, arguing that they had no evidence for their claims beyond anecdotes - only for the Polish delegation to produce a signed agreement between the Danubian head of government and members of the Committee for Polish Rights, dating back to the overthrow of the Bohemian government. Our antiquarians insist that this document is a forgery, but foreign observers’ opinions are divided, and rejecting their petitions at this juncture would earn international condemnation.
The Poles may have autonomy, but their government must suit our interests!
THIS IS A RIDICULOUS LIE! THROW THESE WORTHLESS RATS OUT!
The Reichsbanner Cracks

When Germany triumphed against Burgundy, there were those idealists who expected the Burgfrieden (castle peace) of the Great German War to continue. They were sorely mistaken. Otto Hayek and the rest of the SPD have staged a walkout from the Reichstag, protesting what they see as the growing rightist tilt of the national government. Hayek has demanded the nationalization of major industries, as well as the establishment of a broad social safety net, otherwise he promises that the SPD will refuse to sit in any future sessions of the Reichstag. Already, the far-right parties, aligned around Erich Laufen and his DNVP, are planning counter protests, and the nation is holding its breath waiting for the next move.
The Reichsbanner is broken, will Germany break with it?
Erich Laufen Makes His Move

Enraged by the SPD’s walkout, Erich Laufen and his DNVP planned for counter protests in the capital the following week. Laufen had expected the protests to cow the left back into line. Taking to the main thoroughfares of the capital, he was disabused of that notion. Met with growing crowds of industrial workers who had dropped their tools to confront what they view as an existential threat, Laufen and his Blackshirts were chased out of the capital. This, however, was not the end of the drama. The SPD, sensing an opportunity, mobilized, ordering former members of their Bürgerarmee paramilitary to return to duty. Hayek assumed leadership of the workers in the capital and seized the entirety of the city, with the exception of government buildings which are still under the control of a weakened and tottering government backed by a notional police garrison.
The future of Germany is on the line…
The Munich Regime

Our efforts to liberate Germany have met with nothing but failure. Not only have our efforts to cross the Rhine and liberate our brothers and sisters under the Burgundian yoke been turned back, but the Burgundians have brought the war to Germany, breaking the Vaterland in twain and establishing an occupation authority in Munich. The establishment of this occupation authority is naturally seen as illegitimate by almost every German, and anger is boiling over from Bremen to Vienna at this provocation. While the Munich Regime, as the German Occupation Government has become known, is currently backed by Burgundian arms, it is immensely unstable. If the Burgundians extend their ambitions in Germany, it is possible that the whole, hated Munich Regime could come crashing down.
Germany is broken, but for how long?
The Munich Regime Collapses!

It did not take long for the Burgundians to make clear that their ambitions in Germany extended beyond the mere humbling of the German Confederation. Anvers was ready to put to rest what it termed the “German Hydra” for good. But, like Hercules, with every head of the German Hydra cut off, two more would rise in its place. Owing either to a deliberate leak by a well placed German agent in the Burgundian Foreign Ministry, or to negligent record keeping, word has leaked that Burgundy intends to partition Germany. The news that Anvers intended to restore what some called the “Post-Wenceslian” order has inflamed public opinion across Germany. In response, Otto Hayek and the SPD rallied the workers of Munich. Almost in an instant, the Munich Regime has collapsed, and the hated Burgundian puppet regime has fled the city. Time will tell what Burgundy’s response will be, but for now, Germans dare to dream again.
Germany is not yet lost!
A Peace Without Honor

The close of our titanic clash against the Burgundians brought nothing but sorrow when it was announced that the peace treaty would return all borders to their prewar status. Nothing was gained, and a generation of German men were lost, to say nothing of the devastation of our land and economy. This display of utter incompetence and weakness on the part of the German government has outraged the people, whose faith in their leadership has been shattered. Before the war, räte (councils) were starting to organize amongst the workers and soldiers of Germany, and now they are flexing their might. City after city has been paralyzed by strikes launched by workers irate at the governments’ failures, seeking not only its resignation, but its overthrow! The government has been completely unable to force these strikes to end except through use of force, often forced to use right-wing militias to break them. Every day, we surrender more and more of our political power to extremists on the left or right…
A terrible mistake has been made.
The Salvation of Germania

Bohemia, even as the heart of the German Confederation, had bequeathed to Germany what has become known as the “Bohemian Question.” Full of Germans and Slavs, the ethnic question had dominated the German Reichstag, and Bohemia’s role in the new confederation was still an open question when the new Great German War broke out. Now, with Germany spiraling into chaos following the War, the central government has decided to take drastic measures. In light of the unrest spreading throughout the rest of the country, the German government has made the unpopular, but some would say necessary, decision to withdraw its armed forces and garrisons from Bohemia. At a stroke, the Bohemian Question has been solved, though not in a manner anyone expected. Bohemia is again independent and free to choose her own future.
Co se lehce nabude, snadno se pozbude.
Behold a Pale Horse

Whatever efforts that the German central government took to arrest the growing chaos and anarchy in the country have not been enough. Owing either to international disappointments, gross mismanagement at home, or both, the German people have lost faith in their government. Now with the capital under the control of the communists, the central government has lost any semblance of control. In the rest of the country rival centers of power under a panoply of ideologies have begun to establish themselves. The future of Germany is unclear, but most now expect the next years to bring additional suffering to the bespotted Reich.
War is our homeland, our hauberk is our house.
Saxony Declares for the Volkists

Erich Laufen’s defeat in the capital at the hands of the communists did not spell the end of his ambitions to lead Germany. Fleeing from the capital, Laufen, and what remains of his DNVP, overthrew the state government of Thuringia in Erfurt and have now ensconced themselves in the territory of the old Ernestine Duchies. Already Laufen has set to work building a prototype for his new Germany in Thuringia, purging unwanted elements, and espousing his terrifying blend of bloodthirsty pan-German ultranationalism and quasi-communist economics. Styling himself as the “Volksleiter,” Laufen has pledged to reunite Germany, though no one knows where he intends to strike next.
This will be the end of Germany as we know it.
Revolution!

The declaration of Laufen’s volkist state in Thuringia inevitably spelt an end for the old German government. In response, Otto Hayek, controlling the capital since the defeat of Laufen’s putsch attempt, has finally made his move to snuff out the German government, notionally still governing the country through its continued occupation of key government ministries. Hayek directed the unions in control of the capital to finally occupy government ministries and the Reichstag itself. The demoralized and dilapidated police force tasked with protecting the government gave way before the surging crowds of workers and the ranks of the Restored Bürgerarmee. Old ministers were packed off to prison if they had not already fled into exile. The Reichstag has been permanently dissolved. Otto Hayek is now Chairman of the self-styled Union of Socialist Raterepublics, although in practice his authority does not extend far beyond the capital and the old Danubian heartlands in Bavaria and Austria. Hayek’s coup has now put to bed any idea of the crisis resolving peacefully, and already local identities and alternate bases of power are reasserting themselves across Germany.
The old rotten Germany has collapsed, but the new Germany may yet live!
Formation of the National Protection Government

Laufen has finally made his next move. Instead of striking south and bringing the fight to his leftwing enemies as was widely expected, Laufen has instead directed his paramilitaries to advance north, hoping to occupy Brandenburg and Pommerania, thereby securing the north and the old Elbian heartlands. As it stands, Laufen has grossly overestimated his appeal and underestimated the resistance that he would face. While the volkists advanced as far as Magdeburg, further attempts to advance in Brandenburg were suddenly stopped. Spurred to action by Laufen’s sudden advance into Magdeburg, the state governments of Brandenburg and Pomerania have announced the formation of the National Protection Government with the express aim of “bringing order and stability to the Vaterland.” It is yet to be seen whether this new faction aims to unify Germany, or merely secure for itself a small patch of stability as Germany descends into chaos.
Pomerania unifying Germany? Preposterous!
The Nuremberg Republic

As Germany descended into chaos, it appeared that no one would strive to pick up the torch of liberalism and democracy. Not so. Liberals in Nuremberg, intent on ensuring that the future of Germany is not dominated by the illiberal volkists to the north or the revolutionary communists to the south have declared a new German Republic. Convening a new Reichstag, made up in part of members of the old, this new German Republic has explicitly set itself out as the successor of the old German state, and is now intent on reunifying Germany under its own banner. Still, the task before this Nuremberg Republic is great. To its north Laufen’s government could strike at any time, and in the south Hayek’s Raterepublic is already eyeing Nuremberg with ill concealed greed. Worse yet, on the news of the Republic’s declaration, volkists in Ansbach broke away from Nuremberg, declaring their own volkist state and aligning themselves with Laufen. Time will tell if Nuremberg’s future will match its bright ambitions.
Will the center hold?
The Braunschweig Commune

As much of the rest of Germany descended into chaos and violence, the old lands of Braunschweig remained curiously quiet. As Laufen, Hayek, and the other players carved out their own fiefs, the Braunschweig state government continued to function as normal. Nevertheless, this curious state of affairs was more fragile than was let on, and when, in the early hours of the afternoon, a small anarchist demonstration began marching towards the Landtag, the whole state structure collapsed. The Braunschweig police force simply went home, and the anarchists were able to seize the reins of the state almost without a shot being fired. Almost as surprised as the citizens of Braunschweig, the anarchists have declared the establishment of the Braunschweig Commune. A new power has risen in the north.
No private property, no privilege, no difference in status, no usurpatory regime.
Saxony Stakes Its Claim

The task before Erich Laufen was great. He knew it, his unterleiters knew it, and indeed all Germany knew it. Erich Laufen’s position was also tenuous. The setbacks against the National Protection Government in Pomerania, and the emergence of a left wing state in Braunschweig have undercut his authority. Laufen needed to solidify both his state, and his hold on it. Turning to history to shore up both, Laufen has declared a new “Saxon” state, capped off by unveiling a stone statue of the Irminsul tree, sacred to old Germanic pagans, outside of his headquarters in a torchlight midnight ceremony. Harkening back to the 9th Century and the struggle against the Franks, Laufen hopes that this new identity will allow him to rally the people behind his struggle to reunify northern Germany. His paramilitaries are already mobilizing to take the fight back to the National Protection Alliance and the Braunschweig Commune. If he succeeds here, he can finally turn back to face his real rival in the south.
Will this new Saxony suffer the same fate as the Old?
The German Anarchy

”Jeder für sich und Gott gegen alle (Every man for himself and God against all).” - Common phrase used to describe life in Germany during the Sixteen Years War, 1605-1621\n\nCenturies ago, there was one Germany, they say. In every age there has arisen a new regime which made pretenses of uniting the German realms, and all failed. All but one, or so it seemed. The new Germany proved just as illusory as all which preceded it, and after failing to smite the Burgundian menace, now it, too, has fallen into chaos. The central government has retreated to its core and the rest of the German lands are now but warring states. These factions may be fuelled by the brutal ideologies of modernity, but any German from centuries past would recognize the situation with a sad sense of familiarity. The collapse of Europe’s heart has thrown the continent asunder. Will the German Phoenix rise twice in one age?
Brothers will fight and kill each other, sisters' children will defile kinship.
The Return of the Prince

The German Anarchy has resulted in a series of bizarre occurrences, none more so than the return of the Prince of Bavaria. Showing vivre worthy of a Jeanist, the Prince, officially the second born son of the last Prince of Bavaria, smuggled himself into Augsburg, which, while ostensibly under Hayek’s control has been in a similar state of disarray as to the rest of Germany. After rendezvousing with a handful of reactionary compatriots, including the Chief of the Augsburg Landwehr, the Prince seized city hall and the old keep in the center of the city. After a brief ceremony in the city hall, the Prince was fully invested with the regalia of the prince of his city and now rules as an absolute monarch. While the Prince’s seizure of Augsburg has been much derided as a farce, Hayek’s government has been unable to restore order in the city, leaving the Prince to govern Augsburg as he sees fit. Already other provinces in old Danubia are flocking to the Prince’s banner. If not stopped soon, this could prove a mortal blow to Hayek’s power.
A new power rises?.
The Augsburg Regime

While Hayek’s coup d’etat has led to the breakdown of his authority throughout northern Germany, most in the SPD thought that they would be able to rely on the loyalty of long radical Danubia. They were to be sorely mistaken. In the early hours of the morning, the Chief of the Landwehr in Augsburg executed a counter coup, seeking to seize control of the city of Augsburg and its environs as a part of a rapid march on the capital to depose Hayek’s regime and suppress the revolutionary tide before it engulfs all of Germany. While the coup succeeded in wresting Augsburg and even some farther flung territories from Hayek’s control, Hayek’s government still stands. With Hayek mobilizing his men and the new Staatspräsident of Augsburg doing the same, it appears that civil war within Danubia may be inevitable.
Blood begets blood.
The Burgerkrieg

As predicted, the government in Augsburg and the Hayek government have come to blows. Across Danubia, the forces of revolution and reaction have begun a battle to death. Brother fights brother, and family are riven apart as the war divides city, town, and village. Already atrocities are being reported against civilians, and waves of refugees are fleeing east to Hungary and south into Italy. While the fighting is still very much in the balance, whatever force emerges from this struggle will certainly be a leading player in the struggle to reunify Germany. Revolution or reaction, Danubia is still the leading light of the German struggle.
Not for the first time, the Danube will flow red.
Triumph of Augsburg

Mass was held in the churches of Vienna as the forces of Augsburg occupied the city. Otto Hayek’s radical regime has been toppled and its chairman is nowhere to be found. Either dead or in exile, it makes no difference: Otto Hayek’s dream is dead. Vienna was spared much destruction with the city surrendering just ahead of the arrival of forces loyal to Augsburg. The rest of Danubia cannot say the same. Much of the region has been devastated by the fighting, and even now recriminations are being carried out against those who were suspected of being loyal to Hayek’s regime, or even harboring socialist sympathies. Nevertheless, whatever the cost, the forces of reaction now control Danubia, and are doubtless plotting their next move in the struggle to control Germany.
“We have no restrictions! God is with us.”
The Red Flag Flies over Danubia

As expected, Hayek’s regime has triumphed. Ill organized and underequipped, Augsburg’s forces were driven from the field and back to fortified points across the country. While lengthy sieges followed in some places, especially Augsburg, which was nearly destroyed in the fighting, many of Augsburg’s forces surrendered without much of a fight. Those who sided with Augsburg’s abortive move for power are fleeing the country in droves, with those unable to leave Danubia already being rounded up and sent to work camps. Otto Hayek, in a triumphant address to the citizens of Munich, has pledged that he will not rest until all of Germany is liberated from the forces of reaction.
The Red Flag marches on!
Scandinavia Enters the Fray

Scandinavia was forced out of northern Germany decades ago, losing Pomerania and Holstein. While Scandinavia has given up on the dream of retaking Pomerania and its large German population, Copenhagen still views Holstein as an integral part of the Scandinavian Crown pilfered from it by greedy Germans. With Germany in chaos, the Scandinavians have deployed an army corps to reoccupy Holstein, reincorporating it into Scandinavia proper and evicting the German administration there. While infuriating, there is nothing that can be done to rectify the situation…for now.
The Lion of the North still has teeth.
German Defiance!
We cannot fathom the minds of the Germans, for they have, against all sense, decided to take up arms against our intervention! We do not expect this campaign to be anything but swift.
Fools.

column1: ##################### Russian Rework - Southern Region (Coded by Attalus, Finished by DeNuke} #################################

column2: Unite the Cossacks

The open steppes of Ukraine have been divided between various Cossack hosts for far too long. With their allegiances divided between the Russian principalities of the north and the Commonwealth to the west, the Cossacks never united despite their constant wars and raids against their common enemy : the Tatars. The Cossacks are a proud and unique people, and it is time that they unite into a single host that will stand against those who would threaten their way of life!
The General Rada

Now that the Dnieper host has acquired its independence, its central location in the middle of Cossackia allows them to exert a great influence over the various hosts. Should a threat become too strong for the various hosts to handle, a general Rada could be called to unite the Cossack hosts under one Ataman so the various hosts don't fall one after another.
Cossack Governance

Cossack bands are barely states in the European sense, with few administration and state tools beyond the elections in the Rada. The life there largely amounts to the old saying : 'The open steppe, a fleet horse, falcons at your wrist, and the wind in your hair.'
The conquest of the South

$COUNTRY$ has managed to secure the integrity and security of the various Cossack hosts. Now we must continue our fight against the Tatars to bring order to the state and ensure our people will not face troubles ever again.
End the Cossack Hetmanate
Our victory against the Cossack hosts is total. We must now end their idea of unity by appointing several loyal atamans over the various hosts that will be loyal to us.
Establishing the Great Saraj.

Even if we have been united in a single state, Tatars are far from being a single people, with still many clanic divisions and few to embrace our dream. One solution to this problem would be to relocate our seat of power to the city of Saraj. Located on the Idel river, it is also close to the Don making it a perfect place to centralize communications between Crimea and Kazan.
Ride East, Young Tatar.

The foundations of our state are now secured and our control over the various khanates as well. We must bring our Bashkir and Sibir cousins to the fold so they do not end up under the boot of infidels!
The conquest of the Kazak plain

Central Asia has always been disputed between various hordes and torn between the influence of the Tatar in the West and the Mongols in the East. With our status growing on the world stage, it will be easy for us to conquer these lands without anyone opposing.
Integrate the Kazaks

The Kazaks have roamed the Central steppes for centuries, and are among our closest cousins. With our conquest of their lands finished, we can persuade their leaders to accept our benevolent rule and help us reclaim our rightful place in the world.
Integrate the Siberian Tatars
The Siberian Tatars have retained many of the legacies of our ancestors, refusing to enter the modern era. But in the end, they are a part of the glorious Steppe heirs and will support our state.
The new Golden Horde

Our nation has successfully become one of the most respected of the world, our cities rich with trade, science and faith. To prevail in this age we must continue to conquer all those who oppose us : it is time to reclaim the legacy of Batu Khan and trample again the Slavic and Caucasian peoples!
Refute the Russian Claims.

The threat of Russia looms upon us. But thanks to Allah, we have vanquished the bear, who is now but a mere cub against our might! It is time we make everyone understand that we will not accept someone encroaching our nation to the world.
The Tatar Threat

The Tatars continue to represent the largest threat to our new nation. The Asiatic hordes have for ages threatened and raided Russian lands. It was thought that with the rising age of modernity wiping away outdated tactics, the old hordes would disappear without a fight. This did not happen - the Tatars have created their own united state and military. We will be unable to secure our southern frontier until the Tatars are broken forever.
Death to the Tatars!

The Tatar menace should have perished ages ago! It was only through treacherous and dishonorable tactics that they denied us our deserved victory in the past. Now, Russia is stronger than ever, and has already proven her status as a force to be reckoned with. Our other frontiers are now sufficiently secure that we can turn our attention to correcting the Tatar mistake. This time we will not accept any half-measures. The Tatars will be cleansed from the Earth.
War in the steppe
The vicious Muscovians are upon us! We must mobilize every men to fight back and keep the Russians out of the steppe!
They won't get the Steppe so easily!
Peace in the Steppes

The past few years have seen the Western Pontic steppe enjoy an era of relative peace, especially after the scale of violence and destruction seen during the XVIIth and XVIIIth century in the Wild Fields between Ukraine, Russia and Tatarstan. While in the West the Zaporizhian and Dnieper hosts watch the unstable Polish-Lithuanian south-eastern borders, the Don Cossacks have recognized the Prince of Ryazan as their liege. Only the Donets and Akhtuba hosts enjoy freedom, having conquered on their own lands from both the Crimean and Astrakhan Khanates. While border raids still happen it will need a change in the global situation to see the Cossacks hosts on the warpath. Should we unite into a single host, we might become one of the great powers of the East, and teach freedom to the oppressive magnates from the Commonwealth and the boyars from Russia.
We will see how long it lasts.
Peace in the Steppes

The past few years have seen the Western Pontic steppe enjoy an era of relative peace. While in the West the Zaporizhian and Dnieper hosts watch the unstable Polish-Lithuanian south-eastern borders, the Don Cossacks have recognized the Prince of Ryazan as their liege. Only the Donets and Akhtuba hosts enjoy freedom, having conquered on their own lands from both the Crimean and Astrakhan Khanates. While border raids with the Tatars still happen it will need a drastic change in the global situation to see the Cossacks hosts back on the warpath : should one of the hosts be annexed, or their neighbours become too powerful they will surely unite into a single host and become a formidable force in their own right.
We will see how long it lasts.
End of the neutrality
We have been informed that the situation in the Wild Fields has changed recently, forcing us to arm ourselves and watch as our neighbours pry on our independence.
To arms fellow Cossacks!
End of the neutrality
We have been informed that the situation in the Wild Fields has changed recently, forcing us to arm ourselves and watch as our neighbours pry on our independence.
To arms fellow Cossacks!
A new situation in the Dyke Pole

The Wild Fields, this area from the Pontic Steppe fought between bands of Slavic warriors and mercenaries who call themselves the Cossacks and the Tatar khanates has seen much bloodshed in the past centuries. The Cossacks hosts fought the Tatars, Russian and Polish ambitions, and amongst themselves while attracting serfs and slaves from their neighbors lured by the freedom of the Cossack lifestyle. The Wild fields had enjoyed an era of relative peace in the past few years but this status quo has been broken as the Cossack hosts now gather their men to face a new situation.
What will happen to these lands?
The Succession of Selim III

The problem of succession has plagued the various khanates of the steppe since their creation. Even Crimea, the most civilized of them does not escape this rule. Most of the time the question was ruled out by the Ottomans who chose woever pleased them the most. Selim III is aging and he has two sons fighting for the throne. Selim is like his father, traditional and afraid of the changes of the West. Murad is his opposite : he went to study in Istanbul where he became a renowned scholar, even meeting the future king of Iraq and becoming an acquaintance of his. He fought on the side of the Reformers in the Ottoman Civil War, and now, with the influence of Constantinople shinking in the Black Sea, he has decided to come back. Selim has begun to plot the death of his brother and who knows how it will end...
Selim's plot succeeds and Murad is executed
Selim's plot backfires and Murad becomes heir
Murad II

The Khan is dead, long live the Khan! Murad II, the renowned general and scholar, has succeeded in exiling his borther and taking the throne. He has promised to end obscurantism in the Khanate and to restore the rightful place of the Tatars as masters of the Steppe.
A new era for Crimea!
Standardization of the Tatar Language

Of the many reforms implemented by Murad II, the codification of the Tatar language is often seen as his most important legacy. Prior to the standardization of the Tatar language, various different dialects of the Tatar language were spoken throughout the Wild Fields, all with varying degrees of mutual intelligibility. Literacy remained low amongst the Tatar peoples, in part due to their migratory nature but also largely due to the difficulty of learning the Arabic script the language was traditionally written in. Under the direction of Murad II, a new script based on the Roman one was developed for the Tatar language, and spellings and grammatical conventions were codified largely from the Crimean dialect. This allowed for the written language to be significantly easier to learn for both foreigners and native speakers, and opened up Crimea to an influx of Western ideas and literature. While the new standard was not initially popular outside the lands of the Crimean Khanate, with time these conventions would come to be adopted as the Standard Tatar language, especially as a Tatar national awakening began to emerge.
How do you read this?
Military Reforms of Murad II

Perhaps the most significant factor contributing to the early successes of the Crimean state were Murad II’s reforms of the army of the Crimean Khanate. Having studied Western military tactics and doctrine of the last century, and having witnessed their effectiveness during the Ottoman Civil War, Murad II had become convinced of the need for military reform. While the previous hybridization of Turkish and Cossack military doctrines had fared well against the irregular forces normally encountered in the steppes by Tatar regiments, such tactics fared poorly in an open engagement between regular military forces. Thus, under Murad II, the lance was discarded in favor of the smoothbore, and a highly disciplined army unfettered by the cossack soldier’s intimidation or provocation was formed. While initially unpopular, Murad II’s military reforms ensured the long-term survival of the Crimean state in the face of encroaching Cossack and Russian expansion.
This is my boomstick!
The Unification of the Steppe

Both the Russian principalities and the Cossack hosts have been hungrily eyeing Tatar lands for decades now, and both have been growing in power in recent years. For the Tatars to remain free from foreign subjugation, they must be united into a single nation powerful enough to resist foreign incursions. As the only Tatar polity to even resemble a modern state, the mantle falls upon us to unite our brethren under our benevolent rule and to drive the Russians and Cossacks out of Tatarstan. Our first step lies in the conquest of our neighbors to the north, the Astrakhan Khanate. While none of the Tatar khanates remain unscathed from the times of the Departure, the Astrakhan Khanate was the one most devastated by the conquests of the Cossack hordes. Despite decades having passed, the Astrakhan Khanate has yet to recover, only staving off foreign conquest due to the relative worthlessness of their lands to the Russians and the constantly shifting political situation amongst the principalities. Before the political tides change in Russia, we must conquer them and utilize what resources they do have to strengthen our own position in the Wild Lands.
The Astrakhan Khanate is weak. We must seize the advantage!
Now is not the time.
Conquest of Kazan

The Khanate of Kazan has been in slow decline for decades, and has only recently begun to recover from the Chayka Rebellion. With the Khan of Kazan increasingly relying on foreign support to maintain his rule, Kazan teeters on the edge of becoming little more than a Ryazanian client state. Before the Ryazanians can make their move, we must invade the Khanate of Kazan, and with our armies now experienced in the use of new tactics and weaponry after our conquest of Astrakhan we will no doubt make quick work of any forces Kazan may throw at us.
Surely our armies will not stop with just Astrakhan?
Perhaps it would be wise not to be too ambitious.
Djihad for Saraj the Great

Saraj the Great. Located in the approximate geographical center of Tatar culture, this city represents much to the myriad peoples of the Steppes. Prior to its conquest by the Akhtuba Host, the city was the main source of wealth and power for the Astrakhan Khanate, controlling portage between the Don and Volga Rivers, and was even briefly the capital of the khanate after the Dzungar sack of Astrakhan. With the loss of the city to the peasant armies of Zarubin Chayka, the Astrakhan Khanate was left in shambles, and the whole Tatar nation was shaken by the loss of that magnificent city to the Cossack heathens. With our recent unification of the Tatar nation, prominent imams all across Tatar lands have called for a Djihad for the reconquest of Saraj the Great. We now stand at a crossroad
column3: on one hand, such a move would surely unite the diverse peoples of our newfound Tatar state under a single banner, and would obtain for us a worthy city for the capital of our new nation. On the other hand, the fall of the Akhtuba Host would certainly rouse the other formerly neutral Cossack hosts into action against us, potentially creating an enemy we are not prepared to deal with.

column2: Onwards to Saraj the Great!
We must not provoke the Hosts into uniting against us.
The Fall of the Akhtuba Host

Truly, Allah is on our side! The heathens of the Akhtuba Host have fallen before our invincible armies, and much of the remaining Cossack interlopers have been driven out or killed. Saraj the Great now lies in our hands, never again to fall to the infidel. So claim the devout amongst us, anyway. Already, however, Cossack riders have been spotted broaching our borders, and cross-border raids from the remaining hosts have nearly ceased altogether. The more cautious warn that this is the calm before the storm, and that cossack forces are preparing for a massive war the likes of which has not been seen since the end of the cossack Departure. Whatever the case may be, should the remaining cossack hosts decide to mobilize against us, they will not find us unprepared.
Let their armies break before us like waves crashing on a rocky shore!
The People of the Steppe

While nominally a nation united by Islam and opposition to Russian expansion, there exist great disparities between the various different peoples that constitute the Tatar nation. The Tatars of Crimea have long been within the Ottoman cultural sphere, while the Tatars of Kazan have grown to share certain commonalities with their Russian neighbors to the north. In addition to this, recent overtures in Crimea to opening up to the West have led to an influx of ideas regarding secularization and the rights of man throughout the lands of the former khanate, meanwhile large parts of the Tatar population outside of Crimea have grown to resent this trend of increasing liberalism in Crimea. These two factions will almost certainly create much friction as the new Tatar nation struggles to define what it exactly means to be a “Tatar.”
To be a Tatar is to live free from foreign yoke!
Troubles brewing in Ryazan

Unlike its northern neighbours, the Princedom of Ryazan holds little esteem for the title of Prince and has embraced the tradition of elective monarchy of its most powerful neighbour, albeit sugar-coating it with token remembrances of ancient Slavic customs. The Ryazanian Duma has always picked a Repnin since the union of the princess Anastasia with Nicholas Repnin, but the possibility of declaring loyalty to a charismatic unifier, like during the time of the Troubles, remains a very possible outcome. The real power in Ryazan thus lies not in the hands of the Prince but in the hands of the nobility leaders assembled in the Duma. Currently, Michael II Repnin rules in Ryazan and his fondness of military affairs (that gave him the nickname of 'Prince-in-the-barracks') has led many boyars to believe that he is not very interested in politics.
It will pass.
The coup of Michael II

Despite appearances, Michael II, the so-called 'Prince-in-the-barracks' had been creating an ever-growing network of collaborators, especially among the Cossacks from the Don Host. His contempt for serfdom and boyar excesses has become more and more evident over the past few months and he finally decided to make his opinion known by assembling the Duma in his palace of Ryazan. Cossacks then surrounded the chamber where Michael II had called the nobles, while he attempted to proclaim the dissolution of the assembly and his reign as autocrat of Ryazan. The boyars were taken by surprise at first, but soon fighting erupted as the nobles launched their own retinues against the Cossack guard.
The Coup is successful.
Boyars take control of the capital.
Victory of the Prince

Michael II had succeeded in his coup. He is now autocrat of Ryazan with all power over the state, a feat that no Prince of Ryazan has managed since the times of Alexander II Repnin 'the Gunpowder Prince.' The Boyars' have been crushed, many lying dead and the few remaining either rallied to him or are in shackles. One of the first actions he took was the release of the Don Host from their allegiance. Cossacks had helped him access true power, and he thus had to pay his debt to them. However the alliance between the ataman Beketov and the prince endured, and Michael II still retained many Cossack advisors in his court and own army. Among them was the notorious commander of the guard, soon promoted to general of the Prince's armies, Yemelyan Razin, who was soon to be recognized as one of the finest commanders of Russia
Until another day, Cossacks!
Victory of the Duma

The fight begun by Michael II ended poorly for the Prince. As the Boyars fought for their lives, the Prince himself was killed in the fray of battle, with his Cossack guards either meeting the same fate or surrendering. The Boyars soon crowned the nephew of Michael II, Pyotr Repnin as his successor. A weak boy aged 13, he would be no danger to the power of the Duma. The various nobles now had to take a stance towards the Don Host. The ataman Pyotr Beketov has already announced that he was loyal to the Prince and did not recognize the new prince, hosting the son of Michael II, Alexander, in their territory as the legitimate heir. We could let these peasants go as they have been a thorn in our side for decades or move to directly annex them, although that may stir the other Cossacks against us.
Let the Host go.
We will take back our lands from this 'host'!
The Cossack threat

As we feared the Cossacks have united following our takeover of the Don host. While it may seem unimportant, these Cossacks claim the lands we have taken and thus could strike against us when the fight with the other principalities begin. It is thus of the utmost importance that we strike first and place various loyal atamans to rule the steppe in our name.
Down with the Cossacks!
